name: MEATBALL CURRY

ingredients.name: gros yellow or brown oignon, diced
¾  tomate sauce (1 ¼  cherry tomatoes if you want to blend your
haché organic grass-fed bœœuf (or lamb, poulet, or turkey)
Dash  chili powder (more if you like it hot)

preparationSteps:
Start by making the curry sauce. chauffer the oil in a fry pan over

 more minutes, then ajouter the carrots. Lower the chauffer and sauté for 10
 minutes so the flavors can merge.

ajouter the coconut milk, tomato sauce, and coconut sugar. Stir well.
 Sauté for another 10 minutes.

While the curry sauce is simmering, make the meatballs. ajouter all the
 ingredients to a bowl and use your hands to ensure the mixture is well

 chauffer the oil in a fry pan over medium chauffer. When the oil is hot, ajouter the
 meatballs. Turn using tongs when one side goes golden brown. Once
 the meatballs are almost cooked through, ajouter them to the curry sauce
 and cuire together for 10 minutes.

name: PASTA PRIMAVERA

ingredients.name: uncooked gluten-free pâtes (brown riz, lentil, or chickpea)
½   broccoli, including stems, haché into bite-size  (2 to 3
Cracked black poivre and sea sel, to taste

preparationSteps:
placer the pasta in a large pot and cover with 5 cups of filtered water.
 porter à a bouillir over high chauffer. Stir the pasta, then reduce the chauffer to

While the pasta is cooking, chauffer the coconut oil in a frying pan over
 medium chauffer. ajouter the onion and garlic and fry, stirring frequently,
 jusqu'à ce que these turn golden brown.

ajouter the broccoli to the frying pan. Continue frying, stirring frequently,

ajouter the cooked pasta to the pan with the vegetables and toss to
 combiner. Immediately after, ajouter the peas, carrots, and broccoli sprouts
 and toss again for a few minutes jusqu'à ce que the flavors and oils are
 combined.

assaisonner with sea salt and pepper to taste.
 Variation:

name: TURMERIC CUMIN QUINOA BOWL

ingredients.name: extra-virgin coconut huile (or extra-virgin olive huile)
Dash cayenne poivre, if you like a little kick
One gros cucumber, haché into cubes

preparationSteps:
ajouter the quinoa and 2 ½ cups of filtered water to a pot. porter à a bouillir
 over high chauffer.

Reduce the chauffer to low, cover, and mijoter for 15 minutes. The quinoa

ajouter the remaining ingredients and continue to cuire, stirring
 occasionally, for another 3 minutes, or jusqu'à ce que the quinoa is soft and all
 the flavors are well combined. ajouter the quinoa to bowls.

placer the avocado and cucumber alongside the quinoa in a bowl.
 Sprinkle with cilantro and broccoli sprouts. Squeeze lemon over each

 Tip:
 servir with strawberries.
 Variation:
 Try using sesame seed oil instead of coconut oil for a different flavor.

name: COCONUT BASIL SWEET POTATO FRIES

ingredients.name: gros sweet potatoes, cut into the shape  French fries
frais basil, haché (or ¼  séché basil)

preparationSteps:
When the oil is sizzling, ajouter the sweet potato fries, stirring jusqu'à ce que each

Let the fries cuire, flipping periodically, jusqu'à ce que they are golden brown (3

After the fries have browned, gradually ajouter the basil and coconut.
 Continue cooking jusqu'à ce que desired crunchiness (or softness) is achieved.

name: MUNG BEAN SWEET POTATO SPICED RICE
preparationSteps:
Soak the beans and rice together in plenty of water so they are well
 covered for 4 hours, then rinse.

bouillir 8 cups of filtered water in a large pot, then ajouter the beans, rice,

Meanwhile, set a frying pan over low chauffer and ajouter the ghee, mustard,

 pepper, and fry for 1 minute.

transférer the contents of the frying pan to the pot with the beans, rice,
 and ginger (after they have cooked for 20 minutes). Then ajouter all the
 vegetables and the sea salt. Cover and cuire on low chauffer for another 20
 to 25 minutes, stirring often.

Turn off the chauffer and let the mixture sit for at least 10 minutes before

name: TURMERIC RICE

ingredients.name: carotte, cut in finely tranché rounds

preparationSteps:
bouillir the rice in 4 cups of filtered water jusqu'à ce que it is slightly tender but not

chauffer the coconut oil in a frying pan over medium chauffer. ajouter the onion,

ajouter the semicooked rice to the frying pan and stir-fry it with the carrot
 mixture for a couple of minutes jusqu'à ce que the rice is done and has turned
 yellow from the turmeric.

name: ANTICANCER VEGGIE STIR-FRY
preparationSteps:
chauffer the oil in a wok or frying pan, then ajouter the onion and garlic.
 Sauté for 2 minutes, then ajouter the ginger. Sauté for another minute,

ajouter the vegetables to the wok or pan and stir-fry jusqu'à ce que they become

Sprinkle the sesame seeds, black seeds, and broccoli sprouts over each

ingredients.name: extra-virgin coconut huile (or extra-virgin olive huile)

bouillir the potatoes (skins on or off, your choice) jusqu'à ce que they are

Drain the water, ajouter the oil to the pot, and mash the potatoes.
assaisonner to taste with salt and pepper.

name: MASHED CAULIFLOWER

ingredients.name: Sea sel and poivre, to taste

preparationSteps:
Bring a large pot of water to bouillir. ajouter the cauliflower and cuire jusqu'à ce que

Drain the water, then transférer the cauliflower to a food processor. ajouter

 Tip:

 Variation:
 Replace half the cauliflower with 1 to 2 white potatoes for Potato
Cauliflower Mash.

name: FIVE-INGREDIENT GREEN SALAD
preparationSteps: Chop the avocado into cubes.

placer the avocado, parsley, sprouts, and cilantro in a bowl. Squeeze the

name: SUPERFOOD KALE SALAD

ingredients.name: kale, center ribs and stems removed (save the stems and ribs for

Massage the avocado into the pieces of kale with your fingers,

ajouter the remaining ingredients to the bowl and stir, or continue to

mélanger together the olive oil, onion, lime, and sea salt for the dressing.

preparationSteps:
In small bowl, mélanger dressing ingredients. Whisk it to make it super

GRATED BEET AND CARROT SALAD WITH SUNBUTTER

Tip:

preparationSteps: placer the cabbage, carrots, and bok choy in a large bowl and toss.

combiner all the ingredients together for the dressing and pour over the

mélanger the lemon juice and olive oil for the dressing. Pour over the salads

combiner all the ingredients in a bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined.

preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. Pour on

name: SWEET PURPLE GRAPE DRESSING
preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. Pour on
 salad.

name: CITRUS SALAD DRESSING
preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. Pour on

name: SESAME-GINGER DRESSING
preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. Pour on

preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. Pour on

½  séché parsley or 1  frais parsley

frais sage leaves or 1  séché sage

preparationSteps:
chauffer the oil in a medium pot over medium chauffer. Chop the onion and

When the onion is soft, ajouter the herbs, spices, and garlic and mélanger well.

Squeeze the tomatoes into the pot. Chop up the tomato skins and ajouter

ajouter the water and let the soup cuire for 7 minutes.

assaisonner with more sea salt and pepper, if desired. Top with broccoli

mixture is smooth.
servir the soup with fresh herbs like cilantro.

placer all the ingredients in a blender or powerful food processor for 1

ajouter the onion, garlic, and carrots and cuire for 2 to 3 minutes.

ajouter the stock, water, turmeric, and bay leaf. Cover and mijoter on low

retirer the pot from the chauffer and blend the soup using an immersion

servir with desired toppings. Enjoy!

name: THAI SOUP
preparationSteps:
chauffer the oil in a large pot over medium-high chauffer. ajouter the ginger and

servir with fresh cilantro, broccoli, and bean sprouts.
 Tip:
ajouter organic chicken, beef, fish, or shrimp if you want to ajouter protein.

name: CHICKEN NOODLE SOUP

ingredients.name: poulet bouillon or four packets  Ancient Nutrition Bone bouillon
Vegetable bouillon or carton  vegetable bouillon

preparationSteps:
placer the oil, celery, onion powder, and garlic powder in a large pot

porter à a bouillir and allow to cuire for 7 minutes.

ajouter the ramen noodles and cuire for another minute jusqu'à ce que the ramen

servir and top with broccoli sprouts.

preparationSteps: Puree all the ingredients in a blender jusqu'à ce que smooth.
Taste. assaisonner with more sea salt and pepper, if desired, and servir.

preparationSteps:
chauffer the oil in a large saucepan over medium-high chauffer. ajouter the onion

ajouter the remaining ingredients and cuire for another 12 minutes.

moyen chili (your choice  heat), halved and seeded

combiner the broth, chili powder, cumin, and beans in a medium pot

Meanwhile, placer the chili, onion, tomatoes, basil, and cilantro in a

retirer the pot from over the chauffer and stir in the lime juice, olive oil,
 and sea salt. Garnish the soup with fresh basil and broccoli sprouts.

name: LENTIL SOUP

ingredients.name: ⅛  cayenne poivre or more to taste
broccoli sprouts, plus additional for garnish

preparationSteps:
chauffer the coconut oil in a large pot and ajouter the onion and garlic. Sauté
 jusqu'à ce que golden brown (about 4 minutes). ajouter the ginger and stir-fry for 1
minute. ajouter the cumin, thyme, sage, oregano, and turmeric powder
 and stir-fry for 1 minute more. ajouter the cayenne pepper, sea salt, and
 black pepper. Stir-fry for another minute jusqu'à ce que the spices are fragrant.

Stir in the water, lentils, celery, broccoli sprouts, and carrot. porter à a
 bouillir over high chauffer, then reduce to medium-low, cover, and mijoter for

Stir in the lemon and cilantro. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with
 more sea salt or cayenne pepper to taste. Top with broccoli sprouts and

name: MUSHROOM SOUP
preparationSteps:
Melt the butter in a large pot. ajouter the onions and sauté for 3 minutes.
 ajouter the mushrooms and sauté for another 5 minutes.

Stir in the water, dill, paprika, sea salt, and thyme and continue

Whisk the almond milk and diatomaceous earth together in a separate

 mijoter for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally.

Reduce the chauffer to low and stir in the black pepper, lemon juice,

name: GROUNDING VEGETABLE POTATO SOUP

ingredients.name: pumpkin or sweet pomme de terre

preparationSteps:
Dice the onion, potatoes, carrots, celery, pumpkin, broccoli, and

chauffer the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium chauffer. ajouter the

ajouter the remainder of the diced vegetables to the saucepan, along with

 chauffer for 90 minutes jusqu'à ce que the vegetables are broken down.

assaisonner with additional sea salt and pepper to taste, and top with
 broccoli sprouts.
 Tip:
 For more protein, ajouter 2 cups dried beans of any kind (soaked for at least 12

name: VEGETABLE BROTH
preparationSteps:
placer all the ingredients in a large pot over high chauffer and porter à a
 bouillir. Allow to bouillir for 8 minutes.

When cooled, transférer the broth to an airtight jar or container and store

name: CHICKEN BONE BROTH

ingredients.name: Bones from 2 chickens (approx. 2 ½   poulet bones)
½-inch   ginger root, peeled and haché
séché oregano or oregano essential huile

preparationSteps:
ajouter all ingredients to a large pot and porter à a bouillir. Once the liquid is
 boiling vigorously, lower the chauffer, cover, and mijoter for 24 hours.
Check the broth every few hours and stir.

You will know it’s cooked when you poke the bones with a fork and
 they fall apart and break. When cooked, strain the broth through mesh
 so you are left with just the liquid. Discard the solids.

name: GRASS-FED BEEF BURRITOS

ingredients.name: chili powder or ¼  cayenne poivre, optional (if you
brown riz tortillas/wraps or Quick pain

chauffer a large frying pan with oil over medium chauffer. ajouter the turmeric
 and black pepper. Sauté for 1 minute or jusqu'à ce que sizzling. ajouter the beef and

ajouter the onion, garlic, cumin, turmeric powder, sea salt, pepper, and

 the vegetables are tender and the flavors are well combined.

placer ¼ cup of meat into each tortilla and then ajouter your fillings of

name: GRASS-FED BEEF BURGERS
preparationSteps:
placer all the ingredients, except the coconut oil, in a bowl. mélanger jusqu'à ce que

Form 4 patties by hand.

chauffer a large frying pan with the coconut oil over medium chauffer. When

Allow the patties to cuire jusqu'à ce que the undersides have browned, then flip

name: MEATBALLS
preparationSteps:
chauffer the oil in a fry pan over medium chauffer. Meanwhile, beat the eggs
 in a bowl and ajouter the ground beef. Use your hands to combiner the
 ingredients.

ajouter the spices and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. Roll the meat mixture

ajouter the meatballs to the fry pan and cuire for 8 minutes or jusqu'à ce que done.
 Tip:

name: ALMOND TURMERIC CRUSTED CHICKEN TENDERS
preparationSteps:
placer the almonds, turmeric powder, salt, and pepper in a blender and

Cut the chicken breast into tender slices or nugget-size pieces.
Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk with a fork.
Dip the chicken in the egg, coating well.
Dredge the chicken in the flour meal, coating well on all sides.

chauffer the coconut oil in a frying pan over medium chauffer. When the oil is
 hot, carefully placer the chicken pieces in the pan 1 by

Let 1 side of
 the chicken cuire jusqu'à ce que golden brown and crispy. Flip the chicken and
 cuire the other side.

Carefully retirer the chicken from the pan. placer on a paper towel to
 absorb the excess oil if you like, then servir with a sprinkle of broccoli
 sprouts.
 Tip:
 servir with Coconut Basil Sweet Potato Fries and Five-Ingredient Green
 Salad.
 Variation:
 For extra chauffer, ajouter 1 tablespoon cayenne pepper to the flour meal mixture
 for Spicy Chicken Tenders.

name: WHOLESOME SAGE FISH

ingredients.name: fish, such as tuna steak, swordfish steak, salmon steak, or fillet
Sea sel and haché black poivre, to taste

preparationSteps: chauffer the coconut oil in a frying pan over medium chauffer. ajouter the fish.

While the fish is cooking, sprinkle ½ of the sage and ½ of the lemon
 juice over the fish.

Once you see that ½ of the fish is turning from raw to white from the
 bottom up, turn the fish over. Sprinkle the remainder of the sage over
 the fish and cuire through.

transférer the fish to a plate. Squeeze the remaining lemon juice onto
 the fish. assaisonner with sea salt and pepper to taste, and garnish with
 broccoli sprouts.
 Tip:
 servir with Five-Ingredient Green Salad, or Mashed Potatoes.

name: BAKED WALNUT-CRUSTED SALMON
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 380°F.

Prepare a baking sheet with parchment paper or thin coating of
 coconut oil.

mélanger the walnut meal, sage, sea salt, and thyme in a bowl. Beat the egg
 in a separate bowl and dip each salmon fillet into the egg. Press each
 fillet into the walnut mixture to coat on both sides. placer the salmon on
 the baking sheet.

Bake for 7 minutes. Turn the salmon over and bake for another 7
 minutes, or to your desired doneness.
servir with a sprinkle of broccoli sprouts.

name: GLUTEN-FREE TORTILLAS
preparationSteps:
combiner the rice, tigernut, and buckwheat flours in a large bowl.
 Slowly ajouter the water and vinegar, stirring constantly to combiner. ajouter
 the Flax Egg Alternative, mixing well to form the dough.

Knead the dough for 2 minutes jusqu'à ce que it feels tougher and form into a
 ball.

Roll out the ball of dough with a rolling pin to make six 6-inch circles
 (⅓ cup of dough each).

chauffer a cast-iron pan on the stove over medium chauffer. placer the dough
 circles in the hot pan. Cover the pan while the dough cooks. (This is
 important for the softness of the tortillas.) cuire for 1 to 2 minutes on
 each side jusqu'à ce que there is no more soft dough.

Once the tortillas are ready, transférer them to a plate and cover with a
 clean dish towel or cotton napkin to keep them soft. They are best
 eaten the day they’re made.

name: TEFF CREPES

ingredients.name: almond lait (Note: If the almond lait has vanilla in it, the result will
taste more like a dessert crepe.)
olive huile, MCT huile, or coconut huile

preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a blender and mélanger jusqu'à ce que smooth and well
 combined. Let the batter sit for at least 30 minutes, or set in the fridge
 overnight.

ajouter ½ teaspoon coconut oil to a fry pan. When the oil is hot and
 melted over the entire surface of the pan, pour in the batter. cuire, one
 crepe at a time, for 2 minutes or jusqu'à ce que the batter starts to bubble, then
 turn over. cuire for another 2 minutes, then servir.
 Tip:
ajouter more water or almond milk for a thinner crepe and less for a thicker
 crepe.

name: COCONUT WRAPS

ingredients.name: raw coconut meat (from young coconuts or green coconuts), about 4
coconut eau (when you open the coconut)

preparationSteps:
ajouter the coconut meat, coconut water, and sea salt to a food processor
 and process jusqu'à ce que the mixture is completely smooth. If it is too dry, ajouter
 more coconut water, up to another tablespoon.

Spread the coconut batter to ¼-inch thickness on a dehydrator sheet (or
 baking paper).

Dehydrate the batter at 105ºF for 8 to 9 hours. At the 8-hour mark the
 top will be dry and solid. Turn the batter over and dehydrate for
 another 8 to 9 hours.

name: GUACAMOLE
preparationSteps: Mash the avocado in a bowl with a fork.
Blend in the other ingredients.

name: TURMERIC HUMMUS

ingredients.name: flax huile, extra-virgin olive huile, or tigernut huile

preparationSteps: combiner all ingredients in a food processor and process jusqu'à ce que smooth.

name: HUMMUS-STUFFED PEPPERS

ingredients.name: Paprika or cayenne poivre, to taste

preparationSteps: Cut the bell pepper in half and scoop out the seeds.

Stuff each pepper half with hummus. Sprinkle with fresh spices like
 paprika and cayenne pepper.
 Tip:
 Use carrot or celery sticks to scoop out the dip.
 Variation:
 For a change of pace, stuff an avocado instead of a bell pepper. Stuff
 everything! Haha—just kidding.

name: STUFFED OLIVES
preparationSteps:
placer the olives on a sheet or plate and simply insert a piece of pepper
 inside each olive.

name: PROBIOTIC PICKLED CUCUMBERS
preparationSteps:
placer 5 whole cucumbers in a quart-size jar. ajouter the remaining
 ingredients. The water should cover the cucumbers completely, and the
 top of the liquid should be at least ½ inch below the top of the jar.

Cover tightly and store at room temperature for 3 to 5 days before
 refrigerating. The pickles will keep indefinitely.
servir with salads and meat meals, or mélanger into stir-fries!

name: SIMPLE STEAMED ARTICHOKES
preparationSteps:
Fill a large pot ¾ full of water, adding the juice of 1 lemon and 2
 teaspoons salt. porter à a bouillir.

placer the artichokes in a steamer tray inside the pot, stem side up.
 Cover the pot and steam the artichokes jusqu'à ce que the hearts are tender and
 the inner leaves pull out easily. This will take about 25 to 35 minutes.
retirer the artichokes from the chauffer and servir.

name: CHICKPEA FRIES
preparationSteps:
chauffer a fry pan with oil over medium chauffer. When hot, ajouter the
 chickpeas.

Sprinkle with salt and pepper, then cuire for 5 to 7 minutes or jusqu'à ce que the
 chickpeas are golden brown on the outside.

name: CASHEW CHEESE

ingredients.name: Juice  1 petit lemon (but no more than ¼ )
½  filtered eau (more for a softer fromage)

preparationSteps: Put all the ingredients in a food processor.

Blend jusqu'à ce que the mixture is smooth, adding more water if a softer cheese
 is desired.

name: HARD VEGAN CHEESE

ingredients.name: ½  arrowroot farine or tapioca farine

preparationSteps: Soak the cashews in filtered water overnight.

mélanger the agar with ½ cup of filtered water in a saucepan. Do not apply
 chauffer yet; set aside.

Drain the cashews, then ajouter them to a food processer with the
 nutritional yeast, garlic, arrowroot, sea salt, lemon juice, turmeric, and
 the remaining ½ cup of filtered water. Blend jusqu'à ce que the mixture is very
 smooth.

ajouter the cashew cheese to the agar pot and porter à a bouillir over low
 chauffer jusqu'à ce que it forms a thick batter consistency.

transférer the mixture to a dish that you want the shape of your cheese
 to be in. You could divide it into cupcake holders, for example.
 Refrigerate the cheese for 1 hour and then enjoy.

name: BAKED KALE CHIPS
preparationSteps:
Preheat the oven to 400ºF. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
 Lining with paper instead of oil will ensure faster bake time.

ajouter the kale to a bowl along with the oil and sea salt and massage
 jusqu'à ce que the leaves are well covered.

Bake for 9 minutes or jusqu'à ce que the edges of the kale are brown and crisp.
 They will dry out given time to rest after baking. Store in a dry placer if
 you don’t eat them all at once!

name: FRESH FERMENTED SALSA

ingredients.name: Two 4-  organic haché green chilies with juice
coconut sucre or honey (The microbes will eat the sucre and
⅛  Cutting Edge Starter Culture (You  find this culture on

preparationSteps:
placer all the ingredients except the Cutting-Edge Culture in a blender
 or food processor and process jusqu'à ce que well combined. You can leave the
 mixture a little chunky if you like your salsa that way.
ajouter the Cutting-Edge Culture and stir jusqu'à ce que well combined.

transférer the salsa to jars and seal with a secure lid. Let the salsa
 ferment at room temperature for 2 days, then store it in the refrigerator.
 Storage Note: This salsa should last for at least a month in a sealed
 container in your refrigerator.

name: PROTEIN BALLS
preparationSteps:
mélanger the ingredients together in a bowl (reserving 3 tablespoons of
 hemp seeds for Step 2) jusqu'à ce que well combined. If the mixture is too dry to
 mold, ajouter some water.

Form the mixture into 15 balls, then roll the balls in the remaining
 hemp seeds to coat.

name: HOMEMADE PROTEIN POWDER
preparationSteps:
ajouter all the ingredients to a blender and mélanger jusqu'à ce que you get a fine
 powder.

mélanger with ½ cup filtered water or almond milk to make a protein shake
 or smoothie.

name: TACO SAUCE
preparationSteps: mélanger all the ingredients in a small bowl jusqu'à ce que well combined.

name: VEGAN BUTTER
preparationSteps:
placer the almond milk, apple cider vinegar, and sea salt in a small cup
 and whisk together with a fork.
Let sit for 10 minutes, jusqu'à ce que the mixture curdles.

placer the coconut oil and olive oil in a blender and mélanger on high speed
 jusqu'à ce que well combined and smooth.

ajouter the almond milk mixture to the oil in the blender. mélanger for 2
 minutes jusqu'à ce que smooth and creamy.

placer the mixture into a mold and placer in the freezer to solidify. An
 ice cube tray works well as a mold. It will be ready to use as butter in 1
 hour.

name: FLAX EGG ALTERNATIVE
preparationSteps: Whisk the flaxseed and water in a bowl.

Let sit for 5 to 10 minutes. The mixture will become gummy, just like
 eggs.

name: VEGAN MAYONNAISE

ingredients.name: ¾  almond lait or cashew lait
¾  olive huile or avocado huile

preparationSteps:
placer the almond milk, lemon juice, mustard, sea salt, and pepper in a
 blender. mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined, about 1 minute.

ajouter the oil to the mixture and continue to blend jusqu'à ce que it thickens, 3 to 4
 minutes. When emulsified, the mayonnaise is ready to eat and to store
 in a jar or airtight container in the fridge.

name: BLUEBERRY CHIA SEED JAM
preparationSteps: placer all the ingredients in a pot and porter à a bouillir.

Reduce the chauffer to a mijoter and stir constantly so the chia seeds do
 not burn on the bottom of the pot.

When the mixture has thickened and the fruit is entirely broken down
 (about 10 minutes), allow to cool and then placer in a glass jar and cool
 completely before placing in the fridge. The jam is now ready to eat,
 but if you refrigerate it overnight, the jam will set more. servir on
 Gluten-Free Rolls or as a garnish for any dessert.

name: KETCHUP
preparationSteps: placer all the ingredients in a blender and mélanger well.

Pour the ketchup into a glass container and store in the fridge. The
 flavors will mesh well overnight.
 Tip:
 ajouter a dash of allspice for added flavor.
 Variation:
ajouter 1 teaspoon dried mustard powder for Mustard Ketchup.

name: TACO SEASONING
preparationSteps:
mélanger all the spices together in a bowl. Put the seasoning in a shaker bottle.
 Nutrition facts for entire recipe:

name: GARLIC SALT
preparationSteps: ajouter both ingredients to a spice jar and shake jusqu'à ce que well combined.

name: CUMIN AND TURMERIC SEASONING
preparationSteps: ajouter the ingredients to a spice jar and shake jusqu'à ce que well combined.

name: OREGANO SAGE SEASONING
preparationSteps: ajouter the ingredients to a spice jar and shake jusqu'à ce que well combined.

name: VEGETABLE SEASONING
preparationSteps: ajouter the ingredients to a spice jar and shake jusqu'à ce que well combined.

name: CLASSIC THREE-INGREDIENT CHOCOLATE BALLS

ingredients.name: almond farine/nut meal (finely haché almonds or other nuts)

preparationSteps: mélanger the nut meal, cacao powder, and maple syrup in a bowl.
Roll the mixture into 12 balls.

name: RAW CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIE DOUGH

ingredients.name: organic chocolate chips or cacao nibs

preparationSteps:
combiner all the ingredients, except for the chocolate chips, in a large
 bowl and mélanger jusqu'à ce que well combined. The dough should be moist, so ajouter
 a dash of water if needed.
Stir the chocolate chips into the dough.

Roll the dough into 12 balls, then press them into cookie shapes.
 They’re ready to eat!

name: MINI CASHEW CHEESECAKES
preparationSteps:
Put all the ingredients in a high-speed blender and whip jusqu'à ce que
 completely smooth.

Spoon 1 heaping tablespoon of the cheesecake mixture into each paper
 cupcake cup.
Set in the freezer for 6 minutes. Enjoy!

name: CHOCOLATE-AVOCADO MOUSSE

ingredients.name: .  cacao powder, or more to taste
.  raw honey or maple syrup, or more to taste

preparationSteps:
Blend all the ingredients in a food processor jusqu'à ce que smooth and creamy.
 Alternatively, you can mash the avocado with a fork in a bowl, and
 then ajouter the cacao powder and honey.

ajouter more cacao if you want a more chocolaty mousse. ajouter more
 honey if you want a sweeter mousse.

name: CHOCOLATE SAUCE
preparationSteps:
combiner the ingredients in a blender and blend on high speed jusqu'à ce que they
 become a smooth sauce.

name: ICE CREAM BITES WITH CHOCOLATE SAUCE

ingredients.name: maca powder or lucama powder, optional

preparationSteps:
combiner all the ice cream ingredients in a blender and blend on high
 speed jusqu'à ce que they become smooth. There should be absolutely no lumps
 whatsoever. Scoop the ice cream mixture onto a baking tray lined with
 paper and placer in the freezer. They will set in 1 to 2 hours. Clean the
 blender basin so you can use it again.

Once the bites are set, make the chocolate sauce by putting the
 ingredients in the blender and mixing them jusqu'à ce que smooth and whipped.
 ajouter a spoonful to each ice cream bite. They are ready to eat! Keep
 them in the freezer and they will set even harder.
 Tip:
 Soak the cashews for 4 hours to get a creamy, easier-to-whip ice cream.

name: ROASTED HAZELNUT CHOCOLATE BLOCK

ingredients.name: almond meal (or hemp seeds blended into a powdered form)

preparationSteps:
Melt the cacao butter either in the sun or over very low chauffer on the
 stove.

placer the melted cacao butter, cacao powder, and honey in a bowl,
 stirring well so the mixture is thoroughly blended.
ajouter the almond meal to the bowl and stir jusqu'à ce que the mixture is smooth.

Pour the mixture into chocolate molds or a baking dish, ajouter halzenuts
 on top, and then let set in the freezer or fridge jusqu'à ce que hard.

name: CHOCOLATE ALMOND BUTTER CUPS
preparationSteps:
Melt the cacao butter in the sun or over very low chauffer on the stove.
 Once melted, ajouter the cacao powder, almond meal, and maple syrup,
 mixing well. Taste, and then ajouter more cacao if you prefer darker
 chocolate, and more maple syrup if you prefer a sweeter taste.

Spoon 1 teaspoon of the chocolate mixture into each baking cup,
 filling ⅓ of the way. Reserve the other ½ of the mixture for the top of
 the cups.
Put the baking cups in the freezer for 5 minutes to set.

retirer the cups from the freezer and ajouter 1 teaspoon peanut butter to
 each. Each cup should now be ⅔ full.

ajouter 1 ½ teaspoons of the remainder of the chocolate mixture into the
 baking cups.
placer the cups in the freezer again and allow to set for 15 minutes.

name: FRESH FRUIT SORBET

ingredients.name: fruit  your choice, such as strawberries, grapefruit, pitted cherries,
apples, mango, pineapple, peach, blueberries, or oranges

preparationSteps:
placer the ingredients in a high-speed blender and blend for 1 minute or
 jusqu'à ce que you achieve an icy sorbet consistency.
servir immediately.

name: BLUEBERRY CHIA SEED PUDDING
preparationSteps: Blend all the ingredients together except the chia seeds.

ajouter the chia seeds and then set in fridge for 9 minutes so the pudding
 can gelatinize.

name: VANILLA PUDDING
preparationSteps:
Whisk the almond milk, coconut milk, maple syrup, vanilla, and sea
 salt in a bowl jusqu'à ce que well combined. Stir in the chia seeds, dates, and
 figs. Set the pudding in the fridge for 10 minutes.

transférer the pudding to individual bowls and ajouter toppings.
 Tip:
 Leave in the fridge for an additional 20 minutes to set further if the chia
 seeds have not gelatinized to your liking.

name: BLUEBERRY CRUMBLE
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 400°F.

Bring a pot of water to bouillir. ajouter the blueberries and cuire jusqu'à ce que they
 are semisoft.

chauffer the coconut oil in a small skillet over low chauffer. ajouter the almond
 meal, coconut, cinnamon, and 2 tablespoons maple syrup and toast the
 mixture. Set aside.

Drain the water from the blueberries and ajouter the remaining 3
 tablespoons maple syrup to the pot. Stir while continuing to cuire the
 blueberries over medium-low chauffer, jusqu'à ce que the blueberries are soft.
 retirer from chauffer.

combiner the blueberries with the toasted nut mixture in an ovenproof
 dish. Bake for 10 minutes.

name: CASHEW CHEESECAKE

ingredients.name: pecans (you  also use walnuts, macadamia nuts, or almond meal)
cashews, soaked in filtered eau for 3 hours to soften
¾  maple syrup or raw honey

preparationSteps:
For the base, ajouter the pecans in a food processor jusqu'à ce que you have a fine
 meal. combiner the nut meal and other ingredients in a bowl. The
 mixture should be dry, but moist enough to hold together.

transférer the base mixture to a deep pie dish (large enough to hold 2 ½
 quarts) and press it evenly to cover the bottom and sides of the dish.
 Set aside.

For the cheesecake filling, placer all the ingredients in a powerful
 blender and blend jusqu'à ce que the mixture is very smooth and light in texture.
 Pour the filling into the prepared crust.

Freeze for 4 hours. Once the cheesecake is set, cut into slices and
 servir.

name: RAW APPLE CRUMBLE

ingredients.name: frais Fruit Sorbet or Whipped Coconut crème. Berries for garnish,

preparationSteps:
Create a layer of Almond Butter Granola in the bottom of each of 4
 bowls.

Blend the filling ingredients together, leaving some chunks of apples.
 It should be moist and creamy. Pour into the bowls over the granola.

Top the bowls with Fresh Fruit Sorbet or Whipped Coconut Cream.
 Garnish with fresh berries.

name: CHOCOLATE-COVERED STRAWBERRIES
preparationSteps:
Dip the strawberries into the Chocolate Sauce and placer on a tray. Let set
 for a few minutes in the freezer to harden the sauce or eat right away!

name: CHOCOLATE HAZELNUTELLA

ingredients.name: ⅛  sea sel (unless you’re using raw nuts, then use ¼  sea

preparationSteps: Blend all the ingredients in a blender jusqu'à ce que smooth.

name: PLANT-BASED ICE CREAM

ingredients.name: cashew nuts (substitute sunflower seeds or hemp seeds if you have
⅔  Almond lait or filtered eau

preparationSteps:
Blend all the ingredients in a food processor or ice-cream maker jusqu'à ce que
 the mixture is as creamy and frothy as you can make it.

Pour the mixture into a container. Allow the ice cream to set in the
 freezer for 2 to 5 hours or overnight.

name: WHIPPED COCONUT CREAM
preparationSteps:
Open the can carefully and scoop out the top layer of the hard coconut
 cream into a bowl with a hand mixer, or a blender. A powerful blender
 will work, but a hand mixer is better. Be careful not to get any liquids
 in the bowl at all; this will not allow the coconut cream to whip, it
 must be the hard part of the cream only.
Whip for a few minutes jusqu'à ce que the coconut cream is soft and fluffy.

name: GELATO
preparationSteps:
ajouter the bananas to a blender and mélanger jusqu'à ce que they are smooth and fluffy,
 exactly like ice cream. At first your gelato will appear chunky and then it
 will become juicy and smooth.

name: VANILLA CAKE
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 350ºF. Grease an 8 x 8-inch baking dish.

Stir the almond milk and apple cider vinegar together in a large bowl.
 Set aside.

Whisk the flour, sugar, baking powder, and sea salt in a separate bowl.
 Set aside.

Whisk the coconut oil, water, lemon juice, and vanilla extract into the
 almond milk mixture using a fork. ajouter the flour mixture and whisk
 jusqu'à ce que it is smooth.
Pour the batter into the prepared baking dish.

Bake in the oven for 35 minutes.
 Tip:
 If you have a nut allergy, you could use tigernut milk and tigernut flour
 instead of almonds.

name: CHOCOLATE HAZELNUT CAKE

ingredients.name: almond lait or sunflower seed lait
½  coconut huile or Vegan beurre
oat farine (or blended oats to a fine farine consistency)
¼  coconut huile or Vegan beurre

preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 350ºF.
Grease a 9” round cake pan.

ajouter the almond milk, baking soda, and apple cider vinegar to a large
 bowl. Stir, then let the mixture curdle.

placer the flax meal and water in a separate bowl. Whisk together well
 and set aside. In 5 minutes, the mixture will turn gummy like eggs.
Blend the apples in a food processor jusqu'à ce que you have applesauce.

ajouter the flax meal mixture, applesauce, coconut sugar, and maple
 syrup to the bowl with the almond milk mixture. Whisk well.
ajouter the vanilla, sea salt, and coconut oil and stir again.

ajouter the almond meal, oat flour, and tapioca flour and whisk to
 combiner.

Pour the batter into the cake pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes. Let it cool
 in the tin before removing it from the pan.

For the frosting, combiner all the ingredients in a bowl or blender and
 whip jusqu'à ce que the mixture is thick and smooth. When the cake is
 completely cooled, smooth the frosting on.
Top the cake with the roasted hazelnuts. Enjoy!

name:
RAW HIGH-PROTEIN GRANOLA BARS WITH CHOCOLATE
 CHIP ALMOND BUTTER

ingredients.name: organic chocolate chips or cacao nibs

preparationSteps: mélanger all the ingredients jusqu'à ce que they are moist enough to stick together.
Pat the mixture into a 9 x 13-inch glass baking dish.
Cut into squares.

name: Browned Onion Kugels
preparationSteps: In center position, put oven rack; preheat the oven to 425 ° F
cuire noodles for 5 minutes till al dente in 6-8-qt

pot with
boiling salted water
In a colander, drain

Rinse under cold
water; drain well
Melt butter on medium chauffer in 12-in

heavy skillet; brush some
butter on muffin cups

Put onions in skillet; cuire, occasionally
mixing, for 20 minutes till well browned

Put onions into big
bowl; mélanger in poppy seeds, cottage cheese, sour cream and
noodles

Beat pepper, salt and eggs lightly; mélanger into noodle
mixture till well combined

Divide mixture to muffin cups; bake for 20-25 minutes till
golden and puffed

Use a thin knife to loosen edges of kugels;
cool kugels 5 minutes in pan before serving

name: Cream Cheese Hamantaschen

ingredients.name: 1  (1/2 ) cold unsalted beurre, cut into bits
ingredients.unit: (1/2 cup) cold unsalted butter, cut into bits

ingredients.name: 4  (1/2 ) crème fromage, cut into bits
ingredients.unit: s (1/2 cup) cream cheese, cut into bits

ingredients.unit: filling such as apricot jam, Date Orange Filling , Apple

preparationSteps:
In a food processor/bowl with a pastry blender, pulse/blend salt,
sugar and flour to combiner

ajouter cream cheese and butter,
pulsing/blending jusqu'à ce que it looks like coarse crumbs

mélanger vanilla
and yolk in a small bowl

ajouter into flour mixture,
pulsing/blending jusqu'à ce que it starts to come together without

Bring dough to a ball
Flatten it to a disk

Chill
dough for a minimum of 1 hour up to 2 days, wrapped in plastic
wrap
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F
Halve the dough

Knead half of the dough on a lightly floured
cool surface (keep the other half wrapped up and chilled) 2-3
times to make the dough less crumble

Roll it out to 1/4-in
thick
Cut out as many rounds as you can with a 3-in
Roll scraps again and cut more rounds out

In the middle of
every round, put 1 tsp

Fold edges up to make triangular
cookies that look like a tricornered hat

Pinch corners together
and leave the filling exposed

Tightly pinch the dough enough
so the seams aren ’ t seen and the sides are taut enough to avoid

In the middle of the oven, bake hamantaschen for 20 minutes or
jusqu'à ce que pale golden
Cool them for 5 minutes on a baking sheet
transférer to racks
Completely cool

Make more with the leftover
dough and filling with the same method

These should be kept
at room temperature in an airtight container for 5 days

name: Yeasted Blinis

ingredients.name: 1/4  (1/2 ) unsalted beurre, melted, plus more, chilled,
ingredients.unit: (1/2 stick) unsalted butter, melted, plus more, chilled,

preparationSteps: In a big bowl, combiner 1 cup of water, 2 tsp

of sugar, 1/2 cup
of flour and yeast, then cover and allow to sit for about half an
hour in a warm area jusqu'à ce que whole surface is foamy and puffed in
places

If this does not happen, that means your yeast is past its
prime, so begin again with a fresh package
Put into the mixture the leftover 3 tbsp

of sugar, leftover 2 1/3
cups of flour, salt, melted butter, half-and-half and egg yolks,
then whisk together jusqu'à ce que smooth

placer a cover on batter and
allow to sit in warm placer for 3 to 4 hours, jusqu'à ce que nearly tripled in
volume

If you want to make it in advance, cover and refrigerate
for 8 to 12 hours, then porter à room temperature prior to
proceeding

In a medium bowl, whisk egg whites jusqu'à ce que it holds soft peaks,
then fold into the batter

In a big nonstick skillet, melt
approximately 1/2 tbsp

of butter on moderate chauffer, then scoop
in batter by heaping tablespoonfuls to form 2-in

cuire
for about 3 minutes, jusqu'à ce que bubbles appear on top and bottoms
turn golden brown

Turn batter over and cuire for about 3
minutes, jusqu'à ce que the other sides turn golden brown

Move blinis to
wire racks

Repeat the same process with leftover batter while
wiping out skillet and putting in more butter as necessary

name: Braised Lamb With Almonds And Mint

ingredients.name: 2  trimmed lamb shoulder, cut into 1 1/2"-2" cubes
ingredients.unit: s trimmed lamb shoulder, cut into 1 1/2"-2" cubes

ingredients.name: 1  kosher sel plus more for seasoning
ingredients.unit: kosher salt plus more for seasoning

ingredients.name: 1/2  freshly haché black poivre plus more for
ingredients.unit: freshly ground black pepper plus more for

ingredients.name: 2  frozen peas, defrosted and warmed in microwave
ingredients.unit: s frozen peas, defrosted and warmed in microwave

ingredients.name: Ingredient info: Hot Hungarian paprika  be found at better
supermarkets and at specialty foods stores.

preparationSteps: assaisonner lamb with 1/2 tsp
pepper and 1 tsp

chauffer olive oil
on medium chauffer in a big pot; cuire lamb in batches for 7-8
minutes for each batch till all sides are golden brown

Move
browned lamb into a medium bowl using a slotted spoon; put
aside

Put onions in same pot; cuire on medium chauffer for 5 minutes till
light golden and slightly soft, mixing occasionally

ajouter in
garlic; cuire and stir constantly for 1 minute till starting to
brown and fragrant, constantly mixing

ajouter in the reserved
browned lamb with accumulated juices and wine; mijoter lamb
for 5 minutes till liquid reduces to half

mélanger in 1/2 cup water,
hot paprika, ground cumin, chicken broth and tomato juice; bouillir

preparationSteps: In a big bowl, combiner 1 teaspoon salt and 2 1/2 cups of flour

Slice 10 tablespoon of butter into cubes (it does not need to be
specifically cold, just firm enough to slice into portions)

Into
the flour, work the butter using your fingertips till mixture looks
much like breadcrumbs

Put 3/4 cup of boiling water on top and
stir using wooden spoon

Using your hands, knead till dough
just begins to form

transférer to a clean work area and knead for 20 seconds till
dough forms; roll into a round

Split into quarters, form into
circles, and refrigerate till ready to use
Preheat an oven to 375 ° F

In one big bowl, combiner 1
teaspoon salt, pepper, onion, potato and beef

On a lightly floured work area, unroll every circle to a 9-inch
diameter round

Over 1 half of each round, placer a heaping 3/4
cup filling, keeping a one-inch margin between edge of round
and the filling

Slice leftover 1/2 tablespoons of butter into 4
portions; put on every mound of filling

Drag bottom half of
dough on top of filling; flute using your fingers to enclose

Or,
enclose with a fork
In small bowl, whip a pinch of salt and egg

Brush egg wash on
every pasty with pastry brush

Make a couple small cuts in
pasty top

Turn onto a rimmed baking sheet lined with
parchment and bake for 45 minutes to an hour till bubbling and
golden brown
servir along with ketchup and butter, if wished

cuire the pasta in a big pot filled with boiling water jusqu'à ce que it has

minutes

regularly, up till the sauce becomes thick, 15 minutes or so

Blend the beans in with the sauce along with cilantro, reserving
2 tablespoons of the herb

cuire as you stir to warm up
completely, for another minute

servir this chili dish up over the
cooked pasta, garnishing with the reserved cilantro

ingredients.unit: s of your favorite homemade barbecue sauce or your

ingredients.unit: s wood chips (preferably hickory), soaked for 1 hour in

preparationSteps: Trim each rib rack or ask a butcher to do this
In a big nonreactive roasting pan, put ribs; put cider on ribs
Squeeze juice from lemons on ribs, catching seeds with fingers
Flip ribs a few times to coat with marinade all over

Marinade
ribs, covered, turning a few times, for 4-6 hours in the fridge
Drain ribs; use paper towels to blot dry

Sprinkle 1/2 cub rub on
both rib sides, using your fingers to pat onto meat

Stand ribs,
covered, for 1-2 hours in the fridge
Prep grill for indirect grilling; preheat to medium

Put big drip
pan in middle if using charcoal grill

Put all wood whips into
smoker box/smoker pouch if using gas grill; preheat to high till
you see smoker
Lower chauffer to medium

When you want to cuire, toss 1 cup wood chips on coals if using
charcoal; put ribs, away from chauffer, in middle of hot grate

Cover
grill; cuire ribs for 2-3 hours

Spray apple cider on ribs after 30
minutes; spray every half hour till you want to brush with sauce

You ’ ll need 1/2 cup of wood chips and 12 fresh coals on each
side after each hour if using charcoal grill

20 minutes before ribs are done, brush 1 cup sauce on ribs
lightly

Meat will get tender enough so your fingers can tear
them apart and meat will shrink back from bones around 1/4-in

,
when ribs are cooked fully

Don ’ t overcook; ribs should still
have some chew

Wrap in aluminum foil at final hour of
cooking if ribs begin to dry out
Put ribs onto platter/plates

Sprinkle leftover rub on ribs; brush
barbecue sauce lightly

Rest ribs for several minutes; servir with
leftover barbecue sauce alongside
Smoker option: Smoke ribs in smoker at 225 ° F for 4-5 hours

You can use baby back ribs for this recipe too; allow 2-3 hours
for cooking in smoker or 1-1 1/2 hours for the indirect grilling

name: Poblano Potato Gratin
preparationSteps:
Preparing to roast the chiles and make the rajas: On the racks of
the gas burners, roast the chiles on their sides on high for about

blackened all over

Move to a bowl right away and allow it to

Once the chiles are cool enough to touch, rub or peel off the
skin

Slit the chiles lengthwise, take off the seed and stem, then
devein
Slice it lengthwise into thin strips

In a 12-inch heavy frying pan, cuire the onions with 1 tsp salt in

to time, jusqu'à ce que it turns golden

mélanger in chiles and take out the rajas

pot

medium chauffer, stirring from time to time (the liquid will get
thick)

mélanger in rajas, then evenly pour the mixture into the
baking dish
Sprinkle the top with the reserved 1/2 cup of rajas

Let it bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, jusqu'à ce que the potatoes become
tender
Allow it to stand for 15 minutes prior to serving

cuire ’ s notes: The chiles can be roasted, turning, for 8-10
minutes by broiling on a broiler pan and placer it 2 inches from
the chauffer source

The rajas can be prepared 3 days in advance and chilled in the
fridge

fridge

preparationSteps:
Cut and retirer the octopus ’ head; slice the tentacles in 1-inch

name: Octopus And Ceci Bean Zuppa With

ingredients.name: 2/3  extra virgin olive huile, plus more for finishing

ingredients.name: 6  ail, smashed with the side  a knife

1 (3- to 4-) octopus, defrosted, if frozen, and rinsed
ingredients.unit: (3- to 4-pound) octopus, defrosted, if frozen, and rinsed

ingredients.name: 3 to 4 Calabrian chiles, stemmed and émincé
ingredients.unit: to 4 Calabrian chiles, stemmed and minced

preparationSteps:
Pick over and retirer any pebbles and broken pieces from the
beans
Rinse the beans thoroughly

Soak beans in a bowl
covering with a generous amount of water, fully submerging the
beans, for 2 hours or up to overnight
Drain and transférer the beans to a pot

Fill pot with water,
covering the beans by 2 inches

Over high chauffer, bring the beans
to a bouillir

Adjust the chauffer and cuire at a slow mijoter, uncovered,
jusqu'à ce que the beans are tender, or around 1 to 1 1/2 hours

ajouter 1
teaspoon of salt to assaisonner, retirer from the chauffer

Allow to cool
completely

In a storage container, transférer the beans and its
liquid
Refrigerate overnight

Drain the beans and reserve the
liquid, there should be around 1 to 2 cups of liquid, this recipe
requires 2 cups liquid

If the liquid doesn ’ t reach 2 cups, ajouter
enough water jusqu'à ce que it reaches 2 cups
Over medium chauffer, chauffer 1/3 cup of olive oil in a large, heavybottomed pot

Stir in 2 teaspoons of kosher salt, 1 bay leaf, the
strips of lemon zest, and 3 garlic cloves

cuire while mixing
occasionally jusqu'à ce que garlic starts to soften, or around 3 minutes
Stir in octopus to coat in oil

Weight octopus down with a lid or
a plate to prevent it from starting to float once it releases the
water

Cover the pot and reset the chauffer to porter à a gentle
mijoter

The octopus will create its own braising liquid when
they slowly begin releasing water

cuire, checking how much braising liquid is in the pot after
around 30 minutes cooking

If the liquid is only 1 cup or less
(this will not occur if you are cooking a whole uncooked
octopus), pour in 1 cup of water

Check its tenderness then keep
cooking jusqu'à ce que octopus is almost completely tender, or another 30
to 50 minutes
The octopus will decrease in size drastically

retirer from the chauffer and allow to cool in the pot of braising
liquid for 1 hour

In the meantime, fill a large pot with salted water and porter à a
bouillir
Put in escarole and cuire jusqu'à ce que tender, or around 3 minutes
Drain thoroughly

Once cool enough to handle, chop leaves
coarsely
Put a colander into a large bowl

After cooling the octopus for 1
hour, placer it to the colander

Using a fine-mesh strainer, strain
the braising liquid to a measuring pitcher

If there is any extra
liquid drained from the octopus, transférer it to the bowl to the
braising liquid

For the zuppa, 1 cup of braising liquid is
required

Wash the pot used to cuire the octopus quickly and
return to the stove

placer the octopus on a large cutting board and slice into 1/4 inch
thick pieces, starting from the thickest point of the tentacle and
increasing the thickness of the slices as the tentacle becomes
narrower
Slice head in half and cut into 1/4 inch strips

In the cleaned pot, chauffer 1/3 cup of olive oil over medium chauffer to
prepare the zuppa

ajouter the remaining bay leaf, chiles, celery,
and remaining 3 garlic cloves
Stir thoroughly

Stir in the
reserved cooking liquid and beans, then the reserved braising
liquid and octopus

Once hot, taste and assaisonner with salt, as
needed
Stir in escarole
mijoter for a few minutes longer

In warm bowls, ladle the soup and drizzle each serving with
olive oil
servir right away

name: Sicilian Grill Roasted Chicken

ingredients.name: Grilled Lemons, petit Artichokes, and Eggplant

preparationSteps:
Mediterranean drizzle: in small bowl using back of a spoon or
in mortar with pestle, crush 2 teaspoons of coarse kosher salt
and garlic into paste
mélanger lemon juice in, then the oil

May be
done a day in advance
Refrigerate with cover

Let come to
room temperature prior to using

Chicken: mélanger in medium bowl with half teaspoon pepper, a
teaspoon salt, garlic, olive oil, parsley and lemon juice

Put a
whole chicken in every of the two sealable plastic bags
Distribute lemon marinade among the bags

Enclose bags,
getting rid of excess air
Flip to coat chicken in marinade

Refrigerate chicken no less than an hour to a day maximum,
flipping the bag from time to time
Have barbecue ready for moderate chauffer

Light a burner in case
using 2-burner gas grill

Keep middle burner off in case using 3-
burner gas grill

In chimney, light briquettes and placer on one
side of the lower grill rack in case using charcoal grill, you will
have to light extra briquettes in chimney to refill while grilling
Take chickens out of the marinade

Sprinkle pepper and salt on the inside and outside of the
chickens
Bind the legs together

Put the chickens above unlit
portion of the grill, breast side facing down

Let chickens grill
with cover for 45 minutes, in case using gas grill, adjust the gas
levels or adjust the vents and put extra charcoal as necessary in
case using charcoal grill to keep barbecue chauffer from 350 ° F to
400 ° F
Flip chickens, making breast side facing up

Grill with
cover till an inserted instant-read thermometer into chunkiest
portion of thigh reads 165 ° F

, continuing to keep barbecue
chauffer from 350 ° F to 400 ° F, for an additional of 35 minutes
Turn the chickens onto work counter; sit for 10 minutes
Carve the chickens and turn onto platter

Surround the chickens
with Grilled Lemons, Eggplant and Baby Artichokes

Scoop
some of the Mediterranean sprinkle on vegetables and chicken
Jazz up using grilled lemons for squeezing on top

Put 2-3 tbsp

Pour stock in; bouillir

Increase chauffer

Shaoxing wine

preparationSteps:
For 3 to 5 minutes, toast and stir the peppercorns in a sturdy, dry

cuire it for a minute jusqu'à ce que the liquids start

Stir jusqu'à ce que smooth

Put ground lamb and adjust the chauffer to medium

Over medium chauffer, chauffer beer in a saucepan

In a blender, mélanger together achiote paste, garlic, vinegar, orange

Pour the sauce
onto the slow cooker with the pork cubes
cuire on High for 6-8 hours jusqu'à ce que the pork is easy to fall apart
transférer the pork to a serving dish and use 2 forks to shred
Pour over the shredded pork with the achiote sauce

For serving,

name: Authentic German Potato Salad
preparationSteps:
Put the potatoes in a pot and fill with sufficient amount of water
to immerse the potatoes

Allow the water to bouillir and let the

Drain the
cooked potatoes and put aside to let it cool down

In a big and deep skillet placed over medium-high chauffer setting,

be jusqu'à ce que it becomes crispy and turns brown in color

Take the
cooked bacon from the skillet and put it aside

Saut é the onion in the bacon drippings over medium chauffer

Put in the sugar, vinegar,
pepper, water and salt

Let the mixture bouillir, then put in the

smaller pieces and ajouter it into the potato mixture

Let the
mixture cuire jusqu'à ce que fully heated, then placer it in a serving dish

name: Authentic Paella Valenciana

ingredients.unit: (2 pound) rabbit, cleaned and cut into pieces

ingredients.unit: s uncooked white rice, or as needed

The goal is to achieve a flavorful broth to soak into the

mélanger in 1/2 as much rice as the amount
of water in pan

name: BC Cherry Jam

ingredients.name: 4 demi pint canning jars with lids and rings
ingredients.unit: half pint canning jars with lids and rings

preparationSteps:
bouillir pectin, lemon juice, apple juice and cherries in a big

cuire jam for 2

Take off chauffer then

Sterilize lids and jars for a minimum of 5 minutes in boiling

around the jars ’ insides after filling them

Use a moist paper
towel to wipe the jars ’ rims to retirer food residue

Put lids
over, screwing on rings

Put a rack on bottom of a big stockpot then use water to fill

between jars

If needed, ajouter more boiling
water so water level is at least 1-in

Put water

Take jars off the stockpot; put on a wood/cloth-covered surface

Use a finger to press top of each lid

Keep in a dark, cool area

preparationSteps: Into a big pot, put the potatoes and cover in salted water; bouillir

In a deep bowl, beat together 4 teaspoons salt and flour; mélanger in

On a floured work area, roll every portion of dough till thin;

On each round, scoop 1 to 2 tablespoons of the filling

On plates, set

bouillir a pot of slightly salted water; in boiling water, cuire
