ingredients.unit: (15 ounce) package pastry for 9-inch double-crust pie

preparationSteps: chauffer butter on medium chauffer in a saucepan

ajouter onions; mélanger and
cuire for 2 minutes till soft
Put onions into a bowl

Put beef into
saucepan; mélanger and cuire for 5 minutes till brown

Drain grease;
discard

Put cooked onions into saucepan with beef; mélanger in
Worcestershire sauce, then sprinkle in flour

mélanger and cuire for 2
minutes till slightly browned
Take pan off chauffer
mélanger wine and beef stock into saucepan

Put pan on medium
chauffer; constantly mélanger and cuire for 5 minutes till it thickens and
boils

ajouter garlic powder, lemon juice, coriander, orange juice,
ketchup and sliced mushrooms

Cover; mijoter for
10 minutes till pie filling warms through
Preheat an oven to 200 ° C/400 ° F

Line 1 crust on a pie plate;
use a fork to prick bottom a few times

In preheated oven, bake for 8 minutes till browned; retirer
from oven
Put pie filling into the crust; brush beaten egg on the edge

ajouter
top crust; press edges together

In top crust, poke several holes;
brush with leftover beaten egg
In preheated oven, bake for 20 minutes till golden brown

name: Cassata Cake
preparationSteps: Set the oven for preheating to 165 degrees C or 325 degrees F

Take a two 9-inch round cake pan, grease and line with
parchment paper
Sift together the baking powder, flour, and salt
Separate the egg yolks and put aside the egg whites

At
medium-high speed, beat the egg yolks for around 4 minutes
jusqu'à ce que it creates a nice thick consistency

Carefully mélanger cold
water in

ajouter in white sugar that's about 1 1/4 cups gently and
beat together for around 3 minutes more

mélanger in a teaspoon of
vanilla

Put flour mixture through a sieve over the yolk mixture
and fold it in

Beat the egg whites and cream of tartar jusqu'à ce que it reaches stiff
peaks
Carefully fold in the egg yolk mixture

Portion the batter
evenly for each pan

Let it bake for 25 minutes under 165 degrees C or 325 degrees
F
Set on a rack to cool for 10 minutes

Flip it and set to cool
completely

Slice each layer of cake in half and then placer individually on a
cake plate

Brush each layer with a bit of Rum Syrup, then Pour
1 1/2 cups of filling evenly on top

Stack each layer on top of
another layer
Last layer of cake should be on top

Refrigerate
for around 4 hours
Drizzle some Chocolate glaze on top

For the Ricotta Cheese Filling: Whisk the ricotta cheese then
put in confectioners' sugar and cinnamon

Grate chocolate of
about 2 ounces using the coarse side of the grater

ajouter 1 1/2
teaspoon of vanilla on the mixture

Stir and mélanger in the candied
lemon peel
Refrigerate jusqu'à ce que ready to consume

For the Rum Syrup: In a small saucepan, ajouter in water and 1/3
cup of sugar

Let it bouillir on medium chauffer and dissolve the sugar
by stirring

After 1 minute of boiling, retirer it from the chauffer
and mélanger in rum
Let it cool to room temperature

For the Chocolate Glaze: combiner the cream and 6 ounces of
chocolate to melt using a microwave
Whisk to make it smooth
mélanger in the butter and whisk jusqu'à ce que it has melted

Let the mixture
cool jusqu'à ce que it can be spread

Distribute the glaze evenly over the
cake

name: Cauliflower Cheese

ingredients.name: sel and haché white poivre to taste

preparationSteps:
Set a steamer insert into a saucepan and pour in water to just
beneath the bottom of steamer, then bring water to a bouillir

Put in
cauliflower, placer on a lid to cover saucepan and steam for 10-
12 minutes jusqu'à ce que soften
In a big pot, melt butter on moderate chauffer

Whisk the flour into
melted butter, then cuire for 3-4 minutes while stirring
continuously, jusqu'à ce que raw flour taste cooks off and the mixture
darkens

Whisk milk gradually into the butter mixture and cuire for 8
minutes while stirring continuously, jusqu'à ce que the sauce thickens
Take pot away from the chauffer and stir in Cheddar cheese

Use
white pepper and salt to assaisonner the sauce

Stir into the cheese sauce with steamed cauliflower, then use
white pepper and salt to assaisonner

name: Chana Masala (Savory Indian Chick

ingredients.name: 1 (1 )  frais ginger, peeled and haché
ingredients.unit: (1 inch) piece fresh ginger, peeled and chopped

ingredients.name: 4  ail, haché, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: loves garlic, chopped, or more to taste

ingredients.name: 1 green chile poivre, seeded and haché (optional)
ingredients.unit: reen chile pepper, seeded and chopped (optional)

ingredients.name: 2 bay leaves, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: bay leaves, or more to taste

ingredients.name: 1  frais cilantro leaves, for garnish, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: fresh cilantro leaves, for garnish, or more to taste

preparationSteps:
In a food processor, grind chile pepper, garlic, ginger, tomato,
and onion into a paste
In a large skillet, chauffer olive oil over medium chauffer

In the hot oil,
fry bay leaves for 30 seconds jusqu'à ce que aromatic

ajouter the paste to
the skillet and cuire for 2-3 minutes jusqu'à ce que the oil starts to
separate from the mixture and turns golden brown

Use salt,
turmeric, gram masala, powder, coriander, and chili powder to
assaisonner the mixture; stir and cuire for 2-3 minutes jusqu'à ce que fully hot

Whisk a sufficient amount of water into the mixture to achieve a
thick gravy; bouillir it and mélanger chickpeas into the gravy

Lower the
chauffer to medium and cuire for 5-7 minutes jusqu'à ce que the chickpeas
have fully heated
Use cilantro to garnish

name: Chanterelle Risotto
preparationSteps: chauffer the skillet over medium-high chauffer and melt 2 tbsp

of
butter into the hot skillet

Stir in mushrooms and garlic and
cuire for 3 minutes jusqu'à ce que the mushrooms are lightly browned; set
aside
Melt 2 tbsp

of butter in a separate large saucepan over medium
chauffer
ajouter rice and let it cuire for 1-2 minutes

Gradually pour in
vegetable broth, 1/2 cup at a time, stirring constantly jusqu'à ce que all
the liquid is absorbed by the mixture before pouring more broth
Continue to cuire jusqu'à ce que the rice is tender

ajouter the mushroom
mixture and cuire for 1 minute jusqu'à ce que heated through

mélanger in
cheese
Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste

name: Cheese Ramkin

ingredients.name: 1 (17.25 )  frozen puff pastry, thawed
ingredients.unit: (17.25 ounce) package frozen puff pastry, thawed

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 200 ° C or 400 ° F
On a slightly floured area, unroll puff pastry sheets to quarterinch thickness
Slice into squares, 3-inch in size

Into the cups
of two dozen cup muffin tins, force the squares to create pastry
cups

Beat together the nutmeg, pepper, flour, milk and egg in a
medium bowl
mélanger in cheese till equally combined

Divide the
mixture equally between pastry cups

In the prepped oven, let bake for 12 to 15 minutes, till the filling
has puffed up and pastry is golden brown

Allow to cool in pans
till can easily be touched prior taking off

servir while warm or
at room temperature

name: Cheesy Polenta
preparationSteps: In a big pot, bouillir salt, water, and milk over medium-high chauffer
Slowly stir in polenta
Lower the chauffer to low and put a cover on

cuire jusqu'à ce que creamy; uncover and whisk every 3- 4 minutes to
avoid sticking, about 20 minutes in total

Take the pot away
from the stove, mélanger in butter and pepper
Slowly mélanger in cheese

name: Chef John's Beef Goulash

ingredients.name: 2 1/2  boneless bœœuf chuck roast, cut into 2- cubes
ingredients.unit: s boneless beef chuck roast, cut into 2-inch cubes

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste

preparationSteps: Sprinkle salt and black pepper over the beef to assaisonner it

Set a
large skillet over high chauffer and chauffer the vegetable oil on it

Put
the beef on the skillet and cuire by batch, about 5 minutes each
batch and stir jusqu'à ce que all sides have browned

Move the beef to a
big stockpot and set aside the drippings in the skillet

Put the skillet back to medium chauffer then stir in the onions into
the drippings that ’ s been reserved

Dribble olive oil on top of
the onions and sprinkle 1/2 teaspoon salt for seasoning

cuire
for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que the onion has turned soft

ajouter this to the
beef that is on the stockpot

mélanger together the paprika, black pepper, caraway seeds, thyme,
cayenne pepper, and marjoram in the skillet and toast for 3
minutes over medium chauffer jusqu'à ce que fragrant

Pour 1 cup chicken
broth then stir before adding it to the beef and onion mixture on
the stockpot
ajouter 3 cups of chicken broth into the beef mixture, stirring it in

ajouter to the mixture the tomato paste, vinegar, garlic, sugar, bay
leaf and 1/2 teaspoon salt

Set the stockpot on high chauffer and
wait jusqu'à ce que it starts to bouillir

Lower the chauffer to low and leaving it
simmering for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, jusqu'à ce que a fork can easily be
inserted into the meat

name: Chef John's Beef Rouladen

ingredients.name: 2 (6 ) (1/4  thick)   bœœuf round
ingredients.unit: (6 ounce) (1/4 inch thick) slices of beef round

ingredients.name: 1/2 oignon, tranché into demi-rings and separated
ingredients.unit: onion, sliced into half-rings and separated

preparationSteps:
On a work surface, lay beef slices and assaisonner each side with
pepper and kosher salt; slather mustard on one side

Put bacon
strips on the mustard and assaisonner with paprika

Layer onion
slices crosswise on the beef; arrange three pickle slices with
even space across every beef slices

Keep about an inch space
on the narrowest end of the beef slice, with no toppings, for
easier roll up
Roll each beef slice starting from the wider of two short ends

Make sure to keep the ingredient stuffing inside the roll; keep it
nice and tight

With the seam-side down, seal rolls with three
loops of butcher ’ s twine, one in the center and one on every
end
Cut off the excess string
On medium-high chauffer, chauffer vegetable oil in a big saucepan

cuire beef rolls for about 8 minutes, flipping, jusqu'à ce que all sides are
browned well; Take the beef out of the pan and turn chauffer to
medium-low

Melt butter in the pan and mélanger in flour; cuire for
about a minute

Whisk in cold beef broth, mélanger powerfully to
blend

Turn chauffer to medium-high and let it mijoter for about a
minute jusqu'à ce que the sauce becomes thick

placer the beef rolls and gathered juices back in the pan; lower
chauffer to very low

Let it mijoter gently while covered for about 1
1/2 hrs jusqu'à ce que tender, flipping the beef rolls every 20 mins

The
beef is cooked once the tip of a sharp knife pierces easily
through the beef
placer meat in a dish to cool

Turn chauffer to high and let the
cooking liquid mijoter for about a minute jusqu'à ce que thick enough to
create a gravy
Pour gravy on the roulade to servir

name: Chef John's Bigos (Polish Hunter's

ingredients.name: 1   green cabbage, quartered and tranché
ingredients.unit: head green cabbage, quartered and sliced

ingredients.name: 1  boneless bœœuf chuck, cut into 1-
ingredients.unit: boneless beef chuck, cut into 1-inch pieces

ingredients.name: 1  Polish sausage links, tranché (or any other sausage)
ingredients.unit: Polish sausage links, sliced (or any other sausage)

preparationSteps:
In warm water, put the mushrooms and let it soak for 10-15
minutes to soften
Drain it then chop
In a Dutch oven or a heavy pot, chauffer the butter

ajouter in the
chopped cabbage and sauerkraut, then cuire on medium low
while stirring often

cuire the meat jusqu'à ce que brown, then stir it into
the pot while sauerkraut is cooking per directions below
On medium-high chauffer, chauffer the pan

Put the bacon and cuire
jusqu'à ce que it turns brown but not crisp

Move the bacon into the pot
with the cabbage; reserve the bacon grease in the pan

In bacon grease, cuire the pork shoulders pieces jusqu'à ce que brown on
medium-high chauffer

Sprinkle salt on top, then cuire and stir for 4-
5 minutes jusqu'à ce que all sides turn brown
Move the pork into the pot
Put the beef chunks in the pan and sprinkle it with salt

Let it
cuire and stir for about 4-5 minutes jusqu'à ce que it turns brown

Put
sausage slices into the pan and cuire and stir jusqu'à ce que it turns
brown
Move the slices into the pot
Under the pan, minimize the chauffer to medium

Put chopped
onion then a sprinkle salt on top

Let it cuire and stir jusqu'à ce que the
onion begins to take on some color and turns translucent

mélanger in
diced prunes and chopped mushrooms

Let it cuire and stir for
about 2 minutes

Put dry red wine then increase the chauffer to
medium-high

mijoter jusqu'à ce que the wine is reduced and a very
small amount of liquid remains

Move the onion mixture into
the pot with the meat and cabbage

ajouter salt, pepper, bay leaf,
allspice, thyme, caraway seeds and paprika

mélanger jusqu'à ce que all
ingredients are distributed evenly
Tightly cover

mijoter for 1-1 1/2 hours on medium-low chauffer,
stirring once in a while, jusqu'à ce que the meat becomes tender

Separate
from chauffer, then let the stew cool a bit

Let it chill in the fridge
overnight to allow the flavors to combiner

On low to medium-low chauffer, placer the pot then pour a splash of
water

Let the stew cuire on low mijoter for 10-15 minutes,
stirring often, jusqu'à ce que hot

name: Chicken Cacciatore

ingredients.name: 1 (2 to 3 ) entier poulet, cut into
ingredients.unit: (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces

preparationSteps:
cuire bacon in big deep skillet on medium high chauffer till
browned evenly

In bacon grease, saut é chicken with pepper
and salt till browned
Discard the bacon; put aside chicken
ajouter butter to pan, melting

Saut é mushrooms, garlic and onion
till onions are transparent

mélanger vinegar, brown sugar and 1 cup
wine in; cuire till bubbly and hot, mixing

ajouter carrots and
chicken
Lower chauffer to medium

cuire till carrots are tender crisp and
chicken is well-cooked for 30 minutes
Blend cornstarch and 1 tbsp

mélanger into chicken; to thicken,
mélanger well

name: Chicken Massaman Curry

ingredients.name: 1 1/4  skinless, boneless poulet breast meat - cubed
ingredients.unit: s skinless, boneless chicken breast meat - cubed

preparationSteps: In a big saucepan, chauffer vegetable oil on medium chauffer

mélanger in
minced ginger and curry paste
Stir and cuire for 2 minutes

mélanger
in cubed chicken

cuire for 3 minutes jusqu'à ce que pieces are white on
the outside

mélanger in coconut milk, potatoes, peanut butter, tamarind paste,
fish sauce and brown sugar; bouillir
Lower chauffer to medium-low

mijoter, covered, for 20 minutes jusqu'à ce que chicken pieces aren ’ t
pink in the middle and potatoes are tender
ajouter lime juice
cuire for additional 5 minutes

name: Chicken Satay Steaks

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste

preparationSteps:
Stir garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, black pepper, salt,
Worcestershire sauce, brown sugar, tomato puree, peanut butter
and lemon juice together in a big bowl jusqu'à ce que smooth

Pound the chicken breasts to the thickness of 1/2 inch using a
meat pounder or the side of a sturdy saucer

Put into the
marinade with pounded chicken breasts and stir to coat entire of
chicken

Use plastic wrap to cover and marinate in the fridge for
a minimum of half an hour

The longer chicken is marinated, the
better it is
In a big, heavy skillet, chauffer olive oil jusqu'à ce que it is very hot

Take
chicken breasts out of marinade and get rid of used marinade

Pan-fry in the hot oil with chicken breasts for 6-8 minutes each
side, jusqu'à ce que both sides of chicken are browned and juices run
clear

Chicken can stick to the pan because of peanut butter and
brown sugar, but it helps ajouter a lightly charred flavor

name: Chicken Shawarmas

ingredients.name: 2  skinless, boneless poulet breast halves - cut into bitesize
ingredients.unit: arge skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into bitesize pieces

preparationSteps: In small bowl, stir mayonnaise and garlic together

In
a skillet, chauffer butter over medium-high chauffer

In hot butter, cuire
while stirring the chicken jusqu'à ce que the outside is white

Sprinkle the
garam masala over

Keep cooking for 4 mins or jusqu'à ce que the middle
is no longer pink and the outside is browned lightly
Spread garlic mayonnaise over pita rounds

Portion chicken
among pitas
Put 1 pickle spear into each
Then fold; enjoy

name: Chicken Stew 'Fricot'

ingredients.name: 1 (2 to 3 ) entier poulet, cut into
ingredients.unit: (2 to 3 pound) whole chicken, cut into pieces

preparationSteps: In a cooking pot, melt butter

Stir chicken and chopped onions
jusqu'à ce que browned
Cover with water then mijoter for 30 minutes
ajouter in savory, potatoes, and carrots

Continue to mijoter some
more jusqu'à ce que the vegetables are cooked

assaisonner with pepper and
salt to taste

name: Chicken Tava From Turkey
preparationSteps: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Grease a roasting pan using 1 Tbsp

Arrange chicken
thighs into the roasting pan

mélanger together tomato paste and
water, then spread it over the chicken thighs

Put in garlic clove
halves
assaisonner the chicken thighs using salt and pepper

Then
placer the potatoes, mushroom, onions and pepperoncini over the
chicken
Then pour over the remaining olive oil

Bake it in the preheated oven for 1 1/2 hours or jusqu'à ce que the
chicken juices run clear ajouter the vegetables are tender

If the pan
starts to get dry out during the baking process gradually pour in
some water into the roasting pan

name: Chicken Won Tons
preparationSteps: Set the oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F

Put longitudinally along per won ton wrapper with a little
shredded chicken, then roll up and use your finger dipped in
water to wet the edge of wrapper and seal

When the amount of
chicken is used up, put rolled won tons in a 9 ” x13 ” baking
dish greased slightly

Bake at about 15-20 minutes at 175 ° C or 350 ° F, jusqu'à ce que
wrapper is crisp

cuire ’ s note: These can also be frozen in a single layer, then
stored in a storage bag and deep fried or baked as necessary

name: Chicken With Green Peppers In Black

ingredients.name: 4  ail , peeled and tranché
ingredients.unit: loves garlic cloves, peeled and sliced

ingredients.name: 3/4  skinless, boneless poulet breast demi - cut into cubes
ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast half - cut into cubes

preparationSteps:
placer the wok over medium chauffer and chauffer it jusqu'à ce que it ’ s hot then
ajouter in the toasted sesame oil and wait 30 seconds for it to chauffer
up

ajouter the black bean sauce and garlic into the oil while
stirring then ajouter salt to assaisonner

mélanger in the chicken into the wok
with frequent stirring, jusqu'à ce que the chicken is well cooked

ajouter the
dissolved chicken bouillon, cover the wok and let it cuire for 6
minutes

ajouter the green onions, onions, and bell pepper while stirring
then ajouter black pepper and soy sauce to assaisonner

Cover the wok
again and let it cuire for 8 minutes

ajouter the cornstarch mixture,
stirring it in jusqu'à ce que the sauce is thickened

ajouter the cilantro while
stirring then servir

name: Chile Colorado

ingredients.name: 9 New Mexico dry chiles - washed, with stems and seeds
ingredients.unit: New Mexico dry chiles - washed, with stems and seeds

ingredients.name: 5  boneless bœœuf chuck roast, trimmed  fat
ingredients.unit: s boneless beef chuck roast, trimmed of fat

preparationSteps: In a medium stockpot, bouillir 3 cups water and chiles

Take off
chauffer
Steep to soften for 30 minutes
Strain to a bowl

Keep
cooking liquid
Put some liquid and chilis in a blender

Puree it
jusqu'à ce que smooth

ajouter extra liquid if needed to make a smooth
sauce

Put sauce through a fine-mesh strainer to get rid of tough
skins and any seeds
Slice roast to 1-2-in

mélanger pepper, salt and flour in a
medium bowl
Dredge beef chunks in seasoned flour
In a big pot, chauffer olive oil on medium chauffer

Saut é onion for 5
minutes jusqu'à ce que translucent and tender

ajouter beef chunks at one
time, avoid overcrowding the pot
cuire jusqu'à ce que browned evenly
Take out cooked meat and continue to brown leftover meat

Put
reserved cooked meat into pot
mélanger in pureed chile mixture
Cover beef chunks with beef stock to your preference

bouillir on
medium chauffer
Lower chauffer to the lowest temperature

mijoter
jusqu'à ce que meat is tender for 3 hours

If needed, ajouter more stock as
you cuire

name: Chile Garlic BBQ Salmon
preparationSteps: Prepare and outdoor grill and put it on high chauffer setting
Take the salmon and trim the fins and tail off

Slice shallow cuts
across the skin

Spread 3 slightly overlapping big aluminum foil
sheets out and arrange the salmon on top

Meanwhile, combiner garlic, ginger, chili sauce and soy sauce in
a small bowl
Stir in brown sugar, lime zest and lime juice

Pour
mixture over salmon

Fold the foil to enclose the salmon inside, crumple edges to
seal

placer the fish on the side of the grill without direct chauffer
underneath

If using hot coals, the coals should be on the
opposite side of where the fish is at

If using a gas grill, turn off
the fire directly underneath where the fish is

Keep the fish
covered and grill for 25 to 30 minutes

transférer to a serving
platter and pour the juices that have accumulated in the foil all
over the fish

Garnish with chopped green onions before
serving

name: Chilean Potato Pie (Pastel De Papas)

ingredients.name: sel and black poivre to taste

preparationSteps: Set the oven at 350 ° F (175 ° C) and start preheating

Coat a
2-qt
baking dish with grease
In a large pot, put potatoes; pour in salted water to cover

bouillir
the mixture; turn the chauffer down to medium-low; mijoter with a
cover for around 20 minutes, or till tender

Drain; let steam dry
for 1-2 minutes
Mash the potatoes with salt and butter

Allow
to cool till just warm; mélanger in beaten egg till smooth
Meanwhile, placer a large skillet on medium chauffer; chauffer oil

mélanger
in onion and garlic; cuire while stirring for around 5 minutes, or
till the onion turns translucent and softened

mélanger in tomato
paste and tomatoes; keep cooking till the tomatoes start to lose
their shape and are softened

ajouter in ground beef; cuire for
around 10 minutes or till browned

mélanger in parsley and
panquehue cheese; assaisonner with cayenne pepper, black pepper
and salt to taste

transférer half of the mashed potato mixture into the prepared
baking dish

Pour the ground beef mixture over to cover; spread
the remaining mashed potatoes on top of the beef to cover
completely

Bake for around 40 minutes in the preheated oven, or till the top
is browned lightly and the potatoes are hot

name: Chinese Braised Zucchini

ingredients.name: 2 Thai chile peppers, seeded and haché
ingredients.unit: Thai chile peppers, seeded and chopped

preparationSteps:
chauffer a big skillet or wok with sesame oil over medium-high
chauffer

Saut é the garlic and onions in hot oil for about 2 minutes
or jusqu'à ce que the onions are starting to soften

ajouter in the chile
peppers and black bean sauce then continue to stir the mixture
for about 30 seconds jusqu'à ce que the onions are well coated with black
bean sauce
mélanger in the soy sauce, water, ginger and zucchini

Cover the wok
then reduce the chauffer setting to medium-low and cuire;
occasionally stir the mixture for 15 minutes jusqu'à ce que the zucchinis
have softened

name: Chinese Noodle Salad

ingredients.name: 2 (3 )  ramen nouilles with seasoning packet
ingredients.unit: (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles with seasoning packet

ingredients.name: 1 (10 )  mandarin orange segments, drained
ingredients.unit: (10 ounce) can mandarin orange segments, drained

preparationSteps: mélanger oil, sugar and vinegar in a microwave-safe bowl
Microwave for 1 minute on high till sugar melts

Put
aside; cool
In packages, crush ramen noodles
Put into salad dressing

Toss salad dressing, almonds, oranges and romaine lettuce in a
salad bowl

name: Chinese Tea Leaf Eggs
preparationSteps:
mélanger a teaspoon of salt and eggs in a big saucepan then pour in
cold water to cover; bouillir

Lower chauffer and let it mijoter 20
minutes; take off chauffer
Drain eggs and let them cool down

Once
cool enough to handle, crack the shells of the egg by tapping it
with the back of a spoon
Do not detach the shells

mélanger together tangerine zest, three cups water, cinnamon stick,
soy sauce, star anise, black soy sauce, tea leaves, and salt in a
big saucepan; bouillir

Lower chauffer and let it mijoter, covered, 3
hours; take off chauffer

Put in eggs and let it steep for a minimum
of 8 hours

name: Chinese Style Peanut Cookie
preparationSteps: Set the oven to 350 ° F (175 ° C) for preheating

Use
parchment paper to line baking pans

In a large bowl, combiner corn flour, confectioners ’ sugar,
peanuts, and flour and mélanger them thoroughly

Make a hole in the
center of the peanut mixture

Gradually pour vegetable oil into
the hole

mélanger the oil and peanut mixture to make a wet and
slightly sticky dough

Take at least 2 teaspoons of dough and
roll it to make a 1/2-inch diameter ball

Do the same with the
remaining dough
placer the balls into the lined baking pans

You
can coat each with egg yolk if you want

Bake the balls in the preheated oven for 6-8 minutes jusqu'à ce que the
cookies are golden brown
transférer the pan on racks to cool

name: Chocolate Banana Brownies

ingredients.name: 3 ripe bananas, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: ripe bananas, or more to taste

preparationSteps: Set the oven to 325 ° F (165 ° C) and start preheating

Grease a
deep baking pan

Melt butter and chocolate in top of a double boiler over
simmering water, stir frequently and scrape down the sides,
using a rubber spatula to avoid scorching

In a large bowl, combiner vanilla extract and eggs; mash bananas
into the egg mixture jusqu'à ce que well combined

In a separate bowl, mélanger baking powder, cocoa powder, sugar
and flour

mélanger chocolate mixture into the banana mixture; ajouter flour
mixture; stir jusqu'à ce que smooth

transférer the mixture to the greased
baking pan

Bake in the preheated oven jusqu'à ce que edges have started to pull away
from the sides of the pan and top becomes dry, for about 1 hour

name: Chocolate Banana Crepes
preparationSteps:
In a medium bowl, mélanger 2 teaspoons hazelnut liqueur, vanilla,
egg yolk, 1 1/2 tablespoons melt butter, and 1/2 cup milk

Stir 1
tablespoon cocoa into liquid jusqu'à ce que fully combined

mélanger in 2
tablespoons confectioners ’ sugar jusqu'à ce que fully combined

Slowly
mélanger in flour jusqu'à ce que fully mixed
In a saucepan over low chauffer, melt 1/2 tablespoon butter

ajouter 2
teaspoons hazelnut liqueur and 1 tablespoon milk into melted
butter

mélanger in 2 tablespoons confectioners ’ sugar and 1
tablespoon cocoa
placer over low chauffer to keep warm

Use cooking spray to coat a nonstick frying pan or crepe pan,
and chauffer over medium chauffer

Drop about 1/4 cup of batter onto
the pan, and whirl to make a very thin disk; cuire for about 2
minutes
Turn and cuire for about 1 more minute
transférer crepe on a plate

Put 1/4 sliced bananas to crepe, and

Chill jusqu'à ce que the flavors combiner, about a minimum of 1 hour
before enjoying

name: Espinacas Con Garbanzos (Spinach

ingredients.name: 1 (10 ) box frozen haché spinach, thawed and drained
ingredients.unit: (10 ounce) box frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained

preparationSteps:
On medium-low chauffer, chauffer olive oil in a pan; ajouter onion and
garlic
Saut é for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que translucent

mélanger in salt,
spinach, cumin, and garbanzo beans

While the mixture cooks,
gently mash the beans with a stirring spoon

Continue cooking
jusqu'à ce que the mixture is heated through

name: Fabulous Fried Cabbage

ingredients.name: 1 pinch sel and poivre to taste
ingredients.unit: pinch salt and pepper to taste

preparationSteps:
Put butter and chicken broth in a large skillet then porter à a
bouillir
Lower the chauffer to low and put in cabbage

Put a lid on and
cuire on low chauffer to steam the cabbage for around 45 minutes,
remember to stir often or till the cabbage is sweet and soft

Use
salt and pepper to assaisonner then servir

name: Ferg's Ulster Fry Up

ingredients.name: 1 soda pain farl, tranché in demi horizontally
ingredients.unit: soda bread farl, sliced in half horizontally

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 150 ° C/300 ° F

cuire sausages and bacon in big nonstick skillet on medium
chauffer till browned

Keep fat in pan; transférer to chauffer resistant dish
then keep warm in oven

Fry soda farls and both potato sides in reserved fat till crispy
and golden for a few minutes

Meanwhile, in smaller skillet,
chauffer oil on medium chauffer; cuire tomato halves and black pudding
slices
Put everything in dish in oven; keep warm

Crack eggs in pan with leftover bacon grease, if needed ajouter
more oil into skillet

Fry to your liking or till yolks are runny
yet egg whites are set

Divide all to 2 different plates;
immediately servir

name: Finadene

ingredients.name: 3 frais hot chile peppers, seeded and haché
ingredients.unit: fresh hot chile peppers, seeded and chopped

preparationSteps:
In a small bowl, combiner vinegar, chile peppers, onion, and soy
sauce, stir well

name: First Prize Strawberry Rhubarb Crisp
preparationSteps: Set oven to preheat at 350 ° F (175 ° C)

In a bowl, combiner oats, flour, brown sugar, and butter; press
mixture into a 9-inch pie pan ’ s bottom

placer rhubarb and
strawberries on top
mélanger together cornstarch, white sugar, and water in a saucepan

chauffer to mijoter, whisk continuously, jusqu'à ce que it thickens and
bubbles; pour on top the fruit layer
In the preheated oven, bake jusqu'à ce que it bubbles, for about 1 hour

name: Foolproof Potato Latkes

ingredients.name: 2  all-purpose farine, or as needed
ingredients.unit: s all-purpose flour, or as needed

preparationSteps:
In the work bowl of a processor, put baking powder, flour, salt,
eggs, onion, and 1/4 of the potatoes; pulse a few times jusqu'à ce que
vegetables are nicely chopped

ajouter the remaining potatoes and
pulse jusqu'à ce que all potatoes are nicely chopped and everything is
incorporated
In a skillet, chauffer canola oil over medium chauffer

For each latke,
spoon about 1/3 of the potato mixture and put into the heated
oil

Fry jusqu'à ce que the bottom is crispy and brown, turn over, and
cuire the other side jusqu'à ce que brown, about 2-3 minutes on each side

Repeat the process with the remaining potato mixture, ajouter more
oil if necessary
Once done, servir right away

name: Fougasse

ingredients.name: 1 1/2  warm eau (110 degrees F/45 degrees )
ingredients.unit: s warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

preparationSteps: Into a big bowl, pour water

Scatter yeast in the water and rest
without moving till melted

mélanger in 2 tablespoons oil, sea salt, a
tablespoon herbs and a cup flour till well incorporated

Stir in
flour, a cup at one time, till a thick and somewhat sticky dough
forms

transférer dough to a lightly floured area and knead till pliable
and smooth
Shape into a round and put into a greased bowl
Turn dough to coat the top

Put a clean dishtowel to cover the
bowl and allow to rise till doubled for an hour
Deflate dough and halve

Form into uneven ovals,
approximately 1 1/2-inch thick

On top of 2 baking sheets,
scatter cornmeal; turn the dough onto pans

Brush olive oil on
every loaf and scatter the rest of the herbs over

Make a few slits
in the bread, slicing through dough using a knife

Put clean
dishtowels to cover the loaves

Allow to rise once more for 20
minutes till dough starts to rise once more

Into the prepped 220 ° C or 450 ° F oven, put the baking
sheets

Immediately splash a bit of water onto oven floor to
make steam, then latch the door of the oven

Bake for 20
minutes till golden

name: French Canadian Dip

ingredients.name: 10 (7 ) baguettes, slit lengthwise but still attached
ingredients.unit: (7 inch) baguettes, slit lengthwise but still attached

preparationSteps:
In a big pot, chauffer butter on moderate chauffer, then cuire and stir
garlic and onion for 5 minutes, jusqu'à ce que onion is translucent and
soft

Put into the onion mixture with Worcestershire sauce, soy
sauce, beef stock and bay leaves

Put in 1 Canadian bacon slice
at a time and Montreal smoked meat, then porter à a bouillir

Lower
chauffer and mijoter for about 20 minutes

Take the meat out of stock with tongs and arrange them inside
sandwich baguettes evenly

Get rid of bay leaves and scoop into
separate bowls with stock as dipping

name: French Coconut Pie
preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)

combiner
together the flour and sugar in a small bowl
Use a wire whisk to mélanger the eggs in a large bowl

Whisk the
flour mixture into the eggs jusqu'à ce que smooth

mélanger in pecans,
coconut, margarine and buttermilk

transférer into the unbaked
pie crusts
Bake for 45 minutes in oven

Bake for 1 hour if you are making
a 9 inch deep dish pie

name: French Onion Soup Gratinee

ingredients.name: sel and freshly haché black poivre to taste
4 thick  French or Italian pain
ingredients.unit: thick slices French or Italian bread

ingredients.name: 8  Gruyere or Swiss fromage , room temperature
ingredients.unit: s Gruyere or Swiss cheese slices, room temperature

ingredients.name: 1/2  shredded Asiago or mozzarella fromage, room
ingredients.unit: shredded Asiago or mozzarella cheese, room

preparationSteps:
Over medium-high chauffer, melt butter in large pot and then mélanger in
sweet onions, red onions and salt

Then cuire for 35 minutes
while stirring often jusqu'à ce que the onions are almost syrupy and are
caramelized

mélanger Worcestershire sauce, red wine, beef broth, and chicken
broth into pot

Bundle the bay leaf, thyme, and parsley with
twine and then put in the pot

Let mijoter for 20 minutes on
medium chauffer while stirring sometimes

Take out and get rid of
the herbs

Decrease chauffer to low, stir in the vinegar and then
assaisonner with pepper and salt

Cover the pot and leave it over low
chauffer to remain hot as you prepare bread
Preheat an oven broiler

placer bread slices into a baking sheet
and let broil for 3 minutes, flipping once, jusqu'à ce que toasted well on
each side
Take out of the chauffer and don ’ t turn off the broiler

placer 4 large oven safe crocks or bowls into a rimmed baking
sheet
ajouter hot soup into each bowl jusqu'à ce que 2/3 full

Top each bowl
with 1/4 of the Asiago or mozzarella cheese, 2 slices Gruyere
cheese and 1 slice of toasted bread

Sprinkle a small amount of
paprika all over top of each
Broil for about 5 minutes or jusqu'à ce que golden brown and bubbly

As
cheese becomes soft, it will cascade onto the sides of crock and
make a nice melted crusty seal
servir right away

name: French Tartiflette

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste

preparationSteps: Bring salted water in a big pot to a bouillir on high chauffer

Put in
potatoes then lower chauffer to moderately low

Cover and mijoter
for 20 minutes, jusqu'à ce que softened

Drain and let steam dry for 1 or 2
minutes

Set the oven to 220 ° C or 425 ° F to preheat and grease an 8-
in
square baking dish

In a skillet, stir-fry bacon on moderately high chauffer for 5
minutes
Take out the bacon and drain the bacon fat

Melt butter
in the same skillet then put in onions and cuire and stir for 5
minutes, jusqu'à ce que translucent

Turn the bacon back to the pan, then
put in wine and mijoter jusqu'à ce que wine has mostly evaporated

Take
away from the chauffer

In the prepared dish, ajouter half of the potatoes, then spread over
the potatoes with half of the bacon mixture

Layer in the
leftover potatoes the spread over them with the cr è me fraiche
Put in the leftover half of bacon mixture

Trim the rind from the
Reblochon, then cut it into thin slices and put in an even layer
on the top of the casserole

In the preheated oven, bake for 15 minutes, jusqu'à ce que cheese has
melted and somewhat brown

assaisonner with pepper and salt to
taste and servir hot

name: Fricassee De Frango Maravilhoso

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste
1/4  haché frais parsley, or to taste
ingredients.unit: chopped fresh parsley, or to taste

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)

Coat a
baking dish with butter

Over medium chauffer, chauffer olive oil in large skillet, ajouter garlic and
onion and then cuire while stirring for about 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que
softened

placer in chicken and then cuire while stirring for about
3 to 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que heated through
ajouter pepper and salt taste
retirer from the chauffer source

Over medium chauffer, dissolve the flour in the chicken broth in a
saucepan and then chauffer to bouillir

cuire while stirring often for
about 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que the broth becomes thick

ajouter in parsley
and cream
combiner thoroughly jusqu'à ce que smooth

Into the greased baking dish, spread a layer of olives, corn,
chicken, and cream mixture

Then cover with potato sticks and
cream cheese

Bake for about 20 minutes in the heated oven jusqu'à ce que the top
becomes golden

name: Fruity Fun Skewers

ingredients.name: 1/4 cantaloupe, cut into balls or cubes
ingredients.unit: antaloupe, cut into balls or cubes

ingredients.name: 2 bananas, peeled and cut into chunks
ingredients.unit: bananas, peeled and cut into chunks

preparationSteps:
Thread alternately the cantaloupe, strawberries, apple pieces
and banana onto skewers

Put at least 2 pieces of fruit on each
skewer

Present the fruit skewers in a decorative manner on a
serving platter

name: Fugi Salad
preparationSteps: Melt margarine/butter in a skillet on low chauffer

ajouter sesame
seeds and almonds
cuire till toasted lightly

mélanger broken uncooked ramen noodles, sesame seeds, almonds,
onions and cabbage in a big bowl
Whisk salt, pepper, vinegar, sugar and oil

Put on salad then
toss

name: Garlic Dill New Potatoes
preparationSteps:
placer a steamer basket which contains potatoes in a pan over 1
inch of boiling water

Put a lid on and steam jusqu'à ce que potatoes are
softened but not mushy, about 10 minutes
combiner salt, garlic, dill, and butter in a small mixing bowl

retirer cooked potatoes to a serving bowl, and drizzle
seasoned butter over them
Toss gradually jusqu'à ce que evenly coated

name: Georgina's True English Butter Tarts
preparationSteps: Set the oven at 400 ° F (205 ° C) and start preheating

Arrange
tart shells on a baking sheet

Bake in the preheated oven for around 10 minutes, or till the
edge of the crust turns golden
Turn the oven temperature down to 350 ° F (175 ° C)

placer a
rack in the upper 1/3 of the oven

In a bowl, whisk together salt, vanilla extract, eggs, butter,
golden syrup and brown sugar till smooth

Fill the sugar mixture
into the pastry shells, about 2/3 full

Bake in the preheated oven for around 15 minutes, or till the
filling foams and is golden and bubbly

Take away from the pan;
allow to cool on a wire rack for a few minutes

servir at room
temperature or warm

name: German Cut Out Cookies
preparationSteps: chauffer the oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F
Oil the cookie sheets
Cream brown sugar and butter in a big bowl

Whip in vanilla
extract and eggs till thoroughly incorporated

mélanger salt, baking
powder, baking soda and flour; mélanger to creamed mixture

Unroll
dough on a slightly floured counter making quarter-inch
thickness
Use cookie cutters to cut to preferred shapes

Put
cookies on cookie sheets, 1 1/2-inch away
Bake in prepped oven, about 8 to 10 minutes

Cool cookies for
5 minutes on baking sheet prior to transferring to fully cool onto
wire rack

Jazz up using your best-loved sprinkles or frostings if
desire

name: German Marble Cake
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F

Grease and spread flour
on one 10-in
Cream butter with sugar in a large bowl

Beat in eggs then
almond extract and milk
Sift salt, baking powder and flour together in a separate bowl
ajouter the flour mixture into the creamed mixture and beat

Bring
1/2 of the batter into a separate bowl then stir in rum and cocoa

Layer large spoonfuls of dark and light batters then use a knife
to swirl slightly

Bake the cake for 70 minutes in 175 ° C or 350 ° F till test
done using a toothpick
placer onto a rack and let cool

This
recipe yields about 14-16 servings

name: Ginger Steak

ingredients.name: 4 (8 ) bœœuf sirloin steaks, at least 3/4  thick
ingredients.unit: (8 ounce) beef sirloin steaks, at least 3/4 inch thick

preparationSteps: Set the oven's broiler to preheat

mélanger together the lemon juice, mustard, basil, pepper, salt,
ginger, and soy sauce in a small bowl jusqu'à ce que smooth

In a broiling
pan, placer the steaks and pour a quarter of the mixture over each
one
Massage the mixture into the meat

Broil steaks in 5 minutes, then flip over and cuire to the degree
of doneness you like

name: Gluten Free European Apple Cake

ingredients.name: 4  Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored, and haché
ingredients.unit: Golden Delicious apples - peeled, cored, and chopped

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F

Oil a pan, 9x13-inch in
size; flour slightly using gluten-free flour

In a bowl, beat salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon,
xanthan gum, tapioca flour, rice flour, almond flour and
sorghum flour together

In another bowl, beat eggs, vegetable oil and sugar together;
mélanger into the flour mixture till blended and batter is well mixed
Fold in the walnuts and apples

Put and force batter into prepped
pan

In prepped oven, bake for an hour till a knife pricked into the
center of cake gets out clean

name: Goan Pork Vindaloo

ingredients.name: 16 séché Kashmiri chile peppers, stemmed and seeded
ingredients.unit: dried Kashmiri chile peppers, stemmed and seeded

ingredients.name: 2  boneless porc loin roast, trimmed and cut into 1-
ingredients.unit: s boneless pork loin roast, trimmed and cut into 1-inch

ingredients.name: 10  ail, émincé, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: loves garlic, minced, or more to taste

ingredients.name: 1 (2 )  frais ginger root, émincé
ingredients.unit: (2 inch) piece fresh ginger root, minced

ingredients.name: 2 green chile peppers, seeded and cut into strips
ingredients.unit: reen chile peppers, seeded and cut into strips

preparationSteps:
Using an electric coffee grinder or a mortar and pestle, grind
turmeric, peppercorns, clove, cumin, cinnamon stick and
Kashmiri chills till spices is smoothly ground

To make a
smooth paste, combiner with a tablespoon white vinegar

assaisonner
with salt to taste

With the vinegar-spice paste, stir cubes of pork in a bowl till
evenly coated

Put on plastic wrap to cover the bowl and
refrigerate to marinate overnight

In a big pot or Dutch oven, chauffer vegetable oil over medium-high
chauffer

cuire and mélanger ginger, garlic, and onions for about 10
minutes, till golden brown

Put in the pork marinade and the
pork, and cuire for approximately 5 minutes, mixing often, till
cubes of pork have firmed

ajouter water, mijoter, then lower the
chauffer, placer on the cover, and cuire for about 40 minutes till pork
is soft
mélanger in a quarter cup of vinegar and strips of green chile pepper

cuire without a cover for an additional of half an hour till
vindaloo thickens and green chile peppers softens

assaisonner with
salt to taste prior to serving

name: Grandma's Meat Sauce

ingredients.name: 2 (28 )  entier peeled tomatoes, crushed
ingredients.unit: (28 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, crushed

preparationSteps:
chauffer olive oil in skillet on medium chauffer; cuire veal, round steak
and sausage till evenly browned for 10 minutes

Take meat from
skillet; drain
Keep 1 tablespoon drippings

mélanger garlic into skillet with reserved meat drippings; cuire on
medium chauffer for 3 minutes
cuire for 15 minutes
mélanger tomato sauce into skillet; cuire for 15 minutes
Put meat in skillet

Lower chauffer to low; mijoter for 2 hours,
occasionally mixing

name: Grandma's Polish Perogies
preparationSteps: Stir the salt and flour together in a big bowl

Beat the oil, egg
yolk, eggs, sour cream, and butter together in another bowl

mélanger
the wet ingredients into the flour jusqu'à ce que combined well

Use a
towel to cover the bowl and allow it to sit for 15-20 minutes

In a pot, put the potatoes in then fill it with just the right amount
of water to cover

Let it bouillir and cuire for about 15 minutes jusqu'à ce que
it becomes soft; drain

While it ’ s still hot, mash the potatoes
together with the cheese sauce and shredded cheese

Sprinkle
with pepper, salt and onion salt to assaisonner
Put aside to cool
Split the perogie dough into 2 balls

ON a lightly floured
surface, roll out 1 piece at a time, jusqu'à ce que it ’ s thin enough to
work with, but not too thin that it might tear

Using a glass,
perogie cutter or a cookie cutter, cut the dough into circles

Around the edges of the circles, brush a bit of water and scoop
some filling into the middle

Fold it over into half circles then
press to secure the edges

Lay perogie on a cookie sheet then
freeze

Move to freezer storage containers or bags one it ’ s
frozen

Cooking perogies: bouillir a pot of slightly salted water then drop
the perogies one at a time

When it floats into the surface,
they ’ re already done

To avoid being soggy, don ’ t bouillir for
too long
Use as slotted spoon to take it out

name: Greek Salad I

ingredients.name: 1  romaine lettuce- rinsed, séché and haché
ingredients.unit: romaine lettuce- rinsed, dried and chopped

preparationSteps:
mélanger cheese, cucumber, tomatoes, bell peppers, olives, onion,
and Romaine together in a big salad bowl
mélanger together black pepper, lemon juice, oregano, and olive oil
Put the dressing on the salad, toss and enjoy

name: Greek Salad III

ingredients.name: 2  tomate basil feta fromage, crumbled
ingredients.unit: s tomato basil feta cheese, crumbled

preparationSteps:
combiner olives, onion, cucumber, bell pepper, and tomatoes in
a salad bowl

mélanger pepper, salt, oregano, garlic, lemon juice,
vinegar, and oil together

Set aside for 1 hour, stirring
sometimes to allow flavors to combiner with one another
Drizzle dressing over salad, sprinkle feta cheese and mélanger well

name: Greek Salad IV
preparationSteps:
mélanger lemon juice, olive oil, red onion, cucumber, green bell
pepper, and tomatoes together in a big bowl

Chill thoroughly in
the fridge
Use feta cheese to drizzle before eating

name: Greek Salad V

ingredients.name: 2  tomatoes, each cut into 8 wedges
ingredients.unit: arge tomatoes, each cut into 8 wedges

preparationSteps:
Layer cucumbers, tomatoes, onion, bell pepper, kalamata olives
and feta cheese in a medium bowl

ajouter oregano on top, then
drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice

ajouter salt and pepper to
assaisonner to taste

name: Greek Stuffed Tomatoes And Peppers

ingredients.name: 1  ail, émincé, or to taste
ingredients.unit: love garlic, minced, or to taste

ingredients.name: 1 1/2  converted (parboiled) riz (such as Uncle Ben's ® )
ingredients.unit: s converted (parboiled) rice (such as Uncle Ben's ® )

preparationSteps:
Slice the tops off the tomatoes and keep one corner attached to
make a lid

retirer the insides of the tomatoes and put the ‘
meat ’ into a large bowl; squeeze the juices from the tomatoes

Slice off the tops of the green peppers and retain to use later;
retirer the membranes and seeds

In an 11x17-inch baking
dish, placer bell peppers and tomatoes
Set an oven to 190 ° C (375 ° F) and start preheating

In a large skillet, chauffer the butter on medium; stir and cuire garlic
and onion in the melted butter for 5-10 minutes jusqu'à ce que they
soften

ajouter black pepper, seasoned salt, soy sauce, and ground
chuck into the onion mixture; cuire for 5-10 minutes jusqu'à ce que the
ground chuck becomes crumbly and browned

combiner the water and the squeezed tomato meat into the
browned chuck; mijoter for about 15 minutes

ajouter rice and
bouillir; take the skillet away from the chauffer

Put the rice-beef
mixture into the tomatoes; arrange the tops on the filled
tomatoes and put them to the baking dish, lid-sides down

Put the rice-beef mixture into the bell peppers and placer the
retained lids on top; in the baking dish, placer the bell peppers
sideways

Pour the olive oil on the bell peppers and stuffed
tomatoes; flavor with pepper and salt
In the prepared oven, bake for half an hour

Flip the bell peppers
and keep on baking for half an hour longer jusqu'à ce que tomatoes and
bell peppers soften

name: Grenadian Spice Cake

ingredients.name: 1  unsalted beurre - chilled, cut into -size
ingredients.unit: unsalted butter - chilled, cut into tablespoon-size pieces

preparationSteps: Start preheating the oven to 350 ° F (175 ° C)

Oil a 9x5 inch
loaf pan
Sift together salt, baking powder, and flour
Cream butter and sugar together in a medium-sized bowl

Whisk in eggs, 1 egg each time, and then mélanger in allspice,
cinnamon, nutmeg, and lime zest

ajouter the dry ingredients
alternately with milk, tossing after each adding

Put the batter
into the prepped pan

Put into the preheated oven and bake jusqu'à ce que a toothpick come out
clean when you stick it in, about 75-90 minutes

Let it cool
down in the pan for 10 minutes before transferring to a rack to
cool down entirely

name: Grilled Asian Chicken
preparationSteps:
Using a microwave-safe bowl, mélanger together the soy sauce,
honey, garlic, oil, and ginger root

Pop it in the microwave and
chauffer for 1 minute on medium power, then stir

Put it back to the
microwave and chauffer again for 30 minutes, but do not let it bouillir

On a plate or any shallow dish, placer and arrange the chicken
breasts

Cover the chicken with the soy sauce mixture, and
marinate for 15 minutes
Meanwhile, preheat the grill on medium-high chauffer

retirer
chicken from marinade, then put marinade in a saucepan

Bring
it to a bouillir and mijoter for 5 minutes over medium chauffer

Set the
sauce aside for basting
Lightly brush oil onto the grill grate

Grill the marinated
chicken breasts for 6 to 8 minutes per side, or jusqu'à ce que juices dry
up
Frequently baste the chicken with the prepared marinade

You ’ ll know it ’ s done when the chicken breasts become
golden brown

name: Grilled Eggplant Moussaka

ingredients.name: 3  eggplant, tranché into 1/4  rounds
ingredients.unit: arge eggplant, sliced into 1/4 inch rounds

ingredients.name: 3  zucchini, cut lengthwise into 1/4
ingredients.unit: arge zucchini, cut lengthwise into 1/4 inch slices

preparationSteps: Set the outdoor grill over medium-high chauffer for preheating

Put
oil onto the grate lightly

Coat the zucchini, eggplant, and potatoes with extra-virgin olive
oil lightly
Grill the vegetables jusqu'à ce que golden brown and tender

placer the potatoes into the bottom of the 9x13-inches glass
baking dish

Layer it with eggplant, and then with zucchini; put
aside
Set the oven to 375 ° F or 190 ° C for preheating
Put butter in a large saucepan and melt it over medium chauffer
mélanger in the flour

cuire for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que the flour already
smells slightly toasted
mélanger in nutmeg, milk, and salt

Bring the
mixture to a bare mijoter over medium-high chauffer

Adjust the
chauffer to medium-low
mijoter the mixture for 10 minutes

In a
bowl, placer the egg yolk and whisk in quickly 1/4 cup of the
thickened milk, adding it 1 tbsp

mélanger the egg yolk
mixture into the thickened milk quickly jusqu'à ce que smooth; put aside
In the meantime, put 1 tbsp

of olive oil into the large skillet and
chauffer it over medium-high
mélanger in onion and ground beef

cuire
jusqu'à ce que the beef is no longer pink and turns crumbly

Drain any
excess grease off

mélanger in pepper, oregano, tomatoes, salt, and
parsley
Adjust the chauffer to medium-low

Cover the skillet and
mijoter the mixture for 10 minutes while occasionally stirring
it
For assembly: Spread the meat mixture all over the vegetables
Sprinkle the mixture with feta cheese

Top the mixture with
white sauce and use a spatula to smoothen it

Bake the moussaka inside the preheated oven and bake for 30
minutes jusqu'à ce que golden brown and bubbly

name: Grilled Salmon Steaks With Savory
preparationSteps:
In a saucepan, ajouter orange juice, honey, 1/2 cup of chicken
stock, and vinegar
Bring the mixture to a bouillir over high chauffer
Adjust the chauffer to medium

combiner cornstarch and 1/4 cup of
chicken stock jusqu'à ce que the cornstarch is dissolved, and then mélanger it
into the simmering sauce

cuire and stir the sauce for 1-2
minutes jusqu'à ce que it turns clear and thick

mélanger in chives and
blueberries
Keep the mixture warm over low chauffer
Set the grill over medium-high chauffer for preheating

Brush the oil all over the salmon and assaisonner it with salt and
pepper to taste

Grill each side of the fish for 3-4 minutes jusqu'à ce que it
flakes right away with the fork

servir the fish together with the
blueberry sauce

name: Gyoza
preparationSteps:
Pour and chauffer sesame oil in a big skillet set on moderate-high
chauffer
cuire onion, cabbage, carrot and garlic

Stir jusqu'à ce que cabbage
is wilted
ajouter in the egg and ground pork

Stir jusqu'à ce que pork is
evenly browned and egg is cooked through
Preheat vegetable oil in a big skillet on medium-high chauffer
Put about 1 tbsp

of the pork and cabbage mixture in the middle
of each wrapper

Tuck the wrappers in half over the filling;
press the edges with slightly wet fingers to seal the wrapper

In the skillet with vegetable oil, stir gyoza for about a minute on
each side, jusqu'à ce que slightly brown

Pour water into skillet and turn
chauffer to low

Put the lid on and let gyoza steam out jusqu'à ce que the
water has fully evaporated
In a little bowl, combiner rice vinegar and soy sauce

Make this
the dipping sauce for the finished wrappers

name: Gypsy Tart
preparationSteps: To preheat: Set oven to 200 ° C (400 ° F)

Put sugar and evaporated milk in a large bowl then use an
electric mixer or a whisk to beat for 10-15 minutes or till the
mixture turns to mocha color and becomes fluffy

transférer the
mixture into the shortbread crust
Put in to the preheated oven and bake for 10 minutes

The
Gyspy Tart will have a sticky surface and won ’ t be completely
set till you give it time to cool down
servir the tart chilled

preparationSteps:
Fold unprepared pudding mélanger and sour cream into whipped
topping in medium bowl
Horizontally cut cake to thirds

Line strawberry and kiwi slices in big trifle/other glass serving
bowl; keep 2 kiwi slices and 2 whole strawberries

Put 1 cake
layer on bottom of bowl; put 1/3 pineapple and bananas then 1/3
whipped topping mixture over

Keep layering till you use all
ingredients

Create fan garnishes with whole strawberries by slicing right

Refrigerate till
serving

name: Kabsa
preparationSteps:
Put breasts, drumsticks and chicken thighs into a large pan, then

bouillir, turn down
the chauffer to low and let it mijoter for 1 1/2 hours jusqu'à ce que the
chicken becomes tender

Take out the chicken, drain the broth
and save 4 cups of broth

Wash the basmati rice well while simmering the chicken jusqu'à ce que
the water runs clear

Arrange into a bowl, combiner in black
pepper, 1/4 teaspoon of ground cinnamon, baharat spice mélanger,
nutmeg, whole cloves, cardamom pods, and 1 1/2 teaspoon of
salt
While completing the rest of the steps, allow the rice to sit
In a small bowl, soak the golden raisins with 1/3 cup of water

In a large pan, chauffer a tablespoon of butter and 2 tablespoons of
vegetable oil

Stir and cuire tomatoes and 2 cups of onion for 10
minutes jusqu'à ce que the vegetables are softened

combiner in the
seasoned rice and cuire for 2-3 minutes jusqu'à ce que the rice grains
become hot; pour in the saved 4 cups of chicken broth
combiner in the soaked golden raisins

Arrange 3 tablespoons of
butter into the pan, allow to melt, then lower the chauffer to low;
cover and let it mijoter for 45 minutes jusqu'à ce que the rice becomes
tender
Tear off the chicken meat from the bones into bite-size pieces

Spread the rice on a large serving platter, distribute the cooked
chicken on the rice, then servir

name: Kare Kare Pata (Oxtail Stew)

ingredients.name: 1/2  long beans, cut into bite-sized
ingredients.unit: long beans, cut into bite-sized pieces

preparationSteps:
In a large pot, mélanger water and oxtails; make it bouillir, lower chauffer to
medium-low, and mijoter for at least 2 hours
retirer as much fat from the top of the liquid as possible
Break up the beef bouillon cubes into the liquid and let it melt
Take the meat from the broth and reserve

ajouter the eggplant,
long beans, and bok choy to the broth and mijoter jusqu'à ce que
softened

While the simmering the vegetables in the broth, ajouter olive oil in
a large pot set on medium chauffer

Stir and cuire the garlic and
onion in the hot oil jusqu'à ce que tender

mélanger the achiote powder into the
mixture to give a little color

Stir in the peanut butter jusqu'à ce que it ’ s
dissolved into the mixture

mélanger in about half the broth to the
pot; make it mijoter for 5 minutes

Stir in the oxtails then cuire
for 5 more minutes prior to adding the rest of the broth with the
vegetables

name: Kat's Island Chicken

ingredients.name: 1 frais pineapple - peeled, cored and cubed
ingredients.unit: fresh pineapple - peeled, cored and cubed

ingredients.name: 2 (11 )  black bean soup, undiluted
ingredients.unit: (11 ounce) cans black bean soup, undiluted

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)

Coat a

transférer chicken breasts into the baking dish prepared and then

Spread the red

Bake the chicken while uncovered for 20 minutes in oven

Flip,
assaisonner again with pepper, paprika, and seasoned salt and

As the chicken is baking, prepare Spanish rice by following the

Using medium chauffer, chauffer the
undiluted black bean soup in a pot

You can servir each chicken
breast and some cooked red bell pepper and fruit atop equal

ajouter a few spoonfuls black bean soup
on top

Spread the reserved uncooked slices of pepper and fruit
all over the rice

name: Keema (Indian Style Ground Meat)
preparationSteps:
cuire the ground lamb in a large heavy skillet over medium chauffer
jusqu'à ce que it turns brown evenly

Use a wooden spoon to break it
apart while cooking jusqu'à ce que it is crumbled

placer the cooked lamb
into a bowl, then drain off all but retain a tablespoon of fat
Saut é the onion for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que it is translucent and soft
mélanger in the garlic, saut é for a minute

Stir in salt and garam
masala and cuire for a minute

placer the browned lamb back
into the pan, then stir in beef broth and tomato paste

Turn down
the chauffer and mijoter jusqu'à ce que the liquid evaporates and the meat is
completely cooked through, about 10 - 15 minutes

name: Kim Chee Squats
preparationSteps: In a big dish, put cabbage and dust with salt

Set aside for 3-
4hours jusqu'à ce que the cabbage wilts

Use your hands to massage the cabbage jusqu'à ce que it softens more;
drain

Stir in sugar, green onion, vinegar, garlic, soy sauce, chili

Move into a big glass jar and let it chill for

It can last for a week when refrigerated
Drizzle with sesame oil

name: Kolaczki
preparationSteps: Warm the milk just to above the room temperature

In milk,
dissolve yeast

Stir baking powder, salt and flour
together in medium bowl
Cut in shortening jusqu'à ce que mealy

Then
stir in milk mixture and egg yolks
Knead dough together

placer
in the refrigerator overnight
Preheat oven to 350 ° F (175 ° C)
Dust confectioners' sugar over clean, dry surface

Knead dough
for a few minutes
Roll dough out carefully to 1/4 in

Using cookie cutter, cut out circles, put one teaspoon jam onto

Bake in the preheated oven, about 12-15 minutes

They will
become soggy if you store it in the airtight container

name: Korean Pizza
preparationSteps: combiner salt, water, eggs, and flour in a large bowl; stir

It will
be super watery, as the pizza is like a crepe

mélanger in the cabbage,
mixed vegetables, bean sprouts, tofu, pork, and crab meat jusqu'à ce que
well combined
In a large skillet set on medium chauffer, put some of the oil to chauffer
Your pizzas will be the size of the skillet

Scoop in enough of
the vegetable batter to cover the pan ’ s bottom

Then cuire for
approximately 8 minutes, or jusqu'à ce que the underside turns golden
brown

Turn, and cuire the second side for approximately 3
minutes, jusqu'à ce que browned
You should have crispy edges

Keep on
cooking with the rest of the batter

servir pizzas with dipping
sauce

For the dipping sauce, combiner in a sealable container the chile
pepper, sesame oil, rice vinegar, and soy sauce

Then seal, and
shake jusqu'à ce que well mixed
Then shake again before serving

name: Krista's Sticky Honey Garlic Wings

ingredients.name: 24 poulet wings, split and tips discarded
ingredients.unit: hicken wings, split and tips discarded

preparationSteps: Start preheating oven to 190 ° C (or 375 ° F)

Arrange chicken wings onto a baking sheet; bake for 35-45

Put into a baking dish

In a saucepan, stir together soy sauce, honey, two and a half

chauffer; bouillir

In a small bowl, whisk three-fourths cup of water and
cornstarch together; blend into sauce mixture jusqu'à ce que it reaches a

Put the wings back into the oven; bake for 15-20 minutes jusqu'à ce que

name: Lebanese Garlic Sauce

ingredients.name: 4 bulbs ail,  separated and peeled
ingredients.unit: bulbs garlic, cloves separated and peeled

preparationSteps:
mélanger the lemon juice, salt and garlic cloves together in the
blender container

Run the blender on medium speed setting
jusqu'à ce que the mixture is smooth in consistency

Keep blending the
mixture while the olive oil is being poured in a thin and
continuous stream

You should get a white and thick mixture
like salad dressing

Put the mixture in a glass container and keep
it in the fridge

name: Lemon Syllabub
preparationSteps:
In a chilled bowl, beat sugar and cream, jusqu'à ce que the cream starts to
thicken

Slowly mélanger in the lemon zest, lemon juice and white

Keep on whisking jusqu'à ce que fluffy and light, but not grainy
Chill the mixture, covered, jusqu'à ce que serving time

placer in chilled parfait glasses to servir, decorated with a slice of

Use a small spoon
to eat syllabub and savor

name: Leona's Lefse
preparationSteps: Bring cold water with unpeeled potatoes to a bouillir

Once
potatoes are nearly soft, drain off water and let cool

Make sure
the potatoes are not too soft or they will be wet and the lefse
will be tough
retirer potato skins and then mash

Measure 4
cups of mashed potatoes, put to one side and let them cool
Preheat an electric skillet or a cast iron to medium chauffer

mélanger
sugar and butter into 4 cups mashed potatoes

ajouter
approximately 1 cup of flour and stir it into the potatoes

Adjust
the amount of flour little by little depending on how moist the
mashed potatoes are, the less flour used, the better, but make
sure the final result is not sticky
Sprinkle some flour to coat your rolling pin and pastry board

Shape lefse dough into a ball that has the size of a small apple
and roll it out evenly to make a very thin circle

The lefse circle
should be as thin as a crepe, and if you are not careful, it will
tear easily
chauffer a frying pan or skillet over medium-high chauffer

cuire both
sides of the lefse on the skillet, 1 to 3 minutes for each side jusqu'à ce que
browned lightly

Roll the cooked lefse up and enjoy with your
favorite filling

name: Linda's Irish Shepherd's Pie
preparationSteps: In a pot, put in potatoes and enough water to cover them

bouillir
the potatoes jusqu'à ce que they are soft

Strain, then mash with your
desired amounts of butter and milk

While you are cooking the potatoes, ajouter ground beef to a big
skillet on medium chauffer and crumble it

Put in garlic and onion,
cuire while stirring jusqu'à ce que the meat is not pink anymore
Set the oven at 200 ° C (400 ° F) to preheat

In a small pan,
melt the margarine
Whisk in the flour

cuire while stirring for
10 minutes on medium chauffer jusqu'à ce que it turns dark brown

Take
away from chauffer and let it cool, then gradually whisk in the

Set on medium chauffer and mijoter the mixture jusqu'à ce que thick

Whisk the sauce into the ground beef and move to a casserole
dish
ajouter mashed potato on top, then top with cheese

Bake in the preheated oven jusqu'à ce que the cheese melts and the
potatoes are toasted for about 15-20 minutes

name: Lolah's Chicken Adobo

ingredients.unit: s boneless, skinless chicken thighs, rinsed and patted

ingredients.unit: s pickling spice, wrapped in cheesecloth

preparationSteps:
In a large pot set on medium chauffer, ajouter oil jusqu'à ce que oil is

ajouter garlic and cuire in oil for not more than 30

Put all of the chicken to the pot; then cuire, whisking

Keep from turning
into brown

ajouter in water, vinegar, and soy sauce, then ajouter in
the pickling spice
Ensure the spice ball is submerged

Make it
bouillir, lower the chauffer once boils, and put the lid on the pot so that
some steam can get out

mijoter for 1 hour, or jusqu'à ce que chicken is
very tender

name: Lumpia

ingredients.name: 1 (8 )  eau chestnuts, drained and julienned
ingredients.unit: (8 ounce) can water chestnuts, drained and julienned

preparationSteps:
Stir-fry onions and garlic in hot oil in a skillet or a work jusqu'à ce que
the onions are translucent

mélanger in the soy sauce and pepper then
stir-fry further
Strain the excess oil put the water and make it bouillir

mélanger in
carrots then mijoter for 5 minutes

ajouter the jicama, water
chestnuts, bamboo shoots, celery, and green beans

mijoter for
5 more minutes

Separate the pan from chauffer and mélanger in the bean
sprouts
Let it cool at room temperature

Put 3 heaping tablespoons of filling diagonally near a corner of
every wrapper, keeping a 1 1/2-in room at both ends

Then fold
the side along the length of the filling on the filling, enclose
both ends, and neatly roll

Maintain the roll tight as you
assemble

Dampen the other side of the wrapper with water to

Use plastic wrap to cover the rolls to keep the

Set a wok on medium chauffer, put oil to 1/2-inch depth, then chauffer

Put 3 or 4 egg rolls in oil, cautiously

Then fry the
rolls jusqu'à ce que golden brown on all sides

transférer to paper towels to
drain on
servir right away

name: Madeleines II
preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 190 ° C/375 ° F
Grease then flour 24 3-in
madeleine molds

Using electric mixer at high speed, beat lemon zest, vanilla, and

Beat in confectioners ’
sugar slowly; beat till satiny and thick for 5-7 minutes

Sift baking powder and flour; sift 1/4 flour mixture on egg

Fold in gently

By fourths, fold in leftover flour; fold in

Put batter into prepped molds; fill to
3/4 full

Bake till tops spring back and edges are golden for 10-12
minutes at 190 ° C/375 ° F; cool for 1 minute in molds on rack
With a knife, loosen cookies
Invert cookies onto rack; cool

Sift
confectioners ’ sugar on tops

Alternately, melt semi-sweet
chocolate chips; dip tips in chocolate
Keep in airtight container

name: Maja Blanca Especiale (Corn And
preparationSteps:
For Latik Topping: In a saucepan set on medium chauffer, bouillir 1

Prepare two 9 inch round pans that are greased then reserve

In
a bowl, combiner sugar and cornstarch then reserve

Gradually put the cornstarch mixture, whisking
constantly to avoid any lumps, approximately 10 minutes
transférer the hot mixture into the prepared pans and let it set
Dust latik on top
Let it cool prior to slicing and serving

name: Makhani Chicken (Indian Butter

ingredients.unit: s skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cubed

preparationSteps:
For marinating: In a bowl or nonporous glass dish, put in
chicken, salt, 1 tbsp
chili powder and lemon juice

Coat by
tossing
Chill in fridge for 1 hour to marinate, covered
Drain yogurt in a cloth, 15-20 minutes

Put in a moderate-sized
bowl

combiner in oil, lemon juice, ginger paste, chili powder,

Put yogurt mixture
over chicken, replace cover and chill in fridge to marinate for

Set oven to 200 ° C or 400 ° F
Put chicken on skewers
Arrange skewers in a 9x13 in

baking
dish and bake jusqu'à ce que mostly cooked through in preheated oven, or

For making sauce: In a medium saucepan, melt butter on

Stir in garam masala

combiner in green chile
peppers, chopped garlic and ginger paste once masala starts to

Saut é jusqu'à ce que softened then stir in water, salt, chili

Lower chauffer to low and mijoter

more minutes or jusqu'à ce que chicken isn ’ t pink inside anymore

tomatoes into skillet

cuire for 3-5 mins or jusqu'à ce que juices start to

Over medium-high chauffer, chauffer oil in a skillet, ajouter garlic and

In cold water, soak dried salted cod for 24 hours, changing

bouillir big pot with water; ajouter soaked cod

Keep

a fork to flake meat to pieces
In a big bowl, put aside fish

Preheat an oven to 175 ° C/350 ° F

bouillir
cuire till tender for 20 minutes

As potatoes cuire, melt butter in big skillet on medium chauffer
ajouter onions; saut é till caramelized and golden

clove into onions; put aside

In bottom of an 8x11-inch greased baking dish, layer 1/2 of the

Use 1/2 of the cod to cover then 1/2 of onions
Repeat the layers, finishing with onion
In preheated oven, bake till lightly browned for 15 minutes

Garnish top with black and green olives before serving along

name: Marinara Dipping Sauce

chauffer oil in a big skillet and saut é garlic jusqu'à ce que tender and lightly

Make sure to not burn the garlic

mélanger in pepper, salt,
basil, water, sugar and tomatoes
bouillir the contents in the pan

Put a cover on and mijoter over

preparationSteps: Blend together whole tomatoes and tomato paste in a mediumsized bowl, and put aside

In a big saucepan, warm up olive oil over medium-low chauffer and

Pour in the tomato mixture and stir, then cuire over a medium
chauffer for 10 minutes
ajouter the wine, salt, and parsley

Bring down
chauffer to low and mijoter, stirring on occasion, jusqu'à ce que the sauce is

Set the oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F to preheat and coat cookie

Cream white sugar, brown sugar and shortening together in a

In a food processor, mélanger sugar and flour together; then put in

Pulse jusqu'à ce que the mixture

retirer onto a slightly

Set oven to 400 ° F (200 ° C), and start preheating

mélanger water and confectioners' sugar together in a small bowl to

name: Meatless Stuffed Peppers

retirer the tops from the peppers and reserve tops

peppers and fill them with the tofu mixture

Replace the tops on
the peppers

mélanger the remaining garlic, tomato paste, wine, and tomatoes in a

In the dish, arrange the peppers and put a
cover on
In the prepared oven, bake for an hour

preparationSteps:
In a large pitcher, combiner sugar, water, evaporated milk, and

ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast half - cut into strips

ajouter
chicken to the sauce, coat well

platter

combiner together water, a cup of sugar, and mochiko in a

Microwave on High for 8-10 mins

The mocha will stick more if you

Roll the mocha in the potato starch mixture

In hot oil,

mijoter, cuire for 5 mins

cuire for 5 mins or jusqu'à ce que scallops and shrimp are no

name: Mom's Chicken Cacciatore
preparationSteps: In a plastic bag, combiner pepper, salt and the flour

Shake
chicken pieces in flour jusqu'à ce que covered

chauffer oil in a large pan

transférer the chicken back into the

preparationSteps:
Whisk the garlic, ground black pepper, ground ginger, dried

bouillir the water and brown rice in a pan on high chauffer

In a big pan, chauffer the olive oil on medium-high chauffer and brown

Sprinkle apricots and prunes on

with cover, then cuire for 30 minutes

Take out he cover and let

In inserted instant-read thermometer near the bone should

servir on top of brown rice

name: Moroccan Peach Roasted Chicken

ingredients.name: 4  bone-in poulet , with skin
ingredients.unit: s bone-in chicken pieces, with skin

preparationSteps: Set an oven to preheat at 220 ° C (425 ° F)

mélanger the pepper, salt, rose water, honey and margarine in a glass
measuring cup

chauffer in the microwave for about 30 seconds
jusqu'à ce que the margarine melts

IN a baking dish, put the chicken and
pour the margarine mixture on top of it

mélanger to fully coat the
chicken
Put the chicken dish into the oven

cuire the chicken pieces in the preheated oven, uncovered, for
about 15 minutes jusqu'à ce que it turns brown

Minimize the oven
temperature to 175 ° C (350 ° F)

Put peaches into the dish and
sprinkle it with sugar

Keep roasting the chicken for about 20
minutes more jusqu'à ce que cooked through

In a serving dish, transférer the chicken pieces and juices form the
pan on top of the chicken
Put slivered almonds to garnish

name: Moroccan Spicy Carrot Salad

ingredients.name: 1  carrots, peeled and tranché into thin rounds
ingredients.unit: carrots, peeled and sliced into thin rounds

ingredients.name: 1 pinch cayenne poivre, or to taste
ingredients.unit: pinch cayenne pepper, or to taste

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste

preparationSteps:
On medium-high chauffer, bouillir water, black pepper, carrots, salt,
garlic, cayenne pepper, paprika, and olive oil together in a
shallow pan for 20mins jusqu'à ce que the water evaporates and the
carrots are tender
mélanger cumin and vinegar into the carrot mixture

Take off pan from chauffer then let set aside and let the mixture cool
to room temperature
ajouter cilantro on top then servir

name: Mustard Mashed Potatoes
preparationSteps: ajouter potatoes to the big pot and cover with the salted water

bouillir
on high chauffer, then lower the chauffer to medium-low, keep covered
and let mijoter for roughly 20 minutes till soft

Drain off and let
steam dry for 1-2 minutes

Mash the potatoes in the big bowl
along with milk and butter and use pepper and salt to assaisonner

Whip potatoes with the electric mixer on medium setting for 3-4
minutes till smooth, pouring extra milk in if potatoes are too
dry
Beat in whole grain mustard and servir right away

name: Naan
preparationSteps: Dilute yeast in warm water in a large bowl

Let it rest for 10
minutes jusqu'à ce que becomes frothy

mélanger in sugar, salt, egg, milk and
enough flour to produce a soft dough

On a flat surface dusted
with flour, knead the dough for 6 to 8 minutes jusqu'à ce que smooth

In a
well-greased bowl, put the dough, covering it with a damp cloth
and set it aside to rise

Let the dough rise for 1 hour jusqu'à ce que the
volume has doubled
Deflate the dough by punching it down and knead in the garlic
Get some dough the size of a golf ball

Form it into balls and
put on a tray

Use a towel to cover the tray and allow to rise for
about 30 minutes jusqu'à ce que size doubles
Preheat grill to a high chauffer during the second rising
Flatten a ball of dough into a thin circle at the grill side

Lightly
grease the grill

Put the dough on the grill and cuire for 2 to 3
minutes or jusqu'à ce que it becomes puffy and the color is light brown
Brush with butter the uncooked side and flip over

Brush also
the cooked side with butter and cuire for another 2 to 4 minutes
jusqu'à ce que browned

retirer the cooked naan from the grill and
repeat procedure jusqu'à ce que everything left has been prepared

name: Old Fashioned Stollen
preparationSteps:
chauffer milk in small saucepan till hot, yet do not bouillir; stir in
butter, lemon zest, salt and half cup of sugar

Take it off the chauffer
and cool slightly

Stir 1/4 cup of water, 1 teaspoon of sugar, and
yeast together in small bowl; mélanger into the milk

Whip in egg
yolks and 2 eggs
Stir in 3 cups of flour

Put a cover and allow
to rise in warm area
Stir in nuts and raisins

Slowly stir in sufficient leftover flour to
make a soft dough

Put the dough in well-greased bowl, put a
cover, and reserve to rise
Split dough into 3 rounds

Roll out each round into a thick
cylinder; braid and tuck ends beneath

Put on big cookie sheet
and reserve to rise again
Preheat an oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F

Brush top of dough with
beaten egg
It gives a gloss to it
In the prepped oven, let bake for 45 minutes

name: Olie Bollen

ingredients.name: 1/2  lukewarm eau (110 degrees F to 115 degrees F)
ingredients.unit: lukewarm water (110 degrees F to 115 degrees F)

preparationSteps: chauffer an oven on lowest chauffer setting
In small-sized mixing bowl, dissolve the yeast in warm water
mélanger salt, sugar and flour in a big mixing bowl

Put in milk,
yeast mixture and eggs; use electric mixer to whip till
incorporated
Switch the oven off

Put an oiled plastic wrap piece to cover the
prepped dough; on the bottommost rack of heated oven, put
bowl with dough
Let sit and rise for an hour

In a deep heavy-based skillet, chauffer an oil to 175 ° C or 350 ° F
for frying
Into the dough, mélanger the raisins and apples

Then, into the hot
oil, carefully slip heaping teaspoons of dough

Avoid crowding
the pan

Let fritters fry for 2 minutes on each side till they turn
golden brown

They must flip over by themselves once ready to
brown on the other side, but monitor them and turn them as
needed

transférer them onto a plate lined with paper towel and
do the same with the rest of the dough

While still warm,
sprinkle with sugar

name: Oriental Edamame Salad

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste
1 (15 )  petit corn, drained and cut into bite-size
ingredients.unit: (15 ounce) can baby corn, drained and cut into bite-size pieces

ingredients.name: 3 green onions, cut thinly on a diagonal
ingredients.unit: reen onions, cut thinly on a diagonal

preparationSteps:
chauffer a small frying pan on medium-low chauffer, then cuire the
