toasted

In a bowl, whisk together the ginger, garlic, sugar, vinegar, soy
sauce and sesame oil to make the dressing, then sprinkle black
pepper and salt to assaisonner

In a big bowl, mélanger together the toasted almonds, cilantro, green
onions, radishes, water chestnuts, baby corn and edamame, then
toss with the dressing to coat

servir at room temperature or
cold

name: Pad Kee Mao

ingredients.name: 3 1/2  séché Thai-style riz nouilles, wide (such as
ingredients.unit: s dried Thai-style rice noodles, wide (such as

ingredients.name: 1 serrano poivre, émincé, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: serrano pepper, minced, or more to taste

preparationSteps: Put dry rice noodles inside a bowl

Cover using hot water and
soak for about an hour jusqu'à ce que soft and white

Drain noodles then
put aside

In a big skillet or wok, chauffer 1 1/2 teaspoon of olive oil on low
chauffer

Saut é 2 minced garlic cloves for 2-3 minutes jusqu'à ce que it
starts to crisp and brown in color

mélanger in 2 teaspoons of sugar,
1/2 teaspoon of thick soy sauce, and soaked noodles jusqu'à ce que
noodles absorb soy sauce and become brown in color for about
3 minutes
Take noodles out of skillet
chauffer leftover 1 1/2 teaspoons of olive oil in a wok on low chauffer

mélanger in leftover 2 minced garlic cloves then cuire for 2-3
minutes jusqu'à ce que it starts to brown and crisp

Bring chauffer up to
medium-high and mélanger in salt, 1 teaspoon of sugar, 1/2 teaspoon
of thick soy sauce, basil, serrano pepper, and pork

Saut é for
about 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que pork isn ’ t pink and the meat edges are
starting to brown

Put noodles back in wok and mélanger in bean
sprouts
Saut é for about 5 more minutes jusqu'à ce que heated through

name: Pad Kee Mow (Drunkard's Noodles)

ingredients.name: 1  red poivre flakes, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: red pepper flakes, or more to taste

ingredients.name: 2 skinless, boneless poulet breast halves, thinly tranché
ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, thinly sliced

preparationSteps:
mélanger black pepper, red pepper flakes, lime juice, palm sugar, fish
sauce, and rice vinegar in a big bowl
Marinade chicken in rice vinegar mixture

Put aside as you
prepare the rest of the ingredients

In warm water, separate rice noodles for about 5 minutes then
drain
In a wok or big skillet, chauffer vegetable oil on medium chauffer

Saut
é onion and garlic in hot oil for about 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que onion is
translucent and soft
Bring chauffer up to medium-high

mélanger marinade and chicken in
onion mixture

Saut é jusqu'à ce que chicken isn ’ t pink in the middle
and sauce starts to thicken for 7-10 minutes

mélanger basil leaves, green onion, tomatoes, red bell pepper, soy
sauce, oyster sauce, and rice noodles in chicken mixture

Saut é
jusqu'à ce que the sauce is distributes evenly and noodles become tender
for another 5 minutes

name: Paella I

ingredients.name: 4  Spanish chorizo (cured spiced porc sausage), casing
ingredients.unit: s Spanish chorizo (cured spiced pork sausage), casing

ingredients.name: discarded and sausage cut into 1/4- dice
2 skinless, boneless poulet breast halves - cut into 1  cubes
ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into 1 inch cubes

ingredients.name: 2 squid, cleaned and cut into 1

preparationSteps: In paella pan, chauffer the olive oil over medium chauffer

Put pepper,
garlic and onion; cuire and mélanger for several minutes

Put rice,
diced chicken and chorizo sausage; allow to cuire for 2 to 3
minutes

mélanger in saffron, thyme leaves, wine and 3 1/2 cups
stock
Put pepper and salt to assaisonner

bouillir, and allow to mijoter
for 15 minutes; mélanger from time to time
Taste the rice, and check if cooked

In case rice is not cooked,
mélanger in half cup additional stock

Keep cooking, mixing from
time to time

mélanger in more stock if needed: up to 2 cups more
stock, total of 5 cups
Allow to cuire till rice is finish
mélanger in peas, tomatoes and squid
Allow to cuire for 2 minutes
Set mussels and prawns over

Cover using foil, and let sit for 3
to 5 minutes
Take off foil, and sprinkle with parsley on top

servir in paella
pan, garnish with wedges of lemon

name: Palak Paneer (Curried Spinach)
preparationSteps: In a large pot, chauffer the oil on medium

ajouter garlic and onion; stir
and cuire for 8 minutes jusqu'à ce que browned lightly

Turn down the
chauffer to medium-low; then stir in ground ginger, onion powder,
red chile powder, cinnamon, cumin seeds, garlic powder,

cuire for 3-4 minutes jusqu'à ce que fragrant
Stir tomato paste and water into the pot

Then bouillir; turn down
the chauffer to low and let it mijoter for 10 minutes jusqu'à ce que it flavors

mélanger in spinach then mijoter with a cover for 10 minutes
jusqu'à ce que wilted

retirer the cover and cuire for 3-5 minutes jusqu'à ce que
the oil is separated and liquid is evaporated
Carefully placer the spinach mixture into a blender

Put a cover
on and keep the lid down with an oven mitt; the pur é e jusqu'à ce que it
becomes smooth
Return the spinach pur é e to the pot

Stir in the heavy cream
and paneer

Put a cover on and let it mijoter on medium chauffer for

name: Papa Felico's Garlic Sausage Bread

ingredients.name: 1 loaf Italian pain, cut in demi lengthwise
ingredients.unit: oaf Italian bread, cut in half lengthwise

preparationSteps: Start preheating the oven to 400 ° F (200 ° C)
Into a saucepan, crumble sausage over low chauffer

cuire, covered,
stirring every half a minute, jusqu'à ce que the sausage is browned

On a baking sheet, arrange bread with crust sides facing down
Evenly placer cooked sausage over both 1/2 of the bread

ajouter
the tomato slices, the red bell pepper strips, the mozzarella
slices then the green olives, finally the black olives on top each
Bake for 10 mins in prepared oven

In a bowl, whisk garlic, onion, pepper, salt, basil, oregano,
balsamic vinegar and olive oil together

Drizzle over halves of
the baked bread
Bake for 5 more mins
To servir, slice into 2 inches slices

name: Pasta With Peanut Sauce

ingredients.name: 1  skinless, boneless poulet breast halves - cut into cubes
ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into cubes

preparationSteps:
In a big pot of boiling water, cuire angel hair pasta jusqu'à ce que al
dente
Saut é bean sprouts, green onion and bell pepper jusqu'à ce que tendercrispy
Saut é chicken jusqu'à ce que it is done and set aside

In a big saucepan, mélanger ginger, soy sauce and peanut butter over
medium low chauffer
Put chicken broth

Put chicken, saut é ed
vegetables and pasta
Coat all ingredients by tossing it
Immediately servir

name: Pasta With Vietnamese Pesto
preparationSteps: In a big bowl, soak rice noodles for half an hour in cold water
Drain noodles then put aside

Pesto: combiner 2 tablespoons peanuts, salt or imitation fish
sauce, jalapeno peppers, lemon grass, garlic cloves, basil, and
chopped cilantro in a food processor or blender

Whirl jusqu'à ce que
peanuts and herbs are chopped coarsely

As machine runs, run a
thin stream of oil into it

ajouter leftover peanuts then run machine
in short spurts to coarsely chop peanuts

In a big skillet, put soaked rice noodles and half a cup of water
on medium-high chauffer

mélanger jusqu'à ce que majority of water absorbs and
noodles become tender
ajouter nearly all the pesto and mélanger it well

ajouter several
tablespoons of water if pesto begins clumping

Taste pasta and ajouter more pepper, salt, imitation fish sauce, lime
juice, or pesto if you want

Top pasta with leftover 2
tablespoons of peanuts then immediately servir

name: Peri Peri African Chicken
preparationSteps:
mélanger the lemon juice, salt, ginger, chili powder, paprika, and
garlic in a large bowl
Rub the mixture all over the chicken

Lay
the chicken on a dish and let it marinate for 3 hours
Set the grill to medium chauffer for preheating
Position the chicken onto the grill, discarding the marinade

Let
it cuire for approximately 30 minutes while occasionally
flipping jusqu'à ce que the juices run clear and the skin is charred slightly

name: Perogies

ingredients.unit: (32 ounce) jar sauerkraut - drained, rinsed and minced

preparationSteps: Prepare dough: mélanger water, egg, salt and flour in a medium bowl

combiner everything to make a dough; placer cover on the bowl
and put aside
Prepare Potato Filling: In a big pot, put the potatoes

Put in the
water to cover, let it come to bouillir, and bouillir till soft, or for 25 to

Take potatoes out of water and mash

In a deep, big
skillet, put the bacon

cuire on medium high chauffer till evenly
brown

Drain, break up into crumbles and mélanger into mashed
potatoes
mélanger in cheese and ajouter pepper and salt to assaisonner
Prepare Sauerkraut Filling: In a deep, big skillet, put the bacon
cuire on medium high chauffer till evenly brown

Drain, break up
into crumbles and put in a medium size bowl

mélanger in
sauerkraut, then sour cream
Stir thoroughly
On a floured area, roll out the reserved dough

With a small
round container, cut out circles from the dough

In the middle of
each disk, put 1 spoonful of sauerkraut or potato filling and fold
over, pinching edges together to seal

bouillir a big pot of slightly
salted water; in boiling water, drop the perogies and cuire till
they float, or for 4 to 5 minutes

name: Pfeffernuesse IV
preparationSteps:
combiner together allspice, nutmeg, cloves, cinnamon, baking
soda, sugar and flour in a large bowl

Over medium chauffer,
combiner butter and molasses in a medium saucepan

chauffer while
stirring occasionally jusqu'à ce que butter has melted

transférer from the
chauffer and let cool to room temperature

Beat in the eggs once
mixture has cooled

Blend molasses mixture into dry ingredients
jusqu'à ce que mixed evenly
Cover and chill for at least 3 to 4 hours
Preheat an oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)

Coat cookie
sheets with grease

Roll the dough into one inch balls and put
them into cookie sheets, two inches apart
Bake for about 12 to 14 minutes in prepared oven or jusqu'à ce que firm

While the cookies are warm, mélanger with confectioners' sugar in a
bag to coat
Once cool, mélanger with the sugar again

name: Pinoy Chicken Adobo

ingredients.name: 5  poulet legs and thighs, rinsed and patted dry
ingredients.unit: s chicken legs and thighs, rinsed and patted dry

preparationSteps: In a 6-qt pot, put the chicken

ajouter soy sauce, vinegar, and water
on the chicken

ajouter the bay leaves, peppercorns, garlic, onion,
and sugar to the pot; make the mixture bouillir for 2 minutes

Lower chauffer; mijoter for approximately 30 minutes jusqu'à ce que the
chicken is not pink and the juices are clear

An instant-read
thermometer poked in the thickest part of the thigh, near the
bone should register 180 ° F (82 ° C)

Take the chicken from
the pot and keep on cooking the sauce for approximately 10
minutes jusqu'à ce que it thickens; ajouter salt to taste

Put the chicken back to the pot, ensuring the chicken is entirely
coated by the sauce

Then cuire together for approximately 3
minutes jusqu'à ce que the chicken is reheated

name: Pistou Soup

ingredients.name: 2  frais green beans - rinsed, trimmed, and snapped into
ingredients.unit: s fresh green beans - rinsed, trimmed, and snapped into

ingredients.name: 3 carrots, cut into bite size
ingredients.unit: arrots, cut into bite size pieces

ingredients.name: 4 potatoes, cut into bite sized
ingredients.unit: potatoes, cut into bite sized pieces

ingredients.name: 1 (15 )  kidney beans, drained and rinsed
ingredients.unit: (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: 1 (15.5 )  white beans, drained and rinsed
ingredients.unit: (15.5 ounce) can white beans, drained and rinsed

ingredients.name: 1 (8 )  spaghetti, broken into 2-

preparationSteps: In a large pot porter à the bouillir water and vegetable broth

Stir in
potatoes, carrots, green beans and zucchini

Return to a bouillir,
turn down chauffer to medium-low and mijoter for 45 minutes

Meanwhile, to make the pistou, placer the tomatoes, garlic, basil
leaves, olive oil and salt into a food processor together and

ajouter canned diced tomatoes, kidney beans, white beans and

mijoter for about 10 minutes and cuire
jusqu'à ce que spaghetti is tender

retirer the soup from the chauffer and stir
in the pistou

servir with gruyere cheese and parmesan cheese
on top

name: Plum And Ginger Chicken

ingredients.name: 4 skinless, boneless poulet breast halves - cut into bite-size
ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into bite-size

preparationSteps: In a pot, bouillir water and rice

Put on cover, turn down chauffer to
low, and let it mijoter for 20 minutes

In small bowl, combiner bouillon, garlic, soy sauce, corn syrup
and plum sauce
In a skillet, chauffer the oil over medium chauffer

Coat chicken with
cornstarch, and let it cuire in the skillet for 5 minutes or till
juices run clear

Stir in mushrooms, snow peas and ginger, and
keep cooking till soft
mélanger in plum sauce mixture

cuire till
heated completely

name: Polish Galicyjskie Cookies

ingredients.name: 2 3/4  potatoes - peeled, finely grated, and squeezed dry
ingredients.unit: s potatoes - peeled, finely grated, and squeezed dry

preparationSteps:
Beat the cinnamon, 3 tablespoons of confectioners' sugar and
egg yolks together

mélanger it into the grated potatoes with the
raisins and stir jusqu'à ce que incorporated well; mélanger in the flour
Beat the egg whites with salt jusqu'à ce que it becomes stiff

Fold it
gently into the potato mixture

In an electric skillet or a deep fryer, chauffer the oil to 175 ° C
(350 ° F)

Drop heaping tablespoon-size dollops of cookies into the hot oil
to fry

Fry it jusqu'à ce que it turns golden brown on each side and drain it
on a plate lined with paper towel

Dust it with confectioner ’ s
sugar

name: Polish Sourdough Rye Bread
preparationSteps:
Night prior to creating bread, melt sugar and 1 packet yeast in 2
cups water in a medium sized mixing bowl

Let stand for 10
minutes till creamy

mélanger rye flour in till mixture becomes
smooth
Let stand overnight, covered
The following day, melt leftover yeast package in buttermilk
ajouter 4 cups bread flour, salt, baking soda and rye flour mixture
Stir to mélanger

1/2 cup at a time, ajouter leftover 4 cups bread flour,
mixing well after every addition

You might not need all the
flour

When dough is a coherent, smooth mass, turn out onto
lightly floured surface

Knead for 8 minutes till supple and
smooth
On dough, sprinkle caraway seeds

Knead till seeds are
distributed evenly throughout dough
Oil a big mixing bowl lightly
Put dough into bowl

Coat in oil
by turning
Use a damp cloth to cover

Let rise for 1 hour till
volume doubles in a warm area
Preheat the oven to 175 ° C/350 ° F
Onto lightly floured surface, transférer the dough

Divide to 3
portions
Shape every portion to a loaf
Put into 3 9x5-in

lightly
greased bread pans

Let rise, covered, for 1 hour till almost
doubled

Bake for 35 minutes at 175 ° C/350 ° F till loaf bottom are
hollow when you tap it

name: Polish Sweet Bread
preparationSteps:
In a small pan, warm the milk jusqu'à ce que it starts to bubble, then take

Stir in 4 tablespoons of butter, mélanger jusqu'à ce que it melts
Let it cool down to lukewarm
In a bread machine pan, pour in the milk mixture

Put salt,
yeast, 4 cups of bread flour, vanilla extract, 1/2 cup of sugar and

Once finished mixing the dough, let it stay in the bread machine

Let it rise for about 45 minutes
jusqu'à ce que it doubles in size

Deflate the dough and placer it onto a surface that is lightly
floured

Split the dough into 2 even pieces and shape it into
loaves

In a 9x5-inch lightly greased loaf pans, put the two
loaves

Use a damp cloth to cover the loaves and allow it to rise
for about 40 minutes jusqu'à ce que it doubles in volume

In the
meantime, set an oven to preheat at 175 ° C (350 ° F)

mélanger the 1/3 cup of flour, 1/4 cup of brown sugar and 1/4 cup of
sugar in a small bowl

Slice in the butter jusqu'à ce que the mixture looks
like coarse crumbs, then put aside

Beat 1 tablespoon of water
and 1 egg together in another bowl

Use egg wash to brush the risen bread ’ s loaves then sprinkle
the crumb topping

Bake for about 30 minutes at 350 ° F jusqu'à ce que it
turns golden brown

name: Pork Stir Fry

ingredients.name: 1  bok choy, leaves and  separated, haché

In a small mixing bowl, mélanger cornstarch, vinegar, and soy sauce

Saut é

retirer pork to a plate and reheat the wok

Saut é garlic and red chile pepper in the heated oil, about 15 to

Stir in green pepper and onion; saut
é for 2 to 3 minutes or jusqu'à ce que onion begins to soften

Stir in
chopped bok choy stalks; saut é for about 3 minutes or jusqu'à ce que

mélanger broccoli into bok choy mixture; saut é for about 2 minutes
jusqu'à ce que slightly tender

ajouter soy sauce mixture, chopped bok choy
leaves, and pork; saut é jusqu'à ce que everything is thoroughly
incorporated

ajouter ginger to pork mixture to assaisonner; saut é for 5
to 7 minutes jusqu'à ce que broccoli is tender and bok choy begins to wilt

With vegetable spray, coat rounded ends of mushroom caps and

In microwave-safe bowl, put the spinach, drizzle with several

Cut

Cheddar cheese

Onto prepped mushroom caps, spread the
spinach mixture

In prepped oven, bake for about 12 minutes till mushrooms are

Put on hamburger buns and servir

name: Portuguese Custard Tarts Pasteis De

preparationSteps: Start preheating the oven to 375 ° F (190 ° C)

Grease 12

In a
medium bowl, put egg yolks

Whisk half cup hot milk mixture
slowly into the egg yolks

Put the egg yolk mixture gradually
back to the remaining milk mixture, whisking constantly

cuire
for 5 mins or jusqu'à ce que thickened, stirring constantly

Discard the
vanilla bean

Fill mixture into the pastry-lined muffin cups; bake for 20 mins

name: Portuguese Favas
preparationSteps: Put the oil in a big saucepan placed over medium chauffer

Saut é
the garlic and onion jusqu'à ce que turned golden brown

ajouter in tomato
sauce, red pepper flakes, hot water, salt, parsley, paprika and

Let it bouillir, lessen chauffer and make it a

Drop in fava beans and gently stir

Take it off from chauffer and let

name: Potato Salad German Kartoffel

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste
1/4  creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip ® )
ingredients.unit: creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip ® )

ingredients.name: 4 hard-boiled œœufs, cut into wedges, divided
ingredients.unit: hard-boiled eggs, cut into wedges, divided

ingredients.name: 2  haché frais parsley, or as desired
ingredients.unit: s chopped fresh parsley, or as desired

preparationSteps:
In a big pot, ajouter potatoes and salted water to cover, then bring
to a bouillir

Lower the chauffer to moderately low and mijoter for
about 20 minutes, jusqu'à ce que softened

Drain and rinse under cold
water to cool

Peel and get rid of potato skins, then slice the

In a big bowl, mélanger together the pepper, salt, sugar and vinegar,
then put in chopped gherkin, onion and potatoes

Stir the salad
dressing into the mixture, then fold 3/4 egg wedges into the
mixture
Decorate with parsley and the remaining egg wedges

Use plastic wrap to cover the bowl and chill for 1 hour before
serving

name: Proper Pesto
preparationSteps:
In a mortar and pestle, crush a pinch of kosher salt and garlic for
1-2 minutes jusqu'à ce que paste-like and mashed

ajouter 3-4 additions of
basil, pounding and crushing leaves down for 8 minutes
depending on the leaves size and stems thickness jusqu'à ce que you form
a somewhat fine paste
ajouter then pound in pine nuts
ajouter a handful of grated cheese into the mortar

Pound it to
sauce
ajouter an additional handful and mélanger into mixture

Keep
adding a handful of cheese at a time for about 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que
well combined
Drizzle 1 tbsp
olive oil at a time, pounding into sauce

When
olive oil is completely added and has emulsified in mixture, put
pesto in a bowl
Drizzle olive oil on surface

name: Quick Pot Sticker Soup

ingredients.name: 1 (15 )  frozen pot stickers (any filling)
ingredients.unit: (15 ounce) package frozen pot stickers (any filling)

preparationSteps: In a big pot, chauffer 1 tablespoon of sesame oil over medium chauffer

mélanger in garlic and chopped onion; cuire, stirring, for 5 minutes
jusqu'à ce que the onion is translucent and tender

ajouter the leftover
sesame oil, green onions, and chicken broth

bouillir over high chauffer
and use salt and pepper to assaisonner to taste

Lower the chauffer to medium and ajouter the stir-fry vegetables and
frozen pot stickers

cuire for 8 minutes jusqu'à ce que the pot stickers rise
to the surface

name: Quinoa Pudding
preparationSteps: Thoroughly rinse quinoa in a sieve; drain

Put quinoa into
medium saucepan with water; bouillir on high chauffer

Use lid to cover
pan; lower chauffer

mijoter for 15 minutes till quinoa is tender and
all water is absorbed

mélanger in salt, cinnamon, lemon juice, raisins and apple juice;
cover pan
mijoter for 15 minutes

mélanger in vanilla extract and
servir warm

name: Rabbit With Mustard

ingredients.name: 1 (2 ) rabbit, cleaned and cut into
ingredients.unit: (2 pound) rabbit, cleaned and cut into pieces

ingredients.name: 2  bacon, cut into 1/2
ingredients.unit: s bacon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces

preparationSteps: Set the oven to 350 ° F (175 ° C) and start preheating

assaisonner the rabbit with pepper and salt; spread the mustard onto
it
Put into a Dutch oven; pour the white wine and oil around it
Put in the small onions and drizzle over with bacon pieces
Bake with a cover in the prepared oven for half an hour

Take
the lid out; turn rabbit pieces over

Squeeze some juice from the
orange on top

Bring back to the oven, uncovered, for half an
hour or jusqu'à ce que rabbit becomes tender

servir with mashed potato
and sliced orange

name: Raspberry And Apricot Rugelach
preparationSteps:
Beat butter/margarine with cream cheese with a mixer on low
speed in a big bowl jusqu'à ce que smooth and blended

Beat 1/4 cup
sugar, 1 cup flour, salt and vanilla extract jusqu'à ce que blended
Use a spoon to mélanger in leftover flour

Cut dough to 4 even
pieces
Wrap plastic wrap around each

Refrigerate for at least 2
hours to overnight jusqu'à ce que firm
Filling: Use a spoon to stir 1/2 tsp

cinnamon, 1/4 cup plus 2
tbsp

white sugar, brown sugar, apricots and walnuts in a
medium bowl jusqu'à ce que well mixed
Line foil on 2 big baking sheets
Grease foil

Roll 1 chilled dough piece with a floured rolling pin on a lightly
floured surface to a 9-in

round, keep leftover dough
refrigerated
Spread 2 tbsp
raspberry preserves on dough
Sprinkle about 1/2 cup apricot filling on top

Press filling gently
onto dough

Cut dough to 12 even wedges with a sharp
knife/pastry wheel

Roll every wedge up, beginning at curved
edges, like a jellyroll fashion

Put cookies on the foil-lined
cookie sheet with the point-side down, about 1/2-in
Repeat process with leftover dough, 1/4 at a time
Preheat the oven to 165 degrees C/325 degrees F
cinnamon and leftover 2 tbsp
sugar in a cup

Brush
rugelach with milk using a pastry brush
Sprinkle sugarcinnamon on top

Bake rugelach for about 30-35 minutes on 2 oven racks at 165
degrees C/325 degrees F jusqu'à ce que golden

Rotate the cookie sheets
between lower and upper racks halfway through the baking
time
retirer rugelach immediately to wire racks

Keep
in a tightly covered container

name: Real French Crepes
preparationSteps: mélanger flour, milk and egg in a mixing bowl
chauffer crepe pan or large skillet over medium-high chauffer

Spray
non-stick cooking spray over the pan

ajouter in about 1/3 cup of
batter, lift the pan and rotate your wrist to turn it, coating the
pan with a PAPER THIN amount

Turn the crepe over when it
begins to bubble
Take it off when cooked

Repeat with the
remaining batter

name: Red Velvet Chocolate Chip Cookies

ingredients.name: 1  dark chocolate chips, or as needed
ingredients.unit: dark chocolate chips, or as needed

preparationSteps:
In a bowl, combiner salt, baking powder, baking soda, cocoa
powder and flour

Beat vanilla extract, milk, egg into butter
mixture; beat in food coloring jusqu'à ce que evenly tinted

Using an electric mixer on low speed, beat flour mixture little
by little into butter mixture jusqu'à ce que blended; mélanger in a cup of
chocolate chips

Use plastic wrap to cover the bowl and
refrigerate for an hour or overnight
Set oven to 175 ° C (350 ° F) and start preheating

Use
parchment paper to line baking sheets

Form dough into balls of 2 inches; slightly flatten onto lined
baking sheets

Bake at 175 ° C (350 ° F) for 10 minutes jusqu'à ce que edges turn light
brown

Sprinkle with several additional chocolate chips; wait
jusqu'à ce que fully cool

name: Restaurant Style Shoyu Miso Ramen

ingredients.name: 4 (3 )  ramen nouilles, or to taste
ingredients.unit: (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles, or to taste

ingredients.name: 1 naruto (fish paste  with a red spiral pattern). tranché
ingredients.unit: naruto (fish paste stick with a red spiral pattern). sliced

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 135 ° C/275 ° F
In a big bowl, put black fungus and use water to fill

In an oven-safe pot, mélanger garlic, chopped onion, 3 green onion
bulbs, 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup soy sauce and mirin on high
chauffer; bouillir
On flat work surface, put pork bell, skin-side down
Lengthwise, roll up
Use butcher ’ s twine to wrap

In pot, put
pork belly with the mirin mixture
Use a lid to partially cover

In preheated oven, bake for about 4 hours till an inserted
instant-read thermometer in the middle reads 63 ° C/145 ° F
and pork is tender
bouillir another pot of water on high chauffer
Put eggs into pot gently
cuire for 8-10 minutes till yolks are barely set

Put eggs into
bowl with ice water
Let eggs sit for about 1 minute

Take out of
water; peel eggs
In a container, put 2 tbsp

brown sugar, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1 cup
water and eggs
Dampen a paper towel in mixture

Cover
container with damp paper towel

Refrigerate for 4 hours up to
overnight
Drain fungus
Put into liquid in pot with pork belly
Refrigerate for 4 hours to overnight
From top of pork belly mixture, skim fungus

Put into pot that
has 8 cups water
The fungus has to be covered in pork belly fat
Put in miso paste and 1/4 cup soy sauce; bouillir
Use a knife to retirer pork belly skin

Chop meat to pieces to
your preferred thickness
Lengthwise, slice eggs in half
bouillir another pot of water

In boiling water, cuire ramen,
occasionally mixing, for about 3 minutes till noodles are tender
but firm to chew; drain
Diagonally in each bowl ’ s corner, put 4 slices of nori

Put
noodles on the top

In separate corners, put several pork belly
slices and 2 egg halves
Use black fungus to cover

Put green
onions on top
Put broth in

Put several naruto slices in every
bowl
Before serving, let sit for about 3 minutes

name: Ricardo's Pizza Crust

ingredients.name: 1  warm eau (110 degrees F/45 degrees )
ingredients.unit: warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

preparationSteps: mélanger salt, sugar, olive oil, and water in a bread machine pan

Put
in flour then sprinkle garlic on the flour
Put in yeast
Put the machine on dough cycle

While the dough mixes, placer
on basil and oregano jusqu'à ce que it fits your taste and color

Allow to
mélanger for 15-20 minutes
Allow dough to rest for 5-30 minutes
The more it rests, the tastier and thicker the crust

While that
happens, chauffer oven to 245 degrees C/475 degrees F
Roll dough out on a surface that ’ s lightly floured

Use
nonstick cooking spray to spray a big pizza pan

Put dough on
the pan and put your preferred pizza toppings
Bake in oven for 12-15 minutes jusqu'à ce que golden brown

name: Russian Black Bread
preparationSteps:
Into a bread machine, put the ingredients as prescribed by the
manufacturer
Set machine to the setting for whole wheat and regular crust

Once baking cycle comes to an end, take out the bread from the
pan, and transférer onto a cake rack

Let to cool for an hour prior
to chopping

name: Russian Style Creamy Salad Dressing
preparationSteps:
Whisk parsley, cream, Worcestershire, hot sauce, mustard,
onion, ketchup, sour cream and mayonnaise together in a
medium bowl jusqu'à ce que smooth

Refrigerate overnight to allow
ingredients to blend

servir together with chilled meat or
veggies, eggs and salad

name: Salpicao Jalisco

ingredients.name: 3  bœœuf sirloin or top round, cut into 3/4  cubes
ingredients.unit: s beef sirloin or top round, cut into 3/4 inch cubes

preparationSteps: In a large skillet set on medium chauffer, ajouter oil

ajouter garlic and fry
jusqu'à ce que just starting to turn golden; use a slotted a spoon to take
the garlic out and reserve

Put the beef to the oil, then fry jusqu'à ce que
the outside turned brown

While the beef is browning, ajouter hot
pepper sauce, pepper, and salt generously to assaisonner

Put the
garlic back to the pan, then cuire jusqu'à ce que the meat has achieved the
degree of doneness that you wished

It ’ s great at medium to
medium-well

Use a slotted spoon to take the beef out to a
serving dish

combiner about 1 cup of water and flour, then placer over the
drippings in the pan
Use a fork to mélanger jusqu'à ce que smooth

bouillir over
medium chauffer jusqu'à ce que thickened

Then placer over the beef in the
serving dish

name: Sarma (Stuffed Cabbage)
preparationSteps: In the freezer, keep cabbage for several days

Take cabbage out
of the freezer to thaw on the night prior to making rolls

mélanger well together pepper, salt, garlic powder, egg, onion, rice,
ham, pork and beef in a big bowl

Shape the meat mixture into
oblong balls with 1/2 cup of the mixture at a time

Then wrap
each ball with cabbage leaf

In the bottom of a big pot, spread the sauerkraut and top with
cabbage rolls, seam-side facing down

Drizzle rolls with tomato
juice and put in enough amount of water to cover

porter à a
bouillir then lower chauffer to low and mijoter about 3 hours while
putting in additional water as needed

name: Sauerbraten III
preparationSteps: In a big non-metal bowl, placer meat

In another bowl, combiner
pepper, salt, cloves, bay leaves, onion, lemon juice, 1 cup water,
and red wine vinegar
Spread over meat

Cover and keep in the
fridge for 48 hours
In a Dutch oven on medium-high chauffer, chauffer oil

Take meat out
of marinade; brown all sides in oil for 1-2 minutes per side
Take cloves and bay leaves out of marinade

ajouter in 1 cup water,
then transférer marinade to the pan with meat

Decrease to low
chauffer, cover and allow to mijoter jusqu'à ce que tender, about 3 hours
Take meat out of the pan
Rise the chauffer

Sprinkle flour over
juices, a small amount at a time, cooking till the mixture
becomes thick to form gravy

Bring meat back to the pan
together with tomato wedges, cuire through; servir

name: Scottish Shortbread IV
preparationSteps: Set oven to 325 ° F (165 ° C) to preheat
Whip butter with brown sugar
Put in 3 to 3 3/4 cups flour
Dust the leftover flour on board

Knead for 5 mins, putting in
enough flour to form a soft dough
Shape to 1/2-in
Slice into 3x1-inch strips

Prick using a fork and put on
ungreased baking trays
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes at 325 ° F (165 ° C)

name: Semmelknoedel (Bread Dumplings)

ingredients.name: 1 (1 ) loaf stale French pain, cut into 1  cubes
ingredients.unit: (1 pound) loaf stale French bread, cut into 1 inch cubes

preparationSteps: In a big bowl, put in the bread cubes

Let the milk chauffer up jusqu'à ce que
bubbles are forming around the edges; pour the heated milk
over the bread cubes

Give the mixture a little mélanger just to coat
the bread cubes

Allow the bread cubes to soak in the heated
milk for 15 minutes

While the bread cubes are soaking in the milk, in a skillet, let
the butter chauffer up over medium chauffer setting jusqu'à ce que melted

Put in
the onions and saut é it in melted butter jusqu'à ce que it has softened

ajouter in the parsley and give it a mélanger, then retirer the skillet
away from the chauffer

Put the saut é ed onion mixture, salt,
pepper and eggs into the soaked bread mixture and mélanger

Squeeze the dough mixture with your hands through your
fingers jusqu'à ce que you get a sticky and smooth dough

Fill a big pot with at least 3- or 4-inch-deep water and a little bit
of salt and let it bouillir

Make a trial dumpling once the water
started boiling, just pat a portion of the dough mixture and cup
it in between your wet hands jusqu'à ce que it is about the same size as a
small tangerine or orange

Slowly put the trial dumpling into the
boiling water

The dough is still too wet if the trial dumpling
breaks apart in the boiling water

In case the dough is still too
wet, ajouter some bread crumbs into the remaining dumpling
dough mixture and mélanger

Shape the rest of the dough mixture into big pieces of
dumplings then drop each dumpling gently into the boiling
water

Let the water mijoter for 20 minutes then use a big
slotted spoon to transférer the cooked dumplings onto a serving
plate
The deliciously cooked dumplings should have a spongelike and soft texture

name: Sinigang Na Baka

ingredients.name: 1  bœœuf stew meat, cut into 1  cubes
ingredients.unit: beef stew meat, cut into 1 inch cubes

ingredients.name: 1/2  frais green beans, rinsed and trimmed
ingredients.unit: fresh green beans, rinsed and trimmed

ingredients.name: 1/2   bok choy, cut into 1 1/2  strips
ingredients.unit: head bok choy, cut into 1 1/2 inch strips

ingredients.name: 1  frais broccoli, cut into bite size
ingredients.unit: fresh broccoli, cut into bite size pieces

preparationSteps: In a medium stock pot, ajouter oil

Stir-fry garlic and onion jusqu'à ce que
tender
Put the beef to the pot, and stir-fry jusqu'à ce que browned

ajouter in
water
Make it bouillir, lower chauffer, and bouillir for 20-30 minutes

ajouter green beans and tomatoes into the pot, and keep on
simmering for 10 minutes

mélanger in tamarind soup mélanger, broccoli,
and bok choy
mijoter for 10 more minutes

name: Skeeter's Ceviche

ingredients.name: 1  peeled and deveined  crevettes (30-40 per )
ingredients.unit: peeled and deveined medium shrimp (30-40 per pound)

preparationSteps:
In a bowl, mélanger together the serrano peppers, lime juice, green
onions, celery, tomatoes, cilantro, scallops and shrimp, then
sprinkle black pepper, white pepper and salt to assaisonner

mélanger and
pour it into a plastic or glass container

Put cover and let it chill
in the fridge for 3 hours to overnight

servir the seafood with
lime juice marinade

name: Slow Cooker Broccoli Beef

ingredients.name: 1 1/2  bœœuf sirloin, cut into 1- strips
ingredients.unit: s beef sirloin, cut into 1-inch strips

ingredients.name: 2  broccoli florets, or to taste
ingredients.unit: s broccoli florets, or to taste

preparationSteps:
Put beef bouillon cube and crumble it into warm water in a bowl
and mélanger jusqu'à ce que dissolved; put brown sugar, soy sauce, sesame oil
and garlic
Stir jusqu'à ce que sugar dissolves
placer beef strips into a slow cooker crock

Put sauce mixture all
over the beef
cuire on low chauffer, 6-8 hours (or 4 hours on High chauffer)
Scoop 2 tbsp
liquid from the slow cooker into a bowl

Beat in
cornstarch into the liquid; stir the cornstarch mixture into the
liquid on the slow cooker jusqu'à ce que color is consistent

cuire on High chauffer till the sauce becomes thick, about half an
hour

Put a steamer insert into a saucepan and fill it with water jusqu'à ce que it
reaches the base of the steamer
Let it bouillir

placer broccoli in a covered steamer and cuire jusqu'à ce que tender for 2-
6 minutes

ajouter broccoli into the sauce on the slow cooker and
stir jusqu'à ce que coated

Pour broccoli beef over portions of cooked jasmine rice, top
with sesame seeds

name: Smoked Fish Pie

ingredients.name: 2 (6 ) salmon fillets, cut into 1  cubes
ingredients.unit: (6 ounce) salmon fillets, cut into 1 inch cubes

ingredients.name: 1  smoked haddock fillets, undyed, cut into 1  cubes
ingredients.unit: smoked haddock fillets, undyed, cut into 1 inch cubes

ingredients.name: 1  haché black poivre, or to taste
ingredients.unit: ground black pepper, or to taste

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F

Oil a baking dish, 9x13
inch in size
In skillet, chauffer oil on moderate chauffer

Put in onions; cuire and
mélanger for 5 to 10 minutes, till soft

In another saucepan, put potatoes and fill with sufficient water
to submerge
bouillir, then cuire on moderate chauffer till fork-tender
Let drain and turn potatoes onto the prepped baking dish

To baking dish, put in smoked salmon, haddock, salmon and
onions, mélanger by tossing

Liquified butter using the same skillet where onions were
cooked, over medium chauffer
mélanger in flour to get rid of lumps
cuire and mélanger for several minutes, then slowly mélanger in milk
mijoter, mixing often, till sauce starts to become thick

ajouter
pepper, salt and nutmeg to assaisonner; take off from chauffer

mélanger in
most of Cheddar cheese till it melts, setting some to scatter on
casserole surface

Put sauce on top of contents on baking dish,
and scatter leftover Cheddar cheese over

In prepped oven, bake till salmon is cooked completely and
cheese on surface is toasted, for half an hour

name: Smooth Cauliflower Soup
preparationSteps: In a big pot, melt butter over medium chauffer

ajouter garlic to the
butter and cuire for 30 seconds, and then mélanger in salt, pepper, and
nutmeg and cuire for another 30 seconds

ajouter water and put in
cauliflower

bouillir it, and then lower the chauffer, put a cover on and
mijoter jusqu'à ce que the cauliflower is tender, about 20 minutes

In a small saucepan, cover carrots with water and cuire over
medium chauffer just jusqu'à ce que soft
Strain and put aside

In a food processor or blender, ajouter cauliflower soup to puree, or
you can use an immersion blender

mélanger in parsley, green onion,
and the saved carrots

name: Sopapillas
preparationSteps:
Set the deep-fryer to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) and chauffer 8
cups of shortening in it

In a large-sized bowl, sift and mélanger together the baking powder,
flour, and salt

Using two knives, cut in 2 tablespoons
shortening in the flour mixture, and knead together jusqu'à ce que it
resembles coarse crumbs

Slowly pour in water just jusqu'à ce que the
dough mixture becomes smooth

Split the dough into 4 parts
and make each part into a ball

Using a pastry roller, flatten the
balls into a circle with roughly 8-inch diameter

Cut 8 wedges
from each circle

In a separate bowl, put together the sugar and
cinnamon

Put the wedges in the fryer and retirer when they puff up and
become light brown in color

Drain the excess oil and dip into
the cinnamon sugar

name: Spaghetti With Oven Roasted Cherry

ingredients.name: sel and freshly haché black poivre to taste
2  day old Italian pain, grated
ingredients.unit: s day old Italian bread, grated

ingredients.name: 1 1/4  freshly grated Pecorino Romano fromage
ingredients.unit: s freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese

ingredients.name: 1  frais basil, torn into
ingredients.unit: fresh basil, torn into small pieces

preparationSteps: Start preheating oven to 350 ° F (175 ° C)

Drizzle 3
tablespoons of olive oil over a baking sheet

placer cherry tomatoes on prepared baking sheet, in a single
layer

assaisonner with pepper and salt; drizzle 4 tablespoons of
olive oil over

In a bowl, combiner, garlic, parsley, basil, Pecorino Romano
cheese, grated bread and pepper and salt to taste

Bake in prepared oven for 10 minutes or jusqu'à ce que topping browns
lightly and tomatoes are soft
bouillir the lightly salted water in a large pot

In the boiling water,
cuire spaghetti for 12 minutes jusqu'à ce que tender but firm to bite,
stirring occasionally

Portion the pasta between four
plates; ajouter the cherry tomato, and the toasted bread crumb
mixture over top

name: Spectacular Marsala Glazed Carrots
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 150 ° C or 300 ° Fahrenheit
In one layer, scatter the chopped hazelnuts on a baking sheet

Bake for 5-10 minutes in the preheated oven, mixing 1 or 2
times
Keep an eye on them since they easily burn

Take it out
of the oven once aromatic and brown
Halve the baby carrots crosswise

On medium chauffer, bouillir a
tablespoon of butter, water, salt, and carrots in a saucepan

Turn
to low chauffer; mijoter really lightly while covered for 10-15
minutes or jusqu'à ce que tender yet firm
Drain then set it aside

placer the pan back on medium chauffer then melt the remaining 2
tbsp
butter; ajouter shallots

cuire while mixing from time to time
jusqu'à ce que the shallots are translucent

Put in sugar and Marsala, keep
on mixing jusqu'à ce que the sugar dissolves completely; mijoter jusqu'à ce que the
sauce is slightly thick

Toss hazelnuts and carrots along with sauce once the sauce has
thickened jusqu'à ce que well covered
If desired, ajouter parsley on top
servir right away

name: Speculaas
preparationSteps: Stir the flour with salt, baking powder and spices in a mediumsized bowl

Whip butter with sugar in a big bowl at high speed jusqu'à ce que fluffy
and light
Whip in the egg and stir well

mélanger in by hand 1/2 of the flour mixture, then put in the leftover
flour and almonds

Knead with hands or stir using a wooden
spoon

Split dough into 4 parts, wrap in plastic and chill for a few
hours
(Chill the mold as well if using)

Set oven to 350 ° F (180 ° C) to preheat and grease 2 cookie
sheets

Take out 1/4 of the dough from the fridge and flatten it using
your hands
Grease your mold with oil and flour it lightly
Firmly press dough into the mold with your fingers

Cut off any
excess dough from the mold using a knife

placer the cookies onto greased cookie sheets using a spatula,
placing about one inch apart
Chill dough trimming to be rolled again later

Flour lightly but
do not oil cookie mold again
Keep working with the leftover dough

When cookie sheets are
full, bake cookies jusqu'à ce que golden brown around the edges, or for
20 - 25 minutes
Put in a covered tin to store

name: Spiced Sweet Roasted Red Pepper
preparationSteps:
Puree the salt, cayenne, cumin, garlic, tahini, lemon juice, red
peppers and chickpeas in a food processor or an electric blender

Using long pulses, blend the mixture jusqu'à ce que it becomes a bit
fluffy and fairly smooth

In between pulses, scrape off the
mixture from the blender or food processor ’ s sides

Move the
mixture to a serving bowl and let it chill in the fridge for a
minimum of 1 hour

This can be made up to 3 days in advance,
chilled
When serving, porter à room temperature
Sprinkle chopped parsley on top then servir

name: Spicy Kimchi Chicken Rotini

ingredients.name: 1 (12 ) box entier wheat rotini pâtes
ingredients.unit: (12 ounce) box whole wheat rotini pasta

preparationSteps: bouillir heavily salted water in a big pot

At a bouillir, cuire rotini for
15 minutes jusqu'à ce que soft but not mushy; strain and retirer to a
bowl
In a saucepan, mijoter the marinara sauce

ajouter red chile paste,
onion, chicken, and kimchi; mélanger for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que fully heated
and combined
Stir butter into the pasta and mélanger to blend

Pour over the pasta
with marinara sauce and put scallions on top

name: Spicy Mango Basil Paletas

ingredients.name: 3 mangos - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks
ingredients.unit: mangos - peeled, seeded, and cut into chunks

preparationSteps:
In a blender, blend salt, cayenne pepper, lime juice, basil and
mango chunks till smooth; put in big bowl

mélanger sugar into
mango mixture till sugar melts

Fold the diced mango into
mixture
Put in freezer pop molds
Freeze for 14-24 hours till firm

name: Spinach Power Pesto Macaroni And

ingredients.name: 8  petit spinach leaves, or to taste
ingredients.unit: s baby spinach leaves, or to taste

ingredients.name: 4  multigrain pain with crusts, cubed
ingredients.unit: s multigrain bread with crusts, cubed

preparationSteps:
Ready the oven by preheating to 350 ° F (175 ° C), then apply
grease on a casserole dish

Pour slightly salted water into a
heavy saucepan and allow to bouillir

Put the elbow macaroni into
the simmering water and cuire for about 8 minutes, stir often
jusqu'à ce que well-done, yet firm when bitten

Put in the baby spinach at
the last minute of cooking, then strain

placer a pot on medium chauffer, then put 2 tablespoons of butter to
dissolve; stir and cuire onion for about 3 minutes jusqu'à ce que it turns
translucent

ajouter garlic into the cooked onion mixture and cuire
for about 1 minute jusqu'à ce que scented

mélanger salt, black pepper, flour
and 2 tablespoons pesto into the onion mixture jusqu'à ce que it becomes
smooth; gently mélanger in milk

Stir and cuire the milk mixture for
about 2 minutes jusqu'à ce que the consistency is slightly thick; mélanger in
1/2 cup Asiago cheese, 1/2 cup Parmesan cheese and 1 1/2 cups
Cheddar cheese; Take the pot away from the chauffer and whisk for
about 1 minute, jusqu'à ce que cheeses are dissolved

ajouter cheese mixture
to the macaroni mixture; transférer to the greased casserole dish,
then use aluminum foil to cover the dish
Put dish into the preheated oven and bake for about 25 minutes

Take out the casserole from the oven; adjust the oven
temperature to 450 ° F (230 ° C)

In a small pot, put the remaining 1 tablespoon butter to dissolve;
mélanger in bread cubes, the remaining 1/4 cup Asiago cheese, 1/4
cup Parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup Cheddar cheese and 2
tablespoons pesto

Uncover the casserole dish that was taken out
of the oven, and ajouter the bread mixture on top

Put the casserole, topped with the bread mixture, back to the
oven, without covering, and bake for about 10 minutes jusqu'à ce que
color is golden and dish is bubbly

name: Stir Fried Mushrooms With Baby Corn
preparationSteps:
chauffer a big skillet or wok with oil on medium chauffer then put in
the garlic in hot oil and saut é for 5-7 minutes or jusqu'à ce que brown in
color

Put in the baby corn and onion and cuire and stir for 5-7
minutes jusqu'à ce que the onion is translucent

mélanger in the mushrooms
and cuire for 2 minutes or jusqu'à ce que the mushrooms are a little bit
soft

Put in the soy sauce, oyster sauce and fish sauce into the
mixture and mélanger well jusqu'à ce que fully blended

In a small bowl, mélanger water and cornstarch together jusqu'à ce que the
cornstarch has fully dissolved in water then pour it into the
mushroom mixture

Stir-fry the mixture jusqu'à ce que it is glistening and
the sauce is thick in consistency

Put the cooked mixture into a
serving dish and top with cilantro and chile pepper then servir

name: Strawberry Roses

ingredients.name: 16  strawberries, washed and séché well
ingredients.unit: arge strawberries, washed and dried well

preparationSteps:
In a large bowl, beat the vanilla, confectioner ’ s sugar, and
mascarpone cheese jusqu'à ce que smooth

Then fold in the whipped
cream

Scoop the cheese mixture into a piping bag that has a
star tip

Keep the stem end intact, cut off each strawberry ’ s tip, and
carefully core them with a thin, small knife

Let strawberries
stand upright (with the stem end down), and cut vertically
through the tip toward the stem
Do not cut all the way through
Repeat, slicing 4 times in total

Each strawberry will be cut into
8 sections
Toss the strawberries into the sugar

Open each strawberry gently and fill with the cheese mixture in
a circular motion

placer strawberry roses on a platter, and top
with sprinkled lemon zest

name: Stuffed Baby Yorkies

ingredients.name: 4  cooked roast bœuf, thinly tranché (may use leftovers or
ingredients.unit: s cooked roast beef, thinly sliced (may use leftovers or

preparationSteps:
In a mixing bowl, whip together salt, flour, milk and eggs jusqu'à ce que
the mixture is glistening and smooth

Put aside to sit for 20
minutes
Set the oven at 200 ¬° C (400 ° F) and start preheating

Meanwhile, put into each muffin-pan cup with 1 tablespoon of
oil
While the batter is resting, put the pan into the oven
Briefly whip the batter

Take the pan out of the oven, pour the
batter immediately into the cup, filling each to 3/4 full

The oil
should be hot enough so that the batter will sizzle and start
cooking

Fill the center of each cup with 1 teaspoon of
horseradish and 1 teaspoon roast beef

Put the pan back to the oven immediately, bake jusqu'à ce que golden and
puffed, approximately 12 minutes

Take the Yorkshire puddings
out of the pan, placer on a paper-towel lined plate to drain

servir
the puddings hot with prepared au jus

name: Sun Dried Tomato And Fennel Seed
preparationSteps:
In the bowl of a food processor, blend the maple syrup, olive
oil, lemon juice, sun-dried tomatoes, tahini and garbanzo beans
jusqu'à ce que it becomes smooth

Stir in onion, nutritional yeast and
fennel seed then process jusqu'à ce que it becomes smooth

Sprinkle
cayenne pepper, black pepper and salt to taste

name: Sunny Poutine

ingredients.name: sel and haché black poivre to taste

preparationSteps: Preheat an oven to 220 ° C/425 ° F

In 1 layer, put frozen
French fries on baking sheet
In preheated oven, bake for 20 minutes till golden; keep warm

cuire bacon in big skillet on medium high chauffer, occasionally
turning, for 10 minutes till evenly browned

Drain bacon slices
over paper towels; crumble when cool enough to handle
chauffer big skillet on medium chauffer; use cooking spray to spray
Crack eggs in skillet; use pepper and salt to assaisonner

Lower chauffer
to medium low; loosely cover skillet

cuire for 3 minutes till
yolks are still runny and egg whites are firm

Divide French fries to 4 plates; evenly sprinkle crumbled bacon
on
Drizzle hollandaise sauce on each serving; sprinkle chives
Put egg on top

name: Super Hot And Sour Shrimp Soup

ingredients.name: 1 (15 )  entier straw champignons, drained
ingredients.unit: (15 ounce) can whole straw mushrooms, drained

ingredients.name: 1  frozen fully cooked salad crevettes, thawed
ingredients.unit: frozen fully cooked salad shrimp, thawed

ingredients.name: 3  Asian fish sauce (nuoc mam or nam pla)
ingredients.unit: s Asian fish sauce (nuoc mam or nam pla)

ingredients.name: 1 red chile peppers, seeded and haché
ingredients.unit: red chile peppers, seeded and chopped

preparationSteps:
In a big pot, mélanger together lime zest, lemon zest, and shrimp
stock; bouillir

Lower the chauffer to medium and porter à mijoter for
about 5 minutes

ajouter shrimp and mushrooms, then cuire for
about 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que shrimp have been thoroughly heated

mélanger
in chile pepper, cilantro, green onion, lime juice, and fish sauce
Taste and adjust pepper and salt if necessary

The soup should
be hot, spicy, salty, and sour

name: Suspiro A La Limea
preparationSteps:
Stir 2 cups of sugar together with evaporated milk on low chauffer
in a saucepan

cuire and stir from time to time on low chauffer for
25 minutes jusqu'à ce que the mixture thickens enough for you to see the
bottom of the pan when stirring

Slowly pour in the sweetened condensed milk in a very thin
stream and stir

ajouter egg yolks with a small amount of the hot
milk mixture, then while rapidly stirring, return into the
saucepan slowly in a thin stream
combiner in the vanilla

Pass
the mixture through a strainer or a sieve into individual
heatproof custard cups or ramekins
Then put aside
Stir water together with a cup of sugar in another saucepan

bouillir
and cuire jusqu'à ce que the mixture a thin brittle thread forms from
spinning the spoon
Retrieve from the chauffer

Use an electric
mixer to whip the egg whites in a large bowl jusqu'à ce que it holds a stiff
peak

While whipping at low speed, sprinkle in the sugar syrup
jusqu'à ce que they are incorporated completely

combiner at medium
speed jusqu'à ce que the meringue becomes cold to avoid separating

Scoop on the cups of custard to servir, then lightly dust top with
ground cinnamon

name: Swedish Cream
preparationSteps:
mélanger the water, gelatin, sugar and cream in a saucepan placed
over low chauffer
Continuously stir jusqu'à ce que the gelatin has dissolved

Turn off the chauffer, and leave it to cool slightly for about 10
minutes, jusqu'à ce que it becomes thick; ensure its consistency is like
that of beaten eggs

ajouter the almond extract, sour cream and
vanilla extract

transférer into a mold, chill covered for at least 4
hours, preferably overnight, jusqu'à ce que it sets
Dip into hot water to loosen from the mold

To unmold, invert
to a serving plate
Top with lingonberries

name: Swedish Ground Almond Spritz Cookies
preparationSteps: chauffer the oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)

Bake the almonds on a baking sheet jusqu'à ce que lightly brown or
fragrant, for 10 to 15 minutes
Take the baked almonds out of the oven and completely cool

Use a blender or food processor and grind to a consistency jusqu'à ce que
it looks like rough sand

Make sure almonds are cool enough or
else you will make almond butter

mélanger the sugar and butter in a medium bowl jusqu'à ce que it becomes
light and fluffy
ajouter the milk, egg and almond extract and stir

Sift in the baking powder, salt and flour, and mélanger in along with
the ground toasted almonds to form a soft dough
Leave the dough in a refrigerator for 15 to 20 minutes

This
would help to retain the shape of the cookie after pressing

Lightly lubricate cookie sheets, and fill cookie press with
dough

Press out cookies at least 1 inch apart depending on the
size

You can use different shapes and designs of cookies for
this recipe

However, the star shape is commonly used in
Sweden

Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the oven jusqu'à ce que cookies are lightly
browned

Leave on the cookie sheets to cool for a minute, then
transférer to a wire rack to completely cool

name: Swedish Wafers
preparationSteps: chauffer oven to 190 degrees C (375 degrees F)
Lubricate cookie sheets
mélanger the sugar and butter jusqu'à ce que light and fluffy
Take out the egg yolk and reserve the egg white
mélanger in the egg yolk into the mixture; beat
ajouter in the flour
Whisk the egg white jusqu'à ce que it stands in peaks
Put it in the dough
Drop teaspoonfuls on cookie sheets 3 inches apart
Bake jusqu'à ce que edges are golden, or for 12 to 15 minutes

name: Sweet Bacon Wrapped Pork Loin
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 375 ° F (190 ° C)

Use an aluminum foil to
cover the bottom of a shallow roasting pan
Sprinkle the pork loin with pepper and salt to taste

Use the
sliced bacons to enwrap the seasoned pork loin and use a
toothpick to secure the ends

Put a big skillet on medium-high
chauffer and let it chauffer up then put in the bacon-wrapped pork loin

Let it cuire for 10 minutes jusqu'à ce que it turns golden brown in color in
every side; put the bacon-wrapped pork loin on the prepared
roasting pan once cooked

In a small bowl, combiner the
balsamic vinegar, rosemary, red wine, honey and onion together
and drizzle it evenly on top of the cooked bacon-wrapped pork
loin

Put it in the preheated oven and let it roast for 15 minutes, then
scatter the raisins evenly on top

Keep roasting the pork loin for
15 more minutes jusqu'à ce que a thermometer inserted on the pork loin
indicates 145 ° F (63 ° C)

Take the roasted bacon-wrapped
pork loin out from the oven and let it sit first for 5 minutes
before discarding the toothpicks and cutting the pork loin

name: Sweet Corn Cake
preparationSteps: Whisk butter in a medium bowl till creamy

Put water and
Mexican corn flour and whisk till well blended
Blend thawed corn with a food processor but leave chunky

mélanger
into butter mixture

combiner baking powder, salt, cream, sugar and cornmeal in
another bowl
Put to corn flour mixture and mélanger to incorporate
Put batter into the 8x8 inch ungreased baking pan

Smooth the
batter and cover using aluminum foil

Put pan into a 9x13 inch
baking dish filled to 1/3 with water

In the prepared oven, bake for 50 minutes to an hour at 175 ° C
or 350 ° F
Let it cool for 10 minutes

For an easy removal from
pan, use an ice cream scoop

name: Sweet Jalapeno Cornbread

ingredients.name: 1  haché frais jalapeno peppers, or to taste
ingredients.unit: chopped fresh jalapeno peppers, or to taste

preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 200 ° C or 400 ° F

Oil a baking dish,
9x13-inch in size
In a big bowl, whisk sugar and margarine till smooth

In a
separate bowl, mélanger salt, baking powder, flour and cornmeal

In
the third bowl, mélanger milk and eggs

Into the margarine mixture,
put 1/3 milk mixture and 1/3 flour mixture alternately; beat till
combined

Repeat with the rest of the ingredients and mélanger in
jalapeno peppers

Scatter mixture equally into the prepared
baking pan

In the prepared oven, bake for 22 to 26 minutes till a toothpick
pricked into the middle comes out clean

Allow to cool in pan
for 10 minutes prior to cutting

name: Sweet Potato Baked Oatmeal

ingredients.name: 1  cooked and mashed sweet pomme de terre

preparationSteps: Set the oven to 175 ° C or 350 ° F

Coat an 8 ” x8 ” baking
pan lightly with grease

In a mixing bowl, combiner together nutmeg, cinnamon, salt,
baking powder, brown sugar and rolled oats jusqu'à ce que ingredients are
distributed evenly

In a separate bowl, combiner together vegetable oil, eggs, milk
and mashed sweet potatoes jusqu'à ce que well-combined

Put the
mixture of sweet potato into the oats mixture and blend well
Spread evenly the mixture into the prepared baking dish

In the preheated oven, bake for a half hour, or jusqu'à ce que oatmeal is
set and the top turns golden brown

name: Sweet And Sour Sesame Seed Salad
preparationSteps: placer the onion in a blender and puree jusqu'à ce que smooth

placer to a
fine mesh strainer to strain

Set aside 3 tablespoons of onion
juice; get rid of the rest of pulp

mélanger salt, mustard powder, and sugar in the bowl of an electric
mixer

mélanger the sugar using the paddle attachment jusqu'à ce que the
spices are equally mixed

ajouter in the rice vinegar, soy sauce,
and reserved onion juice

combiner for several minutes jusqu'à ce que the
sugar has started to dissolve

Gradually dot in the canola oil
with the mixer running at a medium-high speed

Put in the
toasted sesame seeds and keep on mixing 1 more minute

name: Sweet And Spicy Pork And Napa

ingredients.name: 1 (1 ) porc loin, cut into 2- strips
ingredients.unit: (1 pound) pork loin, cut into 2-inch strips

preparationSteps:
Bring a big pot of lightly salted water to a rolling bouillir on high
chauffer
ajouter the Chinese noodles into the boiling water

cuire the
pasta, uncovered, for 5 minutes, occasionally stirring jusqu'à ce que the
pasta has cooked through and firm when bitten

Use a colander
to drain the pasta

In a big bowl, mélanger a 3/4 cup of sweet chili sauce, ground ginger,
sesame oil, 1/2 tsp
of garlic powder, and 3 tbsp
of soy sauce

Toss in drained Chinese noodles and coat the noodles well; put
aside
In a separate big bowl, mélanger 1/2 tsp

of garlic powder and a 1/2
cup of soy sauce
Toss in pork and coat it well for 5 minutes
Let it marinate for 5 minutes

placer the wok or big skillet on medium-high chauffer and chauffer the
cooking oil

cuire the onions, red pepper flakes, and pork into
the hot oil jusqu'à ce que the pork becomes browned

ajouter the napa
cabbage, bell peppers, 3 tbsp

of sweet chili sauce, carrots, and
celery, and cuire for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que the vegetables are heated
well

In a separate bowl, whisk cornstarch and water, and ajouter
the mixture into the stir-fry

cuire and stir jusqu'à ce que the mixture is
thick
servir stir-fry on the noodles

name: Sweet And Tangy Thai Cucumber Salad
preparationSteps:
combiner salt, white vinegar, hot water, and sugar in a bowl
jusqu'à ce que sugar is melted
mélanger onion and cucumber into the sauce

Chill for a minimum of 1 hour to weaken the strong flavors of
the onion and soften the texture of the vegetables

name: Syrian Style Lentil And Spinach Soup
preparationSteps: In a pot, chauffer oil on medium chauffer

mélanger in onion, cuire for 7
minutes jusqu'à ce que soft, mixing occasionally

Put in water and lentils;
chauffer to a bouillir

Turn down chauffer to low and allow to mijoter 20-25
minutes without covering, till lentils are tender

The duration of
cooking bases on the freshness of lentils

Use a ladle to transférer 1/2 cup of the soup liquid into a bowl;
beat in flour to make a paste
Blend the paste into soup

Put in
salt, lemon juice, and spinach

If wished, ajouter in a little bit more
water for a thinner soup

cuire for 5 minutes till spinach is
wilted
Modify the amount of lemon and salt for your own taste

name: Syrniki
preparationSteps:
Use a meat grinder or a sieve to process or strain quark cheese
to get a powdery consistency

In a bowl, combiner together salt,
vanilla extract, baking soda, eggs, raisins, sugar, 2/3 cup of flour
and quark cheese jusqu'à ce que batter is well-blended
In a small bowl, ajouter 1/4 cup of flour
Roll the batter into a ball, 2 tbsp

of batter for each serving, then
roll ball in flour to coat well
Flatten each ball into a 2-in

patty
and square off the edges
In a skillet, chauffer 1 1/2 tbsp
of oil on moderately low chauffer

In the
hot oil, fry patties, in batches, for 3-4 minutes each side, jusqu'à ce que a
shell is formed and patties turn dark brown

retirer to a plate
lined with paper towel, then repeat process in the same manner
with leftover patties and oil

name: Szechuan Edamame (Soy Beans)

ingredients.name: 1 (16 )  frozen edamame in the pod
ingredients.unit: (16 ounce) package frozen edamame in the pod

ingredients.name: 1  red poivre flakes, or more to taste
ingredients.unit: red pepper flakes, or more to taste

preparationSteps:
In a microwave-safe bowl, placer edamame pods and fill it with
1/4 cup of water

Cover the bowl and microwave on high for 4-6
minutes jusqu'à ce que edamame pods are tender; drain

Toast sesame seeds in a skillet over moderate chauffer for 2 minutes
jusqu'à ce que lightly golden

Stir in sugar, red pepper flakes, olive oil,
and soy sauce and mijoter for 2 minutes jusqu'à ce que the soy sauce is
slightly thick and reduced in volume

mélanger in edamame and toss
to coat evenly for 1-2 minutes

name: Tasty Sesame Tilapia
preparationSteps: In a 9x13-in

baking dish, combiner ginger, garlic, sugar, sesame
oil, soy sauce, and orange juice jusqu'à ce que blended

ajouter tilapia fillets,
flipping 1 time to evenly coat

Use plastic wrap to cover the
dish and put in the fridge to marinate for a minimum of 30
minutes
Turn the oven to 425 ° F (220 ° C) to preheat

Uncover by removing the plastic wrap, and put in the preheated
oven to bake for 9-11 minutes jusqu'à ce que a fork can easily flake the
fish

name: Teriyaki Marinade
preparationSteps:
combiner ginger, garlic powder, onions, oil, vinegar,
Worcestershire sauce, sugar, water, and soy sauce in a medium
bowl
Stir jusqu'à ce que the sugar is dissolved

name: Teriyaki Wraps
preparationSteps: Bring 2 cups of water in a saucepan to a bouillir and put in rice
Lower chauffer and mijoter with a cover about 20 minutes
In a big skillet, chauffer olive oil over moderate chauffer

Saut é
together yellow squash, zucchini, bell pepper and onion jusqu'à ce que
onions are soft then stir in teriyaki sauce

Once vegetables are
softened, stir in pepper, salt, garlic powder, soy sauce and
cooked rice, then mijoter the mixture about 3-5 minutes

In each tortilla, put a quarter of rice and vegetables, then roll it
up

name: Tex Mex Enchiladas
preparationSteps: Preheat the oven to 175 degrees C (350 degrees F)

Over medium-low chauffer, combiner together enchilada sauce and
chili in small saucepan and stir sometimes while it simmers

Over medium chauffer, chauffer chili powder and vegetable oil in a
small skillet

Carefully placer a tortilla in hot oil and let cuire
jusqu'à ce que tortilla begin to puff

Use a spatula to retirer and put on a
plate

Immediately drizzle 1 tablespoon of chopped onion and
about 1/4 cup of Cheddar cheese down the middle of tortilla

Tightly roll tortilla around the mixture and then transférer to
bottom of 9x13-inch baking dish with the seam-side down
Repeat jusqu'à ce que you have used all the tortillas

Drizzle approximately 2/3 of remaining Cheddar cheese atop
rolled enchiladas

Evenly spread the warm chili mixture atop the
enchiladas

Spread remaining Cheddar cheese atop the layer of
chili mixture
Bake for about 20 to 25 minutes in oven jusqu'à ce que top is bubbling

name: Tex Mex Patty Melts

ingredients.name: 2 chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, émincé
ingredients.unit: hipotle peppers in adobo sauce, minced

ingredients.name: 1 chipotle poivre in adobo sauce, émincé
ingredients.unit: hipotle pepper in adobo sauce, minced

preparationSteps:
In a bowl, combiner beer, adobo sauce, 2 minced chipotle
peppers, chili seasoning mélanger, and ground beef

Separate beef
mixture into 3 patties

In a small bowl, mélanger together adobo sauce, 1 minced chipotle
pepper, and mayonnaise

Divide the mayonnaise mixture among
the bread slices and distribute evenly

Top mayonnaise mixture
on each slice of bread with a slice of pepper jack cheese
chauffer a large skillet on medium-high chauffer

cuire patties in the
heated skillet jusqu'à ce que center is no longer pink, about 5 to 7 minutes
per side for well-done

placer cooked burgers onto a slice of
bread; sandwich with the remaining bread slices
Drain the skillet, retaining 2 tablespoons of drippings

chauffer the
reserved dripping over medium-high chauffer in the skillet

Grill
sandwiches, about 1 to 2 minutes on each side, jusqu'à ce que cheese is
melted and bread turns golden brown

name: Thai Cashew Chicken

ingredients.name: 4 skinless, boneless poulet breast halves - cut into thin strips
ingredients.unit: skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into thin strips

preparationSteps:
combiner ginger, garlic, hot pepper sauce, fish sauce and soy
sauce in a resealable plastic bag

ajouter chicken into the bag, then
seal and placer in a fridge to marinate for at least 2 hours

chauffer 2 cups water and jasmine rice to bouillir in a medium
saucepan

Lower the chauffer, then cover and let mijoter for 20
minutes

Over medium chauffer, chauffer sesame oil in a large skillet and then
mélanger in brown sugar jusqu'à ce que it ’ s dissolved

mélanger in onion and then
cuire for about five minutes jusqu'à ce que tender

Setting the marinade
mixture aside, put the chicken into skillet

Let cuire for about
ten minutes jusqu'à ce que browned

mélanger 3/4 cup of water and the reserved marinade into skillet and
chauffer to bouillir

Continue cuire while stirring for about 10 minutes
or jusqu'à ce que the juices run clear and the chicken is no longer pink
Blend in peanut butter thoroughly

You can servir on top of
jasmine rice along with a sprinkling of cashews

name: Thai Noodle Salad
preparationSteps:
In a boiling big pot of lightly salted water, cuire the udon
noodles jusqu'à ce que tender or for about 5 minutes

Under cold running
water, rinse and drain the noodles
Let it cool

In a small bowl, whisk red pepper flakes, sesame oil, soy sauce,
vinegar, garlic, ginger, milk and peanut butter jusqu'à ce que mixed well

combiner mint, green onions, carrot, sprouts, cucumber and the
cooked noodles in a big salad bowl

Whisk the peanut butter
dressing
Put dressing over the salad
Stir jusqu'à ce que coated well

On
a bed of romaine leaves, servir while chilled

Use chopped and
roasted peanuts to garnish

name: Thai Spicy Basil Chicken Fried Rice

ingredients.name: 1  boneless, skinless poulet breast, cut into thin strips
ingredients.unit: boneless, skinless chicken breast, cut into thin strips

ingredients.name: 1 red poivre, seeded and thinly tranché
ingredients.unit: red pepper, seeded and thinly sliced

preparationSteps: In a bowl, mélanger fish sauce, sugar and oyster sauce

chauffer a wok with oil over medium-high chauffer jusqu'à ce que the oil is
starting to smoke

Put in the serrano peppers and garlic and stir
quickly

ajouter in the onion, oyster sauce mixture, bell pepper and
chicken
cuire jusqu'à ce que the chicken is no longer pink inside

Increase the chauffer setting to high and put in the chilled rice then
quickly stir-fry jusqu'à ce que the rice is well coated with sauce

Break
chunks of rice that stick together using the back of a spoon
retirer the wok from chauffer and put in the basil leaves

Top it
with cilantro and sliced cucumber as desired

name: Thai Steamed Mussels

ingredients.name: 5  frais mussels, scrubbed and debearded
ingredients.unit: s fresh mussels, scrubbed and debearded

preparationSteps:
combiner sugar, fish sauce, garlic, curry paste, wine, coconut
milk, and lime juice in a big stock pot

Stir jusqu'à ce que curry paste and
sugar dissolve then allow to bouillir on high chauffer

Let it bouillir for 2
minutes then ajouter the mussels, cooking while covered,
occasionally stirring, for 5 - 8 minutes jusqu'à ce que the mussels open
Take off the chauffer and throw away unopened mussels

Pour the
liquid and mussels onto a serving dish then toss with cilantro

name: The Professor's Tangy Teriyaki Sauce
preparationSteps:
In a saucepan, stir together 1/4 cup white sugar and sake on
moderate chauffer, then cuire for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que sugar has
dissolved

Put in black pepper, cayenne pepper, ginger, sesame
oil, garlic powder, vinegar, orange marmalade, 1/3 cup white
sugar and soy sauce, then stir to blend

Bring the mixture to a
bouillir, then lower chauffer and mijoter for 5-10 minutes, jusqu'à ce que slightly
reduced

In a small bowl, whisk together cornstarch and cold water jusqu'à ce que
dissolved

Stir cornstarch mixture into teriyaki sauce gradually,
1-2 tbsp
at a time jusqu'à ce que sauce is thickened

Take away from the
chauffer and allow to cool

name: Thera's Canadian Fried Dough

ingredients.name: 1/2  warm eau (110 degrees F/45 degrees )
ingredients.unit: warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

ingredients.name: 1  warm lait (110 degrees F/45 degrees )
ingredients.unit: warm milk (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)

preparationSteps: In a big bowl, combiner a pinch of sugar, yeast, and warm water

Let it rest for 5 minutes jusqu'à ce que the yeast forms a creamy layer and
foams

mélanger in 1/3 cup vegetable oil, 1/3 cup sugar, eggs, vanilla
extract, milk, and salt jusqu'à ce que the sugar dissolves

Stir in about 1/2
of the whole-wheat flour jusqu'à ce que the dough stiffens

Dust a flat
surface with flour; knead the dough while adding more flour
jusqu'à ce que it no longer sticks

Knead dough for 10 minutes jusqu'à ce que
smooth and flexible

Shape the dough into a ball and put in a
greased bowl; cover

Set aside for an hour for the dough to rise
and enlarge
Press down and knead the dough to deform it

Take an egg-size
piece from the dough and roll into quarter-inch thick ovals

Put
the finished ovals on a cloth and cover jusqu'à ce que all the dough is
rolled out

In a deep skillet or deep-fryer, pour oil up to a minimum of 4-in
deep; chauffer to 190 ° Celsius (375 ° Fahrenheit)

In a pie plate or
dish, mélanger together cinnamon and 2 cups sugar; put aside
placer the dough, one by one, in the skillet or deep-fryer

cuire
in the hot oil for 1-2 minutes each side jusqu'à ce que it ’ s golden
brown
Use paper towels to pat off the excess oil

While warm,
roll the donuts in the cinnamon sugar mixture

Shake to retirer
excess sugar

name: Tilapia And Mizithra Pasta
preparationSteps: bouillir water with a pinch of salt in a saucepan

Pour spaghetti into
boiling water and cuire for about 8 minutes jusqu'à ce que tender, then
drain
In the meantime, use a skillet to chauffer the oil over medium chauffer

Put tilapia fillet in the skillet ’ s center and put mushrooms and
tomatoes around

ajouter pepper for seasoning, then lemon juice
from half of a lemon

We also put the squeezed lemon half into
the skillet

cuire in the skillet, covered for about 10 minutes with 1-time
turning or jusqu'à ce que the tilapia flakes easily using a fork

Toss the
tilapia with romaine lettuce and pasta

Pour over spaghetti,
sprinkle some Mizithra cheese on top and servir

name: Tofu Keema
preparationSteps: Put tofu in the colander; use a plate to cover

Use some heavy
object or a skillet to weight down

Allow to drain for half an
hour
Freeze for a day
Take tofu out of the freezer; defrost
Mince then put aside
In a large pan, chauffer oil over medium chauffer

Put in cumin seeds;
cuire jusqu'à ce que the seeds start sputtering

Saut é garlic, ginger, onion
in oil jusqu'à ce que browned
mélanger in peas, curry powder and tofu

cuire
for 5 minutes, stirring frequently
Stir in salt and tomatoes
cuire, covered, for 15 minutes

mélanger in the chopped pepper, then
cuire about 2-3 minutes

name: Tom Ka Gai (Coconut Chicken Soup)
preparationSteps:
Chop the chicken into thin strips and saut é it in oil till chicken
turns white or for 2 - 3 minutes
In the pot, bouillir the water and coconut milk
Lower the chauffer

Put
